title: CIBC Mobile Banking¬Æ
description:
FIND IMPORTANT DISCLOSURES BELOW
The CIBC Mobile Banking App has received the highest ranking in customer satisfaction in Canada, according to a 2021 study from J.D. Power. We‚Äôre always striving to make our app do more for you.

FEATURES
Securely access your accounts with your fingerprint, face ID or password.
Apply for bank accounts or credit cards and view your application status in real time.
Get a snapshot of all your accounts in the same place, anytime.
Use  at payment terminals.
Set up instant, post-dated or recurring payments.
Deposit cheques in a flash - all you need is to take a picture with your phone.
Send and receive money instantly with Interac e-Transfer.
Quickly search for branches, banking hours, bank machines and mortgage advisors near you.
Receive your free Equifax credit score directly in the app, without affecting your score.
Our Travel Tools feature a currency converter, helpful tips and emergency numbers for while you‚Äôre away.
Our Virtual Assistant is available 24/7 to answer your banking questions and is able to perform everyday banking transactions on your behalf.
LANGUAGES
Supports English and French
PRIVACY
Your privacy and security comes first. Learn more about how CIBC is committed to protecting you by visiting https://www.cibc.com/en/privacy-security.html.
LEGAL
By downloading the CIBC Mobile Banking App you consent to the installation of this App and to any future updates or upgrades which may be automatically installed depending upon your device or operating system‚Äôs default settings or the settings you have selected. The app (including any updates or upgrades) may: (i) cause your device to automatically communicate with our servers to deliver the features and functionality described in the app description or through new features as they are introduced, and to record usage metrics; (ii) collect, use and disclose personal information as set out in our Privacy Policy; and (ii) affect preferences or data stored on your device. You can withdraw your consent at any time by uninstalling this App. For assistance, contact CIBC at the mailing address below.
CONTACT
For your banking questions, please visit: https://www.cibc.com/en/contact-us.html.
Telephone Banking: 1-800-465-2422
Address: CIBC Head Office, 81 Bay Street, CIBC Square, Toronto, Ontario, Canada M5J 0E7
Website: http://www.cibc.com

summary:
CIBC Mobile Banking
Everyday banking on the go

scraped_reviews.content: Update : I'm not the only one with the pop up tips reminders. All the most recent reviews are saying the same thing. Constant tips are getting annoying! After the recent update, every single time I log in it gives the exact same Tips to how to use the app and it's new features. This is absolutely a time waster and I click on things that pop up over tabs I was going to click. Please fix this!

Great app for CIBC clients but has issues; When trying to book an appointment, you just get a blank screen. Now since the latest update, EVERYTIME you log in and view your account, do eTransfers and other things, you get these annoying popups. even when you dismiss them, they don't go away - they pop up everytime you log in!!! Fix your app CIBC!!

My experience with this app has been nothing less than stellar. Everything that can be done on a PC, can be done easily within the app. It's responsive, quick, accurate, and I see no need to use a PC. I wish all my apps worked as well as this one. It never crashes, is always up to date and just makes my life much easier for online banking. Some of the other bank apps that I've used are just horrible and pale by comparison. Way to go CIBC!

App does not pull up when you search CIBC on your search bar. Must either put on your home page or look through your complete app folder to open it. Very frustrating setting up Google Pay. Because you have to download app and find in app link to set up Google Pay. Trying to set up direct through Google Pay would not work. Also app will not allow me to register a Pixel 2 for notifications. Bummer. Took almost 2 hours to figure all this out. Also, app will not permit autofill of login.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Karen. While the app is called CIBC Mobile Banking on the app store, once downloaded, it will be listed as "Banking" from your app drawer. You can set up your card for Google Pay by going into "Settings and Security" > "Google Pay Settings" from the app. Autofill for the app login only works for the card number and not for the password. -Gideon

scraped_reviews.content: The CIBC app designers tend to go backward rather than ever making improvements. Now the nav has been moved to the bottom and the only particularly helpful link is called "Move Money". It's there you find the links to bill payments or transfers. The Advice and More links are just junk marketing pages that are slow to load. I wish the app would focus more on what you want to do, rather than weird attempts to start a conversation you're not interested in having.

Pros - App works and functionally and no issues - UI is modern and looks good Cons - Updates to UI are too frequent to the point where it can lose you and you have to go looking for things. They had a great design a couple years ago but they keep changing things too much. It seems like the most recent design makes things more complicated rather than easy

What's bad: Upgraded Android phone and debit card account numbers all have to be manually and painstakingly re-entered. However, after this there were no nicknames for the accounts. Spent 100 minutes on the hotline with no compensation. Result was delete and re-add CIBC app, and then it worked 2nd time with nicknames. But they took me all around the houses first :-( Also, push notifications only work for 1 account, so if you have multiple accounts the others will fail for push notifications.

Terrible app. New version is a complete frustration! Pop ups are really annoying. And they just won't stop even you log in several times after updating the app. Like come on, you can show the same things once or twice... why every single time? pop up comes when you pay bill, when you are doing interac, like every single time you proceed with a transaction, pop-ups come and you need to press Got it!

I've been using this app for many, many years now. A few days ago it started pushing pop ups for "new" featured that I've been using for years. EVERY SINGLE TIME I LOAD THE APP I GET THESE POP UPS!!! I just want to get in and complete my goal and exit. But I can't. I've got to click dismiss on things like my credit cards transaction history. I've tried clicking through in hopes it would register that I checked out this faux "new" feature, but it doesn't work. I'm very annoyed by this.

I have some issues with this bank, but my biggest one is needing to call them at anytime. they have an AI which is the only thing that answers the phone and it has the awesome amount of 3 options to help you, which are never what I need, and when I try to get through with a human who could disclose the information I need it never goes through. it's incredibly frustrating to have to deal with that when you only have one simple question.

As everyone has noticed, this has become an unstoppable pop up machine on login. Like watching infomercials at 3am. But what about leaving feedback in the terrible app? Best way to get your complaints to them, oh wait! That doesn't work either, click the link and nothing happens. Well played!

app had gotten so glitchy, an etrf is taking hours and a transfer between my chequing and savings is also taking so much time. earlier it was instant, my app was recently updated, I am not sure what is happening. misunderstanding can cause me to get a $45 NSF charge in case i have an oversight and send the money twice. the glitch can cause a lot of troubles.

There are constant pop-ups after the latest update. Tip after tip that are completely irrelevant. I went to the bank in-person for the first time in years and when I showed the teller, they told me they have the same issue and cannot stop it. Fix it!

Just redoing my review . It has been a few years since I updated my review. This is the most used app on my phone and I do prefer using the app over there PC wep site for e-transfer and bill payments. Everything there and works well. You can access CIBC INVESTORS EDGE from it and that does work fine in a pinch. I do however I think the investors edge part could be better. I do most of my trades from my PC. They still have the full page ads from time to time but not nearly as intrusive as before
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jim! I'd like to take a deeper look into this for you. Please send us a screenshot of the ad on your mobile app to eClient.care@cibc.com. Once we have a look at the ad, we may be able to assist you further with this. I look forward to your email! -Krishan

scraped_reviews.content: Pop-Ups are ridiculous. Pop-ups are driving me insane. They are there every time I open the app and in each screen I open. I use the app to quickly check balances and move money. I don't want to be blocked by useless pop-ups over and over. If you have to put them there, please make them only show one time. Once I've seen it, I shouldn't have to see it again. I have complained about this before and had no response.

I haven't had issues with this app before today. The application repeatedly shuts down as soon as I enter my password and hit "Sign On" button. I restarted my phone but the problem persists. I will try an uninstall/reinstall and update my review if it's fixed. Update: Uninstalling did not fix.

After weeks of having to click past repeated pop-ups I came to the store to see if there was an update. No update but adding my review to the pile. I've been using to app for a decade, how many times do I need to reminded that I can press the transactions button to look at transactions? Apparently every time I login, but also as I navigate I will get new pop-ups. Clicking "got it" doesn't prevent it from opening again on my next login. There is a "provide feedback" button in the app but broken

Overall a good app but they have to disable the "new feature" pop ups that highlight the same feature every. single. time. I open the app! Doesn't matter if I click through to tell the app, yes, I get it, I've used this before, blah blah. It's so annoying and gets in the way of what I'm trying to do every time.

It's a banking app. I was using it and it's always been good but lately it has become very frustrating to use. Everytime I open the app, these "help" bubbles appear to "teach" one how to use the app. Great if there is a new feature we need to know about but teaching me how to check my balance or go to a different account is bloody annoying as I know how to do that. Even worse as it does this EVERY TIME WITHOUT FAIL. Who ever is in charge of app programming please fix this. Thank you.

Popup reminders get me crazy. But the worst is that after adding one more fingerprint to the phone, biometric authentication works no more. I go to settings - account security, try to enable - it says 'sign off and sign on to enable'. This does nothing. I have to enter my password every time

This app is extremely frustrating. Every time I want to do anything! I have to dismiss the tips telling me how to use an app that I've had for over a year. Pretty sure I know how to use it by now üòÉ This glitch going on this long is unacceptable in my opinion. Pretty sure CIBC has enough money to pay their development team to fix this.

the app is so annoying there are pop-ups coming every time I open my application even though I say "got it" they also keep pushing offers to me and I have to scroll down to make sure the advertisement can disappear about their low interest rate product. and it does that like one in three times

Recently, new user experience features were introduced along with tooltips explaining the changes. It‚Äôs been three weeks since the update, and every time I use the app, these tooltips keep popping up. It‚Äôs really annoying and time-consuming to have to click through them each time. The developers should ensure that once a user clicks ‚ÄúGot it,‚Äù the pop-ups don‚Äôt appear again.

the app is great, but ever since the last update, every time I log in, it's as if I'm logging in for the first time ever with suggestions popping up as if touring me through an app I've never used before. I am over it. Please fix it so that once I hit "Dismiss" it actually disappears for life.

constantly in demo mode. every time I use the app I am constantly bombarded with "tips" and pop ups like you would expect if you had been using the app for the very first time. it actually makes me want to cancel my banking with you because it is so annoying I can't efficiently use the app to do ANYTHING.

Updates are fun... Pop-ups telling me how to add Google pay - literally every single time the app opens - is a good way to get me to pick another bank and to never use Google pay. To be clear - I have this app to manage my finances, not as yet another avenue for advertisement. If I wanted Google pay services linked to my account, I would go find out how to do that on my own. Having the app try to walk you through the process literally every time it loads makes it feel non-optional.

So I've been using this app ever since I signed up for the Costco mastercard. To begin with everything was fine but the most recent update is beyond annoying. I have been unable to locate an option to turn off the new feature pop ups. Literally EVERY SINGLE TIME I open the app it has to tell me the same new features. I'm at the point of strongly considering using the web based option vs the app. Please fix this or atleast allow us to turn this off!

it works great except for the texting at 3am that I received a payment. also didn't credit a scam user of my card. I did get a new one. Why can't you put the payment on the card in the app right away as it is very confusing to see the charges pending when I paid the total already. the total owing doesn't change Even though it says it was received?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sandie. If you are experiencing an issue receiving the verification code kindly start a chat with our live chat team after sign on and our colleagues will be happy to review further. -Aditi

scraped_reviews.content: "New Features" pop-up keeps coming up. Whenever I open the banking app and go to Chequing for example, I get the black circle showcasing features within the app. I click dismiss and the next time I log in it shows me the same features, over and over. No way to turn these off. It's starting to get really annoying.

1 star for now, been using the app for a long time. recently been dealing with tutorial type pop ups, cant find a place to turn it off nor will it stop after I have acknowledged it. great app otherwise. does what it needs to...I already know how to navigate what I want though, I would like those helpful pop ups to stop

I'm not sure where else I can raise this, but a recent update means the overlays for new features (add to mobile wallet, txn glossary, etc) will not stop appearing, even if I interact with them. They appear after every login and I have to see and dismiss them every time. I use this app every day and am normally happy with it but this is incredibly frustrating. Please let me dismiss them for good. (Pixel 9)

Unable to really dismiss the "tips". Have this app for years, and now everytime I open it, it shows me tips pop up, no matter how many times I dismiss them, they kept showing up, extremely annoying. Tried clearing cache, no use. Tried uninstalling and reinstalling, no use.

There was for years a basic e-deposit feature you'd expect where if you tried to deposit a cheque you already did, it would automatically decline for you. They removed that. Now, you are lulled into a false sense of security with regards to this matter, and also with regards to your chequing account being completely "free" (story too long for max 500 word review). The erosion of trust continues. CIBC causes plenty of what I would call "fine print" issues nowadays. I do not recommend.

since the recent update that I was told I must do to use the mobile app going forward. it spins and spins. I want, need, access to my money. it sucks so far. Also, the pop ups to access my accounts are annoying. Feels like Im using Temu shopping.

the bill payment date is wrong, it quotes yesterday instead of today. the chat bot is USELESS and the overall navigation is clunky and outdated. Too many ads and even if you try to dismiss them it doesn't remember so it keeps blocking your accounts until you answer again that you are not interested.

I am not impressed at the moment, CIBC seems very aware through the reviews, Twitter, and other platforms that there are coding flaws and many phones will not enable the push notifications which is particularly problematic with people traveling outside the country and acts as a powerful incentive to change banks. Does CIBC intend to fix this known flaw such as for the Samsung A32? Update it briefly worked and let me register, now it stopped sending them.

Every time I open the app, it treats me like a first-time user. I‚Äôm constantly bombarded with tutorials and promotional offers, which is incredibly frustrating. There should be an option to outright disable the tutorials at the very least.

Recently I began getting notifications in app about "you can manage your credit card here" or "add your debit card to google play" every single time that I log in. That notification takes over the screen and I can't disable it. Fix that, the app is currently very frustrating to use because of it.

The new update is annoying as hell. EVERY single time I log in or change a screen, there is a ridiculous pop-up that I have to dismiss, in order to proceed. Show it once and when I click it, don't show it again! Please get rid of it.

Every time I try to use the app it covers the screen with the flashing "new features" popups and I can't just use the app until I tap the specific thing it wants me to tap. You can't even tap outside the area to dismiss, you have to tap the exact stupid thing it's pointing you to. And it repeats this process each time I use the app, instead of only the first time.

worst banking app. I've used RBC and TD for years and needed this app for my costco credit card. whenever I try to e transfer money to this account, im stuck in a cycle of being unable to e transfer if im already logged in, so I always need to close the app and re sign in??? and im constantly bombarded with ads when I sign in too. NO I dont want to sign up for these other dumb accounts. how is everyone okay with this app? never had this much grief using any other banking app. so many error codes

Layout is frustrating, though probably good for people with vision issues. Should be able to see all accounts on one page, not have to scroll down three, with advertising taking up the top third of the first page. Layout should be adjustable. A recent update will not stop new feature pop ups, even after you acknowledge and dismiss them, over and over again, no way to turn them off, or opt out.

Everytime you load it's trying to give tips for how to use the application (which I don't need or want). It's always trying to upsell you their services. I want to be able to use the application without all the upselling and tips.

Everything you need is in this app. * update after the most recent update October 2025 this app is garbage! Every time I try to log in it tells me I have entered incorrect password even though I didn't and I have to reset it. very annoying!

As an app, it does everything I need it to do. The most recent update is annoying though. No matter how many times you dismiss the notification for new features they show up the next time you use them. They should implement a way to track who has dismissed what so that users don't have to see the same notifications more than twice.

Best bank I think I have had in a long time. the staff at the location where I live are so friendly and helpful. The app works great and I can get all the information I need. Plus, check you're credit score anytime so convenient

Excellent app, probably the best banking app, but the latest update is terrible. There are so many "tell me more" bubbles that pop up that, no matter how many times I dismiss, still pop up the next time I'm in the app. I use this app multiple times a day and it's become almost intolerable.

The app has been constant giving me a walkthrough of the features I've already used for years now. I tried to dismiss it but each time I login for a new session, its the same saga, app thinks I'm using it for the first time and gives me a tutorial. Especially on the credit card tab, It's frustrating now.

app doesn't work properly to transfer money from checking account to TFSA. you call the call center for help. they outsource the jobs to people who can't understand English. so you don't get any help. instead they want you to delete the app and do everything online. so what is the point of having the app then??

why has your app forces me to look at instructions for one time contact e-transfers when i have absolutely no need for that information, i get showing me once but EVERY SINGLE TIME i send an e transfer is infuriating, go to press on the security question and nope look at this USELESS thing that weve shown you 20 times already!

title: 30 Day Fitness Challenge
description: Workout at home, suited for anybody at any time. The 30 Day Fit Challenge Workout, designed by a professional fitness coach, is scientifically proven to help improve fitness and health. Also, this app can synchronize with burned calorie data on Google Fit. Stick with the program, and you will see amazing results. By fully considering workouts rules, 30 Day Fit Challenge Workout increases exercise intensity step by step, so you can easily stick daily workouts. Don't need to go to gym, just use your bodyweight and take a few minutes a day, 30 Day Fit Challenge Workout will greatly help you keep fitness and lose weight effectively. Features - Records training progress automatically - Reminds you to workout every day - Detailed video guides - Increases exercise intensity step by step - 30 day abs challenge - 30 day full body challenge - 30 day butt challenge - Share with your friends on social media Each challenge has 3 difficulty levels, from beginner to pro. Begin your 30 day challenge now, and after 30 days, you may find that your emotional and intellectual fitness improve along with your physical fitness. Weight Loss Apps Looking for weight tracker app? No satisfied lose weight app? This weight loss apps can help you weight loss, it is weight loss apps for women and men. With our efficient lose weight app, you will lose weight fast. This lose weight app is definitely for you! Fitness App Multiple abs workouts are available to help you get six pack abs. Follow your personal trainer and expert workouts, six pack abs is within your reach! Short Workouts We have short workouts for people who don‚Äôt have much time to exercise, you will get the sweats and fast heartbeat in a few minutes. These HIIT (high-intensity interval training) can maximize the results. Workout at Home Take a few minutes a day to lose weight and keep fit effectively with our workout at home. No equipment needed, just use your bodyweight to workout at home. Fat Burning Workouts & Hiit Workouts Brilliant fat burning workouts & hiit workouts for better body shape. Burn calories with fat burning workouts, and combine with hiit workouts to get the amazing results. Fitness Coach All workouts are designed by professional fitness coach. Workout guide through the exercise, just like having a personal fitness coach in your pocket!

By fully considering workouts rules, 30 Day Fit Challenge Workout increases exercise intensity step by step, so you can easily stick daily workouts. summary: Take 30 day challenge at Home to improve health with scientific workouts.

scraped_reviews.content: the app is great and I love the exercises, however I just recently got a new phone and when I went to download the app on my new phone I noticed none of my progress switched over so now I have to start all over again smh. There should be some kinda system that saves ur progress in case of situations like this, seems like a huge oversight...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Antione, thank you for using our app! Our app supports cross-device data synchronization. Please note that you can use your Google account to sign in to our app. After switching devices, sign in with the same account to sync your cloud data. If you have any further questions, please contact us via 30workoutfeedback@gmail.com.

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app. This is my favorite fitness app. I don't need a gym membership with this. There's a demo of each exercise while you're doing them. There is a progression of the levels for each day of the month. Plus there are workouts for whatever body area you're targeting. There's every level from very beginner to well advanced workouts. There's a timer and you can pause the workouts if you want. I can't say enough good things about this app.

I used to like using the app with just the 30 day challenges, but I hate the new update. I don't like the new suggested workouts and the meal plan is a joke. I signed up for the free trial recently to try out the paid functions. When I tried to cancel, I searched the entire app, but I couln't figure out how to do it. Days later, I cancelled it through google play, but I had already been charged for the whole year. I emailed their customer service and never got a reply back. Don't get this app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks so much for your comment. We'd be grateful if you could give 5 star to support us, 
which will inspire us to get better.
Leap Fitness Group

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app for 8 days now and so far love it. Very easy to use, it has a voice that tells you your exercises and how many when completing your workout. There are 5 workouts a day, and at first I thought that was small but doable. I have learned that those 5 workouts a day is perfect. Between walking a mile, on my own, a day and then doing my full body challenge my body is pushed at the end of it all. I love how it gradually adds more to your reps and mixes it up.

This app is great for giving workouts that actually make me feel like I have accomplished something, and, the more I use this app, I'm sure I'll start seeing the difference I want. However, what I don't see, as with all fitness apps or the such, are stretching exercises that are just as important as the exercises. As, most people who use these types of apps don't know about stretching--something not taught in P.E. or otherwise. Please add this to decrease injury risk while using your app.

I love this app! It's so easy to figure out and keeps me motivated to work out. You can choose types of work outs, what level you want (easy,medium, hard), it doesn't require weights, it gives you examples on an exercise if you don't know it, gives you an option to pause the work out or add a longer time to the resting period. Seriously great!

This is the best app for me. I've tried gyms and programs.and they all failed, due to my busy life style. I roll out of bed and do the workout. Sometimes I do a second one the same day. It's well paced and easy to follow. It focuses on consistency, which is key to get in shape. However, I am not too keen about a recent update. the weight graph and the calendar tracker are on the fritz. Since I use both frequently it interferes with my tracking.

Great Excercise App. I love that you can do it while watching TV, listening to audiobook, etc. Most of the apps requires undivided attention while exercising but this one allows to do whatever you want while completing the daily routine. I'm not great, I only did one 30-day challenge at medium level but I can see the results without making any other dietary changes in my daily routine. Definitely recommend it to try.

This app is awesome! The only thing I do not like is if I exit the app for a brief moment to answer a text or change my music, the rest timers do not continue to count the time between exercises. It definitely works if you stick with it! I love how they change up the exercises each day to target different muscle areas. I finished the medium 1 ab work out and I'm already starting to cut out. It's an amazing. So glad I found this app, it's changed my life.

What an awesome motivational exercise app! You set the difficulty level and each day the app gives you daily exercises to do. It also has a meal planner in the free version suggesting meals and snacks daily. I've been inactive (230lb), and needed something to get me going again. The only drawback with free version is ads. You can pay for pro if you don't want them. UPDATE: I've completed the first 30 days and I can already feel and see a difference! Can't wait see results in next 30 days.

The ads come on before the exercise routine has ended. This is really frustrating when you're doing a plank, and need to hear the countdown, but all you get is an ad. I'll pay a couple of bucks to go ad-free. That should be an option. The reminders are glitched. Only one reminder is allowed at a time even though you're allowed to set more than one.

-2018: Wounderful short workouts. Did not expect to be challenged by the app but I was wrong and definitely feel the burn everyday. It progresses at a reasonable speed so the workouts are progressive and sustainable as long as the correct difficulty is chosen. Medium is harder than it looks. Don't be afraid to try the easy level first. 2020- Still using this app. Missed a year of working out. Back at easy level. Still a great app for 30 day challenges.

This app works great. The workouts are straight forward and we'll balanced. I haven't tried the paid service yet. But I really like what I have done so far. The ads aren't too intrusive and don't bother me. They seem pretty well targeted lol. I have been getting some good results and once I do all the challenges I am considering the paid option that makes a special workout plan just for you.

I got this app, and even paid the $9.99 for no ads and such, cuz I was thinking it is pretty much worth it , (if it works). Three days later and things are going great! Already lost a few pounds! Anyways onto the cons...  So when I did the chest workout today it made me do backward lunges.. Now I am not a physical therapist by any means but last I checked that didn't have anything to do with chest? When I first started using this app it didn't warn me how fast things would be moving forward. You go through these exercise sessions within 10 or less minutes! There was no warning as to how fast and intense it was going to be. Granted, three days later I got used to it, and it has probably helped amazingly! One thing I would change is to at least let people know what they are getting into.   I love how there are animations showing how to do the exercises, and videos if you need more detail! I think this is the smartest and most amazing thing the devs have done! This app also has a meal plan, and the diet may seem barebones at first, but then I realized this is probably what an actual normal person eats lol.  I would give 5 stars but there was that issue with wrong exercises! 8/10
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thanks for your feedback. We will take your suggestion seriously and try our best to make some improvement in this aspect. If have any other problem, please feel free to contact us : )

scraped_reviews.content: The first 2 weeks were great! I like that the exercise routines changed daily. After the 2 weeks or so, the same 2 exercises are repeated every single time! Those are butt bridges ans superman. I am so sick and tired of those exercises. There isn't a day that doesn't go by that those 2 exercises don't show up. I will finish the 30 day challenge, then I'll be done with this app.

Perfect. And it works. If you want to do your own kind of specific workout, do it in the time alloted. Its perfect. Very customizable. Great for building muscle and gaining weight. Ive been using it for a week and a half and I am already seeing results. Dont forget to eat right and push yourself. Totally worth it. And not as many annoying ads as every other app. Its great

I didn't bother purchasing the individualized plan - I just use the free app and I love that I can do all the exercises at home - no equipment necessary! Just a good workout that progressively pushes you to improve. Looking at the workouts, they don't seem like they would be effective, but you can totally feel yourself working hard! Love it!!

Exercise is my hobby. I'm an avid with weight and cardio. I downloaded this app because when it's cold and snowing outside it's hard for me to motivate myself to leave the house - even for the gym. I'm very happy with the selection of workouts at the hard levels and think the ease of use would be great even for a beginner at easy levels. I enjoy the experience of having another day highlighted as finished - it motivates me to do it more often, even when I don't really need to.

I highly recommend this app to the person who is ready to start a habit but struggles with the high expectations of other options. The easy plan starts out soooooo low. Then it increases weekly, but only by a little. There are pictures and timers to help you. You can redo any day, if you aren't ready for more. It literally took 2 or 3 minutes to finish it. I had a huge mental block of exercise being too hard or taking too much time. This was exactly what I needed to build success!

The increase in difficulty during each month-long routine is too aggressive. If you find a level that feels right for the first week, the second or third week will be much too difficult for someone who is making realistic progress. I love the premise of this app, but I think it will discourage people who are working on getting back in shape. By setting an excessive pace, I think the app will cause most users to give up in 2-3 weeks.

I love this app actually!! But a big negative for me how it sort of ignores where I'm at in terms of fitness level. I'm on easy 1 and it still makes workouts, specifically pushups extremely common. As if they're super easy. I put the option that I can only do 0-5 pushups (I can't do any) and it stills gives me tons of pushups to do even though I can't do any. I wish it ACTUALLY took into account "Hey let's give this guy some inclined pushups instead" or tested to see which type was best for me

A workout I can actually do! I've been really wanting to get into fitness more but honestly have had no idea where to start so I always just end up doing cardio. With this app, you can set your own difficulty level, and since I'm a beginner I picked easy. The workouts are just right for my level! I've been so intimidated to start working out because I know I'm not that strong yet, but this makes me feel confident. The workouts get a little harder every day and it's cool seeing myself improve!

I absolutely love how you can choose your difficulty level. I coach Gymnastics and I am creative when it comes to conditioning and these exercises are right up my alley. perfect for what I work with and inspires me to do them harder so I can demonstrate them to the gymnasts. only thing I wish I could change was if it could be set on auto play for all exercises instead of clicking next after everyone.

Great app that made my workouts much more convenient to work out at home. I really like how it has different levels to challenge you and once you feel the burn, you start to see results within a week or 2 weeks later. I dropped a few pounds and gained muscle. I had people asking me what I was doing I told them all about the app. Wish there was 30 day fitness Merchandise I could wear to advertise. Change the way you eat and workout and you're bound to get results! Stay committed to workouts.

I used this app for a long time and love it. The workouts are great and the video tutorials great as well. I use the free version and have never had a problem with ads, it's how the company makes money and I appreciate that. But, recently, the ads don't give the option to exit and you can't even start the exercise because there is no "X" to click on. This app has become essentially inoperable and I am disappointed. Please fix and I'll gladly change my review to 5‚≠ê
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. Thank you for using our app and providing us feedback. Sorry for the bad experience. Our app is free, so we need to make money by displaying ads. We're trying to find ways to display ads without disturbing you in our future version. Thanks for your understanding.Best regards~ Leap Fitness Group

scraped_reviews.content: I'm only 5 days into using this app so I will update after 30. So far this is a great app. I wanted something that I could use/ do anywhere. This gives you several options for a difficulty level. I'm fairly athletic and healthy so I chose "Hard 1" and after the 10-15 min routine is over I'm breathing hard and my heart rate is up. I'm honestly am expecting to see results because the app incorporates exercises that I don't typically do.

I like the app and it does a good job with reminders, but i dont understand the point of including a button to rate certain exercises if there is going to be no change to the routine. I dont expect the app to be able to anticipate my needs, but when i select that i dislike an exercise and select that it is because of an injury my hope would be that this exercise will not appear again. Its a good app, but i cannot give 5 stars until i see better customization for the routines. Thank you
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thanks for reaching out to us! We'll take your feedback into deep consideration and will try to optimize this feature in the future versions to bring you a better experience. Any other questions, please feel free to contact us. Hope you enjoy using our app!

scraped_reviews.content: All I really needed, it gives me a routine and warm up times in between exercises. It becomes more challenging as you go. I don't need fancy gym equipments and can do the routines anywhere, including my bedroom while watching my favorite shows. And, it gives me reminders as well. NO MORE PROCRASTINATING!

I've used this for a month and my lower back pain has started to subside and some days isn't even there . I'm stronger than I was before and it's only a few minutes a day. It shows me that I can build up strength slowly to avoid injury unlike a lot of programs that made me go to hard too fast and caused me to regres into more pain. This app is great for beginners or people who have injuries and are looking to build up strength slowly.

The app is supposed to remind you to work out daily (or whatever you set parameters to). I have 3 alarms set per day, but if you ignore one, it stops sending notifications. I forgot to cancel after my free trial and was charged for a year, so I figured I should use it, but I never receive notifications reminding me to exercise. This renders the app virtually useless if I don't remember on my own. (I don't, of course, which is why I was trying the app in the first place.)

Lately, I'm not able to even access the exercises as the ads won't let me exit out of them to the exercise. It won't even respond if I hit install, it just looks frozen. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app but it's still doing this. edit: completely unusable now. guess I'm looking for a new app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Reta. We apologize for the trouble you're experiencing! To help us resolve the issue, could you please send us a screenshot or the ad link via 30workoutfeedback@gmail.com? We'll investigate and work on a solution as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding and patience!

scraped_reviews.content: 2025 review: I used to love this app but the data and cookie permissions are just ridiculous now and I've uninstalled it. 2018 review: Excellent app! It's progressive, with different levels, and you can choose which area you want to focus on. I've tried the full body work out and I like the fact that the exercises are varied and isn't boring. It also includes well thought out rest days, which are definitely needed sometimes! I wish there was a paid version of this app which is ad free.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: HI! We take user privacy seriously and are continuously working to ensure the app meets security and privacy standards while providing the best experience possible. If it‚Äôs convenient, could you please tell us more specifically what you found problematic or uncomfortable about the permissions? Feel free to contact us 30workoutfeedback@gmail.com.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is really great. It was more than I expected. All plans and exercises are well sorted and cleverly planned. Exercises are planned such that you can do the next day's or following days' exercises (higher level) easily. It builds your stamina strategically; you don't even feel it until you move on for next day and discover that you could do the exercise smoothly. If you do the exercises sincerely, you'd feel the difference just within a week. I am high school student. And it perfectly fits my routine with its short yet efficient daily set of exercises.  All the bes, everyone. You must try this app for sure without giving any second thought.

The best app! Just ho for it! I have tried so many fitness apps but this is the best because even 5 mins workouts are available. And it doesn't let you see the future workouts until you do it which helps in becoming more consistent. So if you want to cultivate a habit of moving your body everyday, it's a really good app. it doesn't contain ads, most of the content is free

I absolutely love this app. The only thing is change, would be to show the day that you're on instead of percentage when viewing your challenges, since it'd be easier to see how far you are with each one. Otherwise, I recommend this app to anyone- I can fit the exercises in each day, they get progressively more difficult but not so drastically that you can't manage. I've tried many fitness apps but this is by far the best, nothing can compare!

This app has really helped me lose a lot of weight over the years of using it on and off. I would like it if we could exclude certain exercises from the routines though. I really hate burpees and don't want to do them but they're always included. I just end up skipping them but would like to remove them altogether. All in all, great as a free app and not too many ads.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your support! We‚Äôve added your wish to our list of suggested features in the future version. Your 5-star rating is a big encouragement to us. Best wishes!‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: This is the best fitness app (free version) that I've found. It's been brilliant for home workouts in the school holidays when I've got children home and I can pick as many challenges as I have time for. It's simple to use, the format is user-friendly and the cues during exercises are helpful. Its got me in a great exercise routine and the rest days are spot on. I adapt the exercises to suit me, eg. I can't do press-ups so do them on my knees but I add weights to the exercises I find easier.

In terms of what it's supposed to do, this app is great. I would give it a 5 out of 5 stars. There are different levels and different exercise types so it suits different needs. The full body beginner pack starts off easy, making it easier to build a habit of exercising. I particularly like how if we miss a day, it wont show as a big red cross, but it rather accumulates the days we exercised on the calendar. The only reason that I am not giving a 5 star rating is because of an ad I saw just now. I am not sure if you have control over what ads are shown, or if Google or a third party does, but the content of the ad was sexually inappropriate. Otherwise, this is the best exercise app I have used in the past 3 years for building a habit of exercising.

It's the only fitness app I've used so far and it worked great for me. Starting from easy and reaching hard takes months but it is worth it. I didn't want to lose weight just get back in shape and strengthen my muscles. And in 2 months time I got the results I wanted. It is a great app. Ads pop on just in then end of the program so they're not annoying. It does have instructions and links to videos for exercises. Overall is a really good app!

Honestly this app is the reason how I went from 68kg (Dec2018) to 58kg (Oct2019). If you stay dedicated and just do it as often as you can, even for a mere 5 minutes is good enough it's effort and a step forward anyway. It's great my body is a lot leaner and I like the different workouts they provide it definitely feels like the app knows the kind of progress my body is going through. I just have one issue, currently when I look at the monthly reports the days I work out aren't showing up.

I train regularly , but it's always good to keep your body guessing, saw this app & thought I'd give it a try. The selection in training certain parts of the body is good, & the easy, medium, hard choices. It has audio & visual so very good if you're not looking at the phone You don't need much space & if you have a mat you're good to go. First few days the set of exercises are short, I often do 3 sets until they get longer. I like it so far.. and have already shared with my friends.

This is a great app,truly efficient,keeps track of fitness,it's all around a good app,would highly recommend it,I'm at day 5 of some of my workouts and I'm feeling the heat,without a doubt a good app,but there is one thing that is needed in every workout routine,stretching.I don't know if they come in later stages,or never,but they are very needed in helping with a good workout set-up. It would be best if you added a few more of those.Otherwise,a fantastic workout app.

first time using one of these fitness apps. its actually pretty great , having a structured plan to workout and in a short time frame. a much needed tool in this busy life. i always stop working out cuz studies cuz it takes a lot of time, time i can spend studying. but with this app i only need to spend a few minutes, at least with the easy plan. lets see how it goes.

Love it! I like that you can pick which body part you want to exercise or full body. They have various difficulty levels to get training targeted to your level on each muscle group. The app is so easy to use and the workouts offer additional options during like skipping an exercise or skipping a rest and giving you tips to make the exercise harder or easier while you are in the pose üôÇ.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks so much for your kind word! We'll take your 5 stars as a big encouragement, and continue to bring you better experience. Hope you enjoy using our app!‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: Pretty useful and straightforward app overall. I've only tried their full body workout material so I can't speak for the rest of their workouts. I think the instructional videos are a great addition as sometimes it's difficult to figure out the movements from only a picture. However, I wish there was consistent information about the exercises we were doing. If you click on details, some exercises do mention what part of the body they're targeting, some tips to do it well but not all.

I actually use this app quite a bit. Between this app on the highest difficulty for full body workout and using myfitnesspal app, I lost 20lbs in 30 days. Now I use it for warm ups and cool downs. I like that you get more than 3 options for difficulty settings so you can work your way up. All the exercises are clearly explained and demonstrated in the app too which is nice

I love the app, it is super easy to use, I have just finished the Hard level of abs 30 days and I'm on day 16 for Hard level of the Butt workout. The only  suggestion for improvement is maybe instead of getting a notification  saying that you should exercise, the notification can roughly estimate the time it will take you to complete the exercise for that day. Just something I'd like to see, to get motivated EVERY day. We all know it is hard to stay continuously motivated so anything you can do to change that would be perfect.

The app itself is pretty good but I feel like the workouts, especially the full body ones, are not that thought through. They place way too much emphasis on the legs (many "full body" workouts are literally like 50% leg exercises) and the order in which you're supposed to do the exercises often doesn't make much sense either.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks so much for your comment. We'd be grateful if you could give 5 star to support us, which will inspire us to get better.
Leap Fitness Group

scraped_reviews.content: It's free and it helps you decide what to do when you're too busy to create your own workout plan. I totally love the full body workout option. The moves are repetitive so it gets boring after awhile, but it targetted every muscle group without having to buy any equipment. (you will need a mat but that's a very very basic requirement).

Fantastic app! This is the first app I've been able to stick to purely due how quick the sessions are and the ability to choose a focus area. I've been doing the full body, arms and booty 4 days a week and then abs and legs whenever I feel I need a little extra, and it's super great. They progress harder/longer as you go but it's not super noticeable as it kinda works with your progress. Ads are only at the end of each session and very quick. You don't need any equipment either!

title: izneo: Read Manga and Comics
description:
Izneo is a free application to read manga, BD, graphic novels, and comics on smartphone, tablet, PC, Mac and Smart TV. Find a catalog of several thousand albums that you can buy directly from the application. Enjoy a 100% digital reading experience, without advertising and on all your devices.

With izneo:

-Enjoy thousands of comics, mangas & bd at crazy prices with regular promotions.

-Enjoy your HD comics on all screens with the eazycomics unique reading experience.

-Smart TV, laptop, tablet, smartphone: your comics are synchronized in your library and available at any time, anywhere, making it easy to pick up where you left off.
A convenient and pleasurable reading experience to enjoy comics as you have always done: read online or offline within our free apps whether it‚Äôs on the train, on the bus, or even on your couch and in bed!

-Discover the richest catalog of digital comics and mangas in Europe

-Access the most comprehensive range of European comics, US comics, Webtoon, Mangas, Graphic novels and children's comics, available in digital format. Discover new comics and rare reprints in the Highest Definition possible‚Ä¶ And because you shouldn't judge a book by its cover, you can browse the first few pages of all our comics for free. You don't even have to create an account to do so!!

-Explore all kind of comic book genres like never before; Adventure, Romance, Thriller, Heroic Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Comedy‚Ä¶ 

-Discover a new way to enjoy reading. With a unique and customizable player, you can adapt your reading experience to suit your taste and situations. Enjoy your comics with the panel by panel mode called eazycomics, for the most comfortable reading experience possible without any ads! You will be amazed by how good your comics look on the screen so don't forget to launch izneo in dock mode! 

-Meet your favorite comics‚Äô characters on izneo:
The best-selling mangas: Attack on Titan, Fairy Tail, Domestic Girlfriend, Chihayafuru, Edens Zero‚Ä¶
The most thrilling European comics: Thorgal, XIII, Spirou & Fantasio, Blake & Mortimer, Valerian and Laureline, Carthago and more!
And check out our best US comics: Bloodshot, The Umbrella Academy, Hellboy, The Boys, Black Hammer, The Witcher, Tomb Raider...

scraped_reviews.content: Downloads fail more often than not. The app doesn't que books, and they fail even when loading just one book at a time. Also, books go bad if I leave them on device. Asks if I want to pick up where I left off and then stays busy. Have to uninstall and reinstall the whole app when that happens. üò†
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your comment, we are sorry that you have encountered problems with the application and the downloads, we have make some tests and have not been able to reproduce the problems encountered, we invite you to contact our teams at support@izneo.com we will do our best to help you. Regards

scraped_reviews.content: The reader itself is fine, but the app really needs some quality of life improvements. There is no option to sort the library of downloaded books other than by keyword. Having books organised by title would be really useful. Resuming a collection from the library puts you at the start in offline mode, not where you were actually up to. You can get resuming from a bookmark if you are online, but that itself requires navigating through an extra page. A disappointing app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your comment, we invite you to contact our teams at support@izneo.com, the downloaded albums are also available in a tab of each series, or listed by series in the dedicated tab, the bookmark only works online indeed , we noted your feedbacks and we will do our best to take them into account. Regards

scraped_reviews.content: Love being able to buy franco-belgian comics online in multiple languages, but the app can be a bit buggy at times ( does not load well all the time and sometimes there's no option to purchase and you have to go through the website to purchase.) Also, the app could use support for the Dutch language stuff you can purchase on the website. Edit: purchase options are better and Dutch is now available in the app. Just wish more publishers would sign up for the Dutch releases, but I'm sure that'll h
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your opinion and your support, yes we are doing our best to improve the application including languages ‚Äã‚Äãand corresponding catalogs and we are doing our best to add as many publishers to the catalogs, happy reading and see you soon.

scraped_reviews.content: Fantastic library when it comes to non-manga comics. Unfortunately buying individual comics is expensive, considering they are not DRM-free. The service would make more sense if all content became part of a (higher tier?) subscription. The app itself needs does need some optimisation, but the quality of the comics and reader are really good.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your comment, we have taken your feedback into account and will do our best to upgrade the app and offers, do not hesitate to contact our teams at support@izneo.com. good reading and see you soon. Regards

scraped_reviews.content: i thought it was free but I'm disappointed when i need to go premium
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, izneo is a digital bookstore, and the content belonging to authors and publishers is not free. A subscription provides access to a dedicated catalog of comics, but it is not mandatory; you can purchase comics individually. Feel free to contact our team at support@izneo.com if you have any questions. Regards

scraped_reviews.content: I got this app to try after having bought a Humble comic bundle. The issues with the store and app are many and onerous, but here are just a few. App is unoptimized for tablets (where you would read these?), images stretched, rasterized, and unreadable. App is only portrait mode, and doesn't support two page landscape. Comics can't be downloaded to SD instead of tablet itself. Comics can't be sorted. Store only supports Euro pricing, etc. Look at how Paizo does it better with watermarked pdfs.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your comment, the app is completely compatible with tablets and landscape and double-page mode, there are filters in the library and the serie pages, a search engine, we support other devises than euro and if you encounter problem with a comics we invite you to contact our teams at support@izneo.com we can help you. Regards

scraped_reviews.content: I tried creating an account on my Nintendo Switch to use this app but it for some reason would not let me create it after I entered all of my new login information. I then decided to install the app on my phone to try and make account there, while it did let me finally create an account, it wouldn't let me login using my account information after I let it automatically save to Google. I keep trying to log in on numerous devices but it just doesn't let me for some reason. Disappointed
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Merci de votre avis, nous vous invitons √† contacter nos √©quipes √† support@izneo.com svp nous pouvons vous aider avec les probl√®mes de connexion, il est possible que sur Switch ou sur les serveurs un probl√®me ponctuel soit survenu toutefois l'application Andro√Ød fonctionne actuellement, nous restons √† votre disposition, merci d'avance. Cordialement.

scraped_reviews.content: No longer will offer other languages than French. Often pages do not load, or even full books, even for comics that have been downloaded! Only reason I got it was to be able to read comics I bought in a humble bundle, else I would have stayed far away from it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for your feedback, about reading or downloading problems, we invite you to contact our teams at support@izneo.com. thank you informe patience, regards

scraped_reviews.content: bookmark feature isnt working all the time. found myself needing to remember what page i left off on in case bookmark didnt work. subscription is honestly quite pricey compared to the likes of sj app so i was expecting more titles be available when subscribed but there isn't that much and you still have to pay for the newer volumes.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Merci de votre avis, veuillez nous excuser pour le probl√®me avec le marque page, il fonctionne en mode connect√©, le catalogue Abonnement Premium contient plus de 2000 titres s√©lectionn√©s pas les √©diteurs partenaires de l'offre, nous avons bien pris en compte votre remarque et restons √† votre √©coute. Cordialement

scraped_reviews.content: Found a free promotional month so desided to check it out. Wanted to re-read a series (The Boys), added series to my list on my computer - tried to pull it up on my iPad, series not there and not showing up on any searches - same issue on android app. After about 30 minutes of going back and forth to try and find the series on the mobile app I gave up, uninstalled, and canceled - shouldn't be that much of a pain.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello and thank you for your opinion, we confirm that your library is synchronized on all devices, we invite you to contact our teams at support@izneo.com we can probably help you. see you soon.

scraped_reviews.content: 1. Very slow: it takes time to load covers. 2. Not clear pricing: one has to click to see the price, which even multiplies the slowness (see point above). 3. Not fully translated into English. 4. Too expensive pricing strategy: charges for comics, which are for example for free on graphite at a click of a button.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your opinion, we invite you to contact our teams at support@izneo.com, the loading may depend on certain factors, the interface is identical to the language of the device and the BDs to that of the app, finally prices are set by publishers.

scraped_reviews.content: Bad: New titles are rarely added to the premium subscription. When I change mode to "abo", all listing are empty even though I have a subscription. Looses the place in the comic when rotation changes. Only allows me to set rating when reading last page. When going back in the catalog, it goes to featured instead. Good: Most of the time it doesn't crash.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for comment, can you please send an email at support@izneo.com about you subscription, our teams can help you, we also noted your feedback, thank you for understanding. Regards

title: Neshan| Map & Navigation App
description:
Using GPS and real-time traffic data‚Äîjust like leading international navigation apps‚ÄîNeshan suggests the fastest, least congested routes, and alerts you along the way when you are approaching speed cameras or police checkpoints.
Features like displaying air pollution levels in cities with monitoring stations, warning about speed bumps, routing with traffic restriction and low-emission zone considerations, combined bus-and-metro navigation, motorcycle routing, and more have made Neshan the go-to choice for many Iranian users, including ride-hailing drivers on Snapp and Tapsi, offering unique advantages over other mapping and navigation services.

Key features and benefits of Neshan:

Maps of all cities and countries worldwide, powered by open and free OpenStreetMap data

Display of air pollution monitoring stations in all cities that have them

Detailed offline maps of all cities with live traffic information

Ability to choose the best and cheapest way to reach your destination with combined bus and metro routing

Global maps with navigation to any desired location

Persian voice guidance that speaks street names so you don‚Äôt need to look at the map

Find nearby public places such as restaurants, gas stations, ATMs, hotels, and more

Search without typing (Persian speech recognition)

Routing that accounts for traffic restriction zones and low-emission zones, helping you avoid entering them unintentionally

Option to select direct routes in Neshan‚Äôs navigation settings

Alerts for police presence, speed cameras, speed bumps, and traffic

Accurate location detection using GPS

With Neshan maps and navigation, you‚Äôll know your way anywhere.

Contact Neshan:

Email: support@neshan.org

Telegram Support: @neshan_admin

Instagram: instagram.com/neshan_nav

scraped_reviews.content: I am completely satisfied with my experience and thank you. But there is one thing that is missing in the Android Auto version and it is really needed. Showing the speed limit on the roads. Overall, if you add the mobile experience to Android Auto, it will be amazing. Thanks again.
It's an acceptable navigation app that can help you find your way in crowded streets. PLS more work on your estimated time in routes and improve your GPS tracking software.

Best gps navigation, Accurate and without problems. It has all the warning features, radio music playback, taxi and driving mode, cycling and walking, 2D and 3D capabilities, displaying traffic routes, railways and... Excellent and problem-free speakers with the ability to mention street and alley names, very practical.
This app. is really wonderful and helps the driver to find ; the destination easily .Great thanks for the publishers . And long live ; comrades.
The only problem I can find is that if we want to see the route from another origin (i.e. a place we are not currently at) to the desired destination, it is not possible
This is a really wonderful app. It's a better guide than Maps(Google) or Magic Earth in giving directions, and provides more facilities. Thanks to the developers.

neshan is an efficient and optimized navigator. Please optimize the Android Auto version for use in the car. - Like the mobile version, when approaching an intersection and changing directions, zoom back to make it easier to recognize the route. - The speed limit should also be added next to the map and the speed limit for each road should be shown as a warning - Offline navigation also does not work in the Android Auto version.

The best map & navigation app (even better than Google maps in terms of UI/UX) with some flaws. First, it's not possible to add second or third destination when navigating. Second, it usually doesn't show alternative routes, while Google maps, suggests different routes and you can choose the best one.

GPS signal confusion makes driving very difficult !

It doesn't work well.real time traffic is not accurate.somtimes it makes a mistake in calculating the faster route.in the straight path it navigates in the direction of the traffic light.and the last one, in the new manije speaker, the names of some passages are pronounced incorrectly.

The UX has ways to improve, providing social features for reporting accidents or events, I couldn't find it if they already offer it The routing and timing estimate is rather accurate at least in Tehran, as long as GPS disruption isn't throwing it off. Unlike competitors, Neshan doesn't read the street names out loud, making it hard to use the app through the audio only

Neshan is actually doing a great job. The routes are way more accurate than Google Maps in Iran, especially inside cities. It gives realistic traffic info and doesn‚Äôt randomly take you through confusing alleys. Even the voice guidance feels more natural and timely. Plus, it's clearly made with local needs in mind ‚Äì big thumbs up for that. Honestly, it‚Äôs become my go-to navigation app.

It is an useful app. Thakns. But i think it can be better at calculating the time we predict for going somewhere specilly in heavy traffic. Most of the time, it cant say the real rest of the time. Also the offline map dosnt work at all.

when I'm using the navigation, suddenly it changes the routes and gives a new way to destination, it happens times and times during a short route. on the otwer way, it has good options like police warning on the road, speed limiters warning, parkings, stop stations and etc. not good at all

Route and traffic calculations are awfull even on law traffic days. I have tried the experience from my home to work office and it was funny. At first it gives me a route for example with 40 minutes. I ignored the proposed route and changed my way from another route and suddenly it decreased the estimation to 25 minutes!! It happend almost everytime I use this application

When it comes to tunnels and red lights, the app fails to predict the arrive time accurately. If there's a congestion before and after a tunnel, there must be a congestion all over the tunnel too. You can easily solve this.
very useful and friendly

Read aloud much sooner before the Junctions and the bridges ( that includes left and right) you may play some music when there isn't any quick announces in the way to destination. Please map the shortest distance and less traffic even if it is through the allies. We Iranians appreciate this and use it very much when specially in Tehran.

This app is utterly useless and poorly designed. It constantly chooses the busiest routes, often takes you in the wrong direction, and ends up wasting your time and burning more fuel. The support team clearly couldn‚Äôt care less about users. Thanks to this app, my friend's car got stolen‚Äîjust because it led him to some sketchy, out-of-nowhere location. Installing garbage like this is nothing short of foolish. Avoid it.

In the newer versions,traffic info's is mistake and not show traffic corectly. When see the goofle maps and other gps software in spicific street that have traffic while in this software there arent any traffic! Traffic layout is selected in software also.

This app does not close even by closing the program or pressing the exit button in Notifications, and its service is still running in the background, and it has not solved this problem for a long time, and there is a high possibility that it will use personal data and track the users.

this app is not working properly, I was traveling to other city and useing this app made me lost and also I got forfeit. I want to say to developers that: if you can not design an app which can use probably please stop your job.

It's overall a good navigation app, however I don't like the android auto version, it doesn't have the features that the phone version has, like zooming in and out by speed, showing the speed limit and so on.

Using the Neshan online navigation app has been an exceptional experience. This app ensures a smooth and hassle-free journey by guiding you to your destination with precision and speed. With up-to-date and comprehensive maps and routes, Neshan is your reliable companion for everyday travel. The simple and efficient user interface, along with diverse and accurate features, makes Neshan an indispensable tool for all your navigation needs.

Horrible navigation app. I was trying to go home but it kept giving me the longest most dangerous route because the main road had a checkpoint and it costs money. and it didn't allow me to choose any other route and it put me on a dangerous road. From now on I will be using Google maps.

Exactly useful specially for speed bumps and some important places like gas station in unknown roads and cities. Also we satisfied with radio stations during our long drive in new year holidays üëåJust please setting English character then tourists also will be able use it. Keep going ü§óüòä

Not sure about how it works outside of Iran, but it worked perfectly fine here. Give it a try. Has an offline map feature. Extremely useful for when your internet is dead. (Though it's only available for Iran and a some other countries in West Asia (middle east) like Afghanistan.)
This is good app for use in a hell like iran‚úÖ

I have problem with my car audio android system(brand winca). when I use blutooth music player with neshan app togetter,when I arrive to rumble strip on the road (velocity decreaser), and the app wants to alarm like beeb, suddenly the music stopped. please fix this bug. thank you.

title: Walmart: Shopping & Savings
description: Save money. Live better. The Walmart app is the easiest way to shop for everything on your list, including fresh groceries, household essentials, the latest tech and a lot more. Plus, our convenient pickup, delivery and shipping options make it a breeze to get your order exactly when you want it, whether you‚Äôre shopping online, in-store or on the go. Convenient ways to shop for your items: Pickup üöó Swing by the store to collect your order curbside‚Äîwe‚Äôll even load all your groceries and other items into your car. Delivery üöó From a local store straight to your door. For those need-it-now moments, choose Express delivery to get your order in as fast as one hour.* *Restrictions and fees apply. Shipping üöó Fast two-day shipping, dropped off by FedEx or UPS. Eligible orders over $35 ship free! Even more time-saving features you‚Äôll love: Home VR üöó New! View furniture and decor in your space before you buy it. Personalized online shopping suggestions üöó Quickly and easily fill your cart with frequently purchased items and groceries. Easy barcode scanning üöó Check prices and build your shopping lists with the item barcode scanner. Stress-free store pickup üöó Check in with the Walmart app when you‚Äôre on your way to the store and we‚Äôll bring your order out to you when it‚Äôs ready for pickup. Real-time order tracking üöó Get live order updates sent straight to your phone and easily track order status any time from the homepage. Walmart Pay üöó Check out with the app in-store using all your payment methods. Just tap ‚ÄúPay‚Äù and we‚Äôll recommend how to split your total to make the most of your cards and balances. Store maps üöó Find all your favorite items quickly with store maps and save time shopping for groceries and essentials when you visit a Walmart store. Pharmacy üöó Refill, transfer, manage and pick up your family‚Äôs prescriptions. Plus, schedule vaccinations, locate testing sites and more. Meet Walmart+ The Walmart app is the easiest way to get the most out of your membership and save more time and money. App-exclusive features for Walmart+ include: Scan & go üöó Use your phone to shop for groceries and more in-store and check out contact-free. Member prices on fuel Get up to 10¬¢ off every gallon at 14,000+ locations nationwide**‚Äîincluding Exxon and Mobil stations! **Fuel discount varies by location and station, subject to change. Meet Sparky Use your AI-powered shopping assistant to find what you need faster, get recommendations, and shop smarter. Shop with Sparky Ask your AI-powered shopping assistant anything to find what you need faster, get recommendations, and shop smarter.
