scraped_reviews.content: Everybody already knows about Walmart. It's WM. This is the Sigmon Rd store so its the oldest, but not as dirty and run down as it could be. So thats good. They NEED to make it so you can put your phone number into the regular registers as well as the self checkouts and the app. I don't go there everyday, I go once every two weeks, once a week if I MUST. Its BS that we can't get credit for WM cash or use said WM cash because we have more than 15 items. I'll add stars once they fix that.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Your experience is important, and we'd like to look into this. Please DM us @walmart on IG with your contact details.

scraped_reviews.content: I have had this app for many years, it has just gotten worse. I even bought Walmart plus, which I used and started using it for deliveries and subscriptions. Which worked for a while, missing items here or there along with poor quality items like bad chicken or produce, the expired items with sale sticker peeled off and charged full price. And then my delivery and subscriptions were not getting delivered on scheduled days or times. Brought on different days even early when I wasn't home. Cancel
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Let us look into this for you! DM us on IG @Walmart with your order details, and we'll assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: Don't know why they make it close to impossible and so difficult to add product reviews. You should be able to search only in store items when in store mode and quickly try to locate something. half the produce doesn't have anything you can scan so you have to search by name which is searching all of Walmart making it difficult. I'm just trying to buy a tomato and can't. always one barrier after another while shopping.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd like to take this discussion further to our DM's in order to have a more detailed one, Sam. Kindly connect with us at https://www.walmart.com/help

scraped_reviews.content: Ordering groceries online shouldn't be this much of a hassle. Requesting a refund is like pulling teeth. They deliver spoiled or damaged items, and when you tell them about it, they act like it's YOUR fault. It's annoying. Also, why does Walmart put a temporary hold fee on items that are substituted if the price of the substituted items is LOWER than the original item. Yes, I understand if the items cost more than the original item, but if it costs less it shouldn't need a temporary hold.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We hear you, Our team is on the case, tracking down. Please contact us at https://walmrt.us/428bffR.

scraped_reviews.content: buggy, missing critical features, doesn't show fees that you are being charged. I thought it might be better than the Walmart website, but it's worse, I was specifically on the lookout for the below minimum order fee, but it's not there, they charge you for things they don't tell you about until you see your receipt after you've already paid, and then they try to route your customer support through AI before you finally wrestle your way through it to get to someone who is not allowed to help.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Our goal is to make your experience as seamless as possible. To help us enhance our services, we kindly request that you share more details through the following survey link: https://survey.walmart.com/app

scraped_reviews.content: It's hard to shop for groceries unless you have a complete list and search exactly what you're looking for item by item. Then the same "sponsored" products show up so much that you can't seem to find anything. Payment never goes through the first time, so I end up with multiple holds on my account for a week or more because my bank is waiting for Walmart to finish all those charges. I need the convenience of delivery with my weird schedule, but they really make it difficult.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your experience, Amber. For quicker help, feel free to DM us @walmart on IG or @walmarthelp on X. Also, you can share detailed thoughts here: https://survey.walmart.com/app-

scraped_reviews.content: I would give a 5, but you fall short of it because I had so many issues with items being missing, and a couple of times, my ENTIRE order. That hasn't happened since I started selecting the option that requires a code from me. The problem with that, which is why I said 4 stars instead of 5, is that I shouldn't HAVE to do that. I understand mistakes happen, but not 9 out of 10 orders consistently. Overall, I'm grateful for this service, as I'm older, and this is much easier and convenient for me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate you bringing this to our attention. Every order should be right the first time! Drop us a DM @walmart on our IG, so we can discuss this further with you. For App related issues, share your thoughts on: https://survey.walmart.com/app

scraped_reviews.content: The stock information for in store products has been wrong on multiple occasions. The isle information is sometimes wrong. I don't see a way to leave a review on a product I decided to return. The review interface says I have no products to review! I do like using it to pay when I forget my wallet at stores that don't accept tap yet! when the isle information is correct it saves me walking around looking for items. So 2 ‚≠ê instead of 1!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your experience with us. We‚Äôre sorry you‚Äôve had issues with product availability within the Walmart app. Please contact us at walmart.com/help.

scraped_reviews.content: generally a good app, easy to use, etc. but the $7 fee for ordering anything below $35 is so silly. that's not even a shipping fee since it's for pickup orders as well. numerous times I've just decided to shop elsewhere if I only need a few things and don't want to spend an additional $7 on nothing. if it was a shipping fee or something I'd understand but its literally just a "you didn't spend enough money" fee and thats crazy lol
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Appreciate you sharing your thoughts‚Äîif you'd like to see updates to how fees work, you can share more at https://walmrt.us/3H3anl4.

scraped_reviews.content: I mainly use this app for walmart pay. That's because Walmart doesn't use tap to pay, and their card readers usually have issues reading the chip on my card. Regardless, the app is always very slow to load, which adds friction to the experience (enough that i hate to use it, but have to because of the card reader issues). I also don't like that when you offer groceries, not everything physically in the store is presented in the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We hear you! Try closing and reopening the app, clearing the cache, and updating to the latest version for better performance. Share your experience with us on: https://walmrt.us/4lNQBIP

scraped_reviews.content: This is the worst app I've ever dealt with. Between the crashing and constant "technical issue" and "no internet" pop-ups, it is a huge pain. And the same thing has happened when I lived in a different state with different phones and different, very reliable ISPs, so the issue is definitely not on my end. You'd think with the amount of money Walmart makes, they could afford to offer a better, more reliable app, but I guess the executives only care about their own profits.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd like to look into this for you, Karen. Please contact us at walmart.com/help

scraped_reviews.content: it's a little awkward to navigate. Instacart and Amazon are more streamlined and user friendly. The savings with Walmart are better though, but, for example, many items are unavailable, or only available through shipping. I am using the app for grocery shopping though, so it would be helpful if items available for delivery would be separated when searching. I'm offered dozens of options for ice cream, but dozens of them aren't available at my store. I always end up with a replacement.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Clarity matters! Check your location settings and filter by ‚ÄúPickup & Delivery‚Äù to see only items available at your local store. You can also sort by ‚ÄúIn Stock‚Äù to help avoid unavailable options. More insights can be shared on: https://survey.walmart.com/app

scraped_reviews.content: First off, back to having problems with connecting in stores. Pretty much forced to sign into Walmarts Wi-Fi - which is unsecured despite the never ending steps being required to sign in. I should be able to use my phone data if I please. Second, a company as big as Walmart and you can't manage a basic feature like dark mode in your app? Unacceptable. Third, lists are constantly glitching out, and the lack of organization to help with shopping is disappointing to say the least.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your experience. Reach out via DM @walmart on IG so our team can look into these app issues with you.

scraped_reviews.content: I hate this app! As a senior citizen I rely on the services they offer, but no matter how many times I update, it's always crashing; sometimes within minutes. It's often inaccurate w/in-stock & item location within the store. Frustrating! Get your act together Walmart! Survey? I don't know how much more detailed or explicit I can be. If you can't glean from my comment where the problems lie, then it explains why there are ongoing problems that are never addressed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre eager to understand your experience better. Please offer more details by completing our survey at https://survey.walmart.com/app

scraped_reviews.content: NEVER use Walmart for groceries if you're looking to cook at home. They rarely have everything they say it's in stock. Also, the fact that you cannot add an item in the cart when it's unavailable is beyond me when the item is available an hour later. The substitution options are limited to whatever the shopper decides. If you pick your own it doesn't matter. I always have to drive to King Kullen to get what's missing from my recipe and it's always something important. 2 stars because... Cheap
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We aim to improve stock accuracy and substitution options for a better experience. If you‚Äôd like to share more, we‚Äôre here to assist! https://www.walmart.com/help

scraped_reviews.content: I wanted to put an order in, but when I went to My Lists, I was missing a few. It only says I have 2 Lists, but, it does not show them, and there's nothing to click on to bring them up. One of those lists had $700 worth of items I buy regularly. Some were recipes. I even went into the purchase history, and all my purchases are gone too. This is frustrating.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We value your concern and are here to assist you. Please feel free to reach out to us at https://www.walmart.com/help for further support.

scraped_reviews.content: Edit: Happened again, their solution? Give them your email or phone number so you can use their wifi and they get to use your data. Awful fix. Sick of having to get a cart full of groceries only to waste my time and not be able to pay for them. I just left. Was about to pay for my groceries and walmart app went down for the whole store. Couldnt even pay for anything and i had a cart full and didnt have any other means to pay. The time when i really needed it, it failed me.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Let‚Äôs get it sorted, Oscar! DM us @Walmart on IG with your contact details, and we‚Äôll assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: Real nice the way you'll accept payment for orders and if $25 worth of it wasn't available you get to hang onto the $25 for up to 10 business days. If you can take payment within minutes you should be able to return the money for the goods that were unavailable (even though they're listed as available and you accept payment for them) within a reasonable time. Up to 10 business days to return the money not right. Makes me never want to use Walmart delivery for groceries ever again. I want my $$$$

Update: The app let's you shop for items that are unavailable. Example, for some items, it will not even label it low in stock so you can be prepared, if the item becomes unavailable. Old: I tried to ship an item that is available for shipping and gift eligible, but the app wasn't working properly. So, when I went to view cart to select "item is a gift" so I can complete my purchase, the app kept defaulting a a pick up order that I already placed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd like to look further into this for you, Kathy. Please contact us at walmart.com/help

scraped_reviews.content: Subscriptions are great. However, when you're trying to place a separate order, which it won't let you do because it says there is an error, it actually keeps telling you that it's adding to your subscription delivery. Despite what I attempted, it keeps adding the items to the subscription order. I need the items today. I am disabled and it's very difficult for me to walk around the store. I would really love to place an order for today. For curbside, pickup, please correct this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Ensuring your satisfaction is our top priority, and we're dedicated to providing excellent service. If you have any concerns, please reach out to us via walmart.com/help, and our team will assist you promptly.

scraped_reviews.content: Searching for items outside of the grocery store has become a nightmare. For example, I searched for a 100-piece Christmas jigsaw puzzle. The first item was one with 1,000 pieces. I had made no typos in my inquiry. The whole selection was a motley mix of puzzle sizes. Next, I looked for large-print Christmas puzzle books. Again, I received choices of many items completely unrelated to puzzle books: Bibles, novels, & jigsaw puzzles. After a half dozen searches, I went to Amazon to buy gifts.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Your experience is important to us, we'd like to look into this for you, Susan. Please contact us at walmart.com/help

scraped_reviews.content: If you don't want produce, meat, or eggs this app is great. If you want any of those things they will always give you spoiled/damaged products. I gave this app a half a dozen tries, every time I just had to throw those things away, go up to the store again, and spend even more money. Once or twice I can forgive, but in the end it just costs me way too much time and money, and I don't have a lot of of either of those things. edit: I'm not signing up and downloading "X" to solve your screw up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Clint, the goal is always to provide fresh and high-quality items with every order! Please DM your details to us on our X @walmarthelp, and we‚Äôll investigate further.

scraped_reviews.content: Still getting used to Shopping with the Walmart app. You have to watch it very closely, because even if you select local pickup (and your specific store) it constantly promotes shipping items that are anywhere from 2day to 10 days or more. Delivery is an upcharge, even if you are W+ member, depending on location and time of day. i wish it would tell you the Aisle location, when you are just trying to look up items, before walking in a store. Add aisle locations, please!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your input, Cathy! To help us improve, please share your thoughts with us in our survey at https://survey.walmart.com/app

scraped_reviews.content: I love buying my stuff at Walmart online shopping. It's no walking, hassle-free and no lines. Using the app is very easy and simple to find what you are looking for. But my only problem with it, it that there is a ton of out of stock products. Other that, It's ideal to shop based upon the low prices. I gave them a four star instead of a five star rating because of the out-of-stock issues. Thanks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're always looking to enhance our service for you, Ricky. Please reach out to https://survey.walmart.com/app with more details.

scraped_reviews.content: Why do you have the same items appear in search results over and over AND OVER AND OVER AGAIN, making scrolling to browse a literal nightmare? If i skipped over once, the product won't entice the next time, let alone the 4TH/5th TIME!!! Once in a while it's because they are ads, but majority is just a useless interface making browsing for a specific item a MENTAL HELL. Also, so sick of thr irrelevant items! Stress to shop? No, thanks!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your detailed input! Your points about duplicate listings and irrelevant results are valuable. If you'd like to share more, you can reach out here: https://survey.walmart.com/app

scraped_reviews.content: my only complaint is i wish i could search my purchase history, so i could easily buy items again. unless you happen to remember the exact name of an item, it won't show up. for example, i bought 1 trash can last year. if i search "trash can," every single purchase ive ever made shows up in the results as opposed to the one purchase that actually contains the item I'm looking for.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for sharing your thoughts, Sara. Great suggestion on adding a more specific purchase history search. Feel free to share more ideas here: https://survey.walmart.com/app.

scraped_reviews.content: Ridiculous. Forcing ppl to download an app to simply pickup an order is dumb. Went into the store to pickup & associate said I needed to go back to my vehicle, download the app. Showed up, tried to check in on the app. The only parking spots to choose from are ones with cars already parked at them. There is no way to type in a spot number, have to select it. Waited for 30 minutes & then left without the order. App is trash.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We regret the inconvenience you faced while trying to pick up your order. We‚Äôd like to know the details of the problem you mentioned. Please provide more information at https://survey.walmart.com/app.

scraped_reviews.content: The inconsistent prices from one store to another are frustrating enough on their own, but when you add in the fact that they have the exact same thing from some random supplier at some crazy ridiculous price it makes you wonder why. Well, good luck getting a straight answer! Apparently, the app is a whole completely separate entity from the store, and they don't talk to each other!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're here to address this for you, Amanda. Please contact us at walmart.com/help

scraped_reviews.content: when you're looking at products, they charge you a different price for ordering online. but they're showing you the in-store price, so when you are interested in the item, they switch the price to an 'online price' this is bait and switch and I wish Walmart could get SUED for wasting my time. Walmart and Amazon must be in cahoots because I need the real pricing UPFRONT. not on the next page. sometimes Amazon doesn't even show a price until you press the item . stop the greed already.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your input! We'll work on making this a smoother experience. Please share your thoughts with us at: https://survey.walmart.com/app

scraped_reviews.content: Constant issues with the delivery service as well as the app. Rarely get whole orders, often get random/damaged items, and that's IF it even shows at the right address. Lost orders, poorly updated availability, substitutions or more often items get canceled without any attempt to substitute, promo codes given to make up or replace often don't work. Paying the additional cost of express doesn't guarantee speedy delivery. Received a sample pack with a severe allergic reaction. Avoid if possible.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Let‚Äôs work together to resolve this, John! DM us on IG @Walmart with your order details, and we‚Äôll help out.

scraped_reviews.content: Have loved this app since 2020 and used it weekly. Recently, when I place an order, the items from the My Items section are missing the add button. The item is in stock but I have to click into the product page and add it which is time consuming when I'm placing a large order. IF the add button is visible, it no longer allows me to add multiples of the item like it did before. The entire point and the reason I have used this app for the last 4 years is because of how fast and convenient it WAS.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Brittany, we understand how important convenience is, and we‚Äôll look into this issue. Kindly share more details at: https://www.walmart.com/help

scraped_reviews.content: I've loved this app, especially how easy it makes pick up. Unfortunately, the new update has some glitches in it. First being, I'm no longer offered the "I'm on my way" or "I'm here" so I now have to flag down am employee to let them know I'm here for pick up. Secondly, when there is an unavailable item that it says it can ship, and I click my address, it doesn't do anything. Therefore I can get my unavailable item to ship... PLEASE FIX THESE ISSUES!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate you letting us know! Please DM us @walmarthelp on X or @walmart on IG so we can assist you directly.

scraped_reviews.content: I'm changing my review to three stars. In the last 4 months, I am no longer able to use the scan and go feature at my neighborhood Walmart. It requires an associate to finish the purchase, and then completely voids my shopping cart. This means that I have to remove absolutely all my groceries from their bags, and scan them a second time through the self-checkout. Now the same thing is happening at the nearest supercenter every 4th or 5th shopping trip. This needs to be fixed.

The "in store" toggle is no longer working, showing me items that are in stock right now at my selected store. Perhaps they did this for the holidays to sell more stuff or trick people into buying something they wanted to go get at their store right now. Either way, their app still is much worse than Ebay or Amazon with much worse descriptions of items, and always has been. Now you do not allow me to search only my store. The button is broken or dishonestly disabled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre always working to improve, Jared! Being able to search in-store items is essential. If you‚Äôd like to provide more details, feel free to reach out at https://survey.walmart.com/app

scraped_reviews.content: I've been unable to order anything for a week. Trying the app, the website on my phone, the website on my computer, nothing. I'm constantly getting "There was an error with your cart. Please refresh the page." every time I try to order something. The Buy Now option is also not working. Contacted support, and they said a completely separate team needed to be involved in solving this issue. This is terrible for business, and I hope it is fixed soon.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôre here for you. Please reach out at https://www.walmart.com/help, so we can help resolve this.

scraped_reviews.content: If I didn't have to rely on this for food delivery, I wouldn't bother with this app. It's poorly designed, filled with bugs, false advertising, and changing prices, and the sheer number of times it's refused my payment info despite confirming everything is in working order with my bank, and triple checking that I have enough money to cover my orders, is too damned high. It would be easier to count the number of times everything went smoothly and I had no issues with my order(s).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd like to review this further. Please DM us on IG @Walmart with your contact details, and we'll assist. You can also share your input here: https://walmrt.us/49FkVTl to help us improve.

scraped_reviews.content: There's a very dishonest, deceptive business practice the Walmart app has tricked me with twice now. The app shows a particular item with a reduced price, available only by shipping. To avoid shipping charges, you are required to spend $35. Hours after ordering that and additional items to receive free shipping, Walmart CANCELLED the items that were reduced in price. It seems obvious that they lure you with the low prices just to pull the rug out from under you at the last moment. IT SUCKS!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate you sharing this with us. Let's connect over DM on IG @walmart, so we can work to address your concerns.

scraped_reviews.content: app no longer displays images in listings. you have to click the "image" that doesn't show up, and when it enlarges you can see it. useless. how can you shop when you can't easily view the item? and yes, i uninstalled and reinstalled the app. and it still happens. even restarted the phone multiple times. this has been ongoing for at least a month. i was just dealing with it at first but when you do a lot of your grocery organizing using the app, it really f+cks you over.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd like to look further into this for you. Please DM us @Walmart on IG with your contact details, and we'll help you.

scraped_reviews.content: Could use some tweaking. Generally works pretty well, but sometimes it does some things that just make you go "Whaaaaat?" Items that are in your favorites randomly may or may not have an "add to cart" button. If not, you must go to the item description where there is a button, but returning from there does not take you back where you were in the list! You have to start all over and scroll back down to find where you were. Items are listed as "In Stock", but when you add to your cart...NOPE!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Help us enhance your experience. Share your thoughts here: https://walmrt.us/3WAsDGR

scraped_reviews.content: Eh. I love having my grocery shopping online. But I would like to be able to browse. This site is not set up to browse groceries. It is set up to browse other items to compete with Amazon. Not only can I not browse but when I look something up, random things that do not match a search appear and things that match don't come up but are shown under other categories. and just because it is a computer that can keep real time inventory don't expect them to have what they say is in stock. Expect subs
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Finding the right items fast matters, and we‚Äôre working to make grocery browsing smoother. Try using the Filter by ‚ÄúGrocery,‚Äù sort by ‚ÄúIn Stock,‚Äù or try the app. DM us on IG @walmart for help, and share more input on: https://walmrt.us/4qPCI0m

scraped_reviews.content: App is constantly showing no connection, although I have great internet service. Has been happening for over a year. I used to do pick-up orders at least once a week, but over the past year I may get one order a month that I can actually complete. I just shop at the competitor's stores instead. I have given up on the glitches in the app being corrected. Canceled my Walmart+ membership today because its irrelevant now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Let‚Äôs get this sorted out for you. Please send us a DM @walmart on IG.

scraped_reviews.content: Compare prices!! Walmart is charging more for certain items online than in store. Groceries, clothes, tools, and toys. Shopping online is no longer the best way to save money. It may only be a quarter difference, but im sure its more depending on the item. Be attentive with frequently bought items as well, sometimes they'll charge you an extra 10 cents just because we're all in a hurry these days and probably wont notice.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for pointing that out. Online and in-store prices can vary depending on promotions. Share your thoughts on: https://walmrt.us/3LvHJuY

scraped_reviews.content: App shows one price in cart and charges your credit card at different price. Near impossible to find customer service. The confirmation emails do not give you details of what was charged or why. It can't be used as a receipt. Walmart + is not worth it. It just adds more faults to the app and more things to be disappointed with. Deliveries are almost constantly delayed and often canceled at the last minute. Despite claims of free shipping sometimes extra shipping charges are applied.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôd like to help sort this out. DM us @Walmart on IG with your contact details so we can review this for you.

scraped_reviews.content: App filters stopped working. Filtered for women's socks available in store today and got a random showing of fashion items for shipping, for men and children. Fail. No way to create a favorites list of groceries. No way to create a shopping list for when you are going to the store. No categories for browsing, just a search box. Search results are often too long, full of non-relevant results, like searching for organic milk yields non-organic items as well as non-milk items.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We‚Äôd like to get this checked. Send us a DM on IG @Walmart with your contact details, and we‚Äôll look into it.

scraped_reviews.content: FIX THE DAMN APP ALREADY! There's a reoccurring problem of items being listed as out of stock when they aren't. I don't mean one particular item or brand but entire categories of products. Currently butter, milk, eggs, cheese and bread are listed as out of stock. All brands, all varieties and all sizes are listed as out of stock on the app but the store is fully stocked. This happens at least twice a month and usually lasts for several days at a time. This shouldn't be such a constant problem.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate you letting us know about this. Try clearing the app cache or updating to the latest version, then refresh your location settings. If the issue continues, sign out and back in or reinstall the app. DM us on IG @walmart for any further help. Fill a survey for us to enhance the app on: https://walmrt.us/4nyjn0P

scraped_reviews.content: I've enjoyed walmarts app well enough. I have ordered 10s of $1000 from both Amazon and Walmart and Walmart is repeatedly lower priced plus you can return items back in store which is a huge plus most of the time. As far as the app, for some reason, at least on my account, the number of items I can store in my lists is limiting as I have filled that and can no longer add more items unless I start a specific registry in which I am required to add a event date and occasion. Wish his were fixed!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We value your experience and want to make it better. Please share more details here: https://walmrt.us/4hVdBFC

scraped_reviews.content: The app works fine and it's easy to navigate. I definitely love not having to go into Walmart to go shopping. It's usually way overcrowded with people who forgot their manners at home. My two biggest complaints would be that the members price on fuel should not be so hard to find when purchasing gas. It should be right on the front page and easily accessible without having to go looking down menus. The other thing would be to hire delivery drivers that speak English.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We want to help you out. Please provide us with more information by completing our survey: https://walmrt.us/47MUvga

scraped_reviews.content: I'm especially annoyed at the moment because this app keeps forcing me to have products delivered from the store instead of shipped, even though they NEVER have what I need. This also forces me to tip on the highest total possible. The W+ was supposed to save me money, not cost me more! I know I can cancel the tip, but it's not my shopper's fault. They're pulling all those items and lugging them to my door - I'm not gonna penalize them for the way you've chosen to make your app function. Boo!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Noted! Try checking if the app‚Äôs delivery settings are set to ‚ÄúShipping‚Äù instead of ‚ÄúDelivery‚Äù to avoid in-store only options. Also, confirm your cart items are eligible for shipping, as some items may require store fulfillment. Help us enhance the app by sharing more info on: https://walmrt.us/3Xqaiwp

scraped_reviews.content: UPDATE: 3 years later and usability has not improved. My order is instantly cancelled for no reason, even using multiple payment methods. Inexcusable. ORIGINAL: Useful as a store companion app. Unfortunately, when you order something for home delivery, they don't alert you if the seller is international, and provide completely unrealistic shipping estimates. YunExpress is supposed to get a parcel to me in the same window as a domestic order? Fat chance.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Your insights are crucial for our continuous improvement. Please reach out to https://survey.walmart.com/app with more details.

scraped_reviews.content: The app doesn't keep correct count of the inventory from the Walmart you were shopping from. Almost every single order I've ever placed has had something that has been substituted or just flat out not been available after I have planned a meal or snacks for the family. Though you can put in substitutions before you place the order you can't always do it afterwards. This seems to be mostly true for quick delivery which you pay extra for.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for letting us know! Try checking the app for updates or clearing the cache to ensure more accurate availability before placing an order. If the issue remains the same, DM us @walmart on IG for quick fix.

title: Wells Fargo Mobile¬Æ
description:
Account Management
‚Ä¢Access your cash, credit, and investment accounts with Fingerprint Sign On¬π or Biometric Sign on¬π
‚Ä¢Review activity and balances
‚Ä¢View your credit card transactions and manage your rewards
‚Ä¢Easily activate or turn cards on or off¬≤, add cards to digital wallets¬≥, view recurring payments, and manage account access with Card Settings

Deposit Funds‚Å¥
‚Ä¢Deposit checks using your Android‚Ñ¢ camera 
‚Ä¢Instantly view the processing deposit in your account

Make Transfers and Payments
‚Ä¢Transfer funds between your Wells Fargo accounts and to other financial institutions‚Åµ
‚Ä¢Send and receive money with friends and family using a U.S. mobile phone number or email address with Zelle¬Æ‚Å∂
‚Ä¢Pay your bills

Track Investments
‚Ä¢Monitor balances, holdings, account activity, and open orders for your WellsTrade¬Æ accounts
‚Ä¢Get real-time quotes, charts, and market data

Stay Secure
‚Ä¢Visit the Security Center to report fraud and maintain safe accounts
‚Ä¢Manage alerts‚Å∑
‚Ä¢Get notified of suspicious card activity with alerts
‚Ä¢Access to your FICO¬Æ Credit Score

Contact Us
‚Ä¢Email appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com
‚Ä¢Locate one of more than 12,700 ATMs or find one of our approximately 4,800 branches
‚Ä¢Set up an appointment to meet with a Banker
____________________________
Screens are simulated.
1.Only certain devices are eligible to enable Fingerprint Sign On or Biometric Sign On.
2.Turning your card off is not a replacement for reporting your card lost or stolen. 
3.Not all smartphones are enabled to use a digital wallet. Your mobile carrier's message and data rates may apply.
4.Some accounts are not eligible for mobile deposit. Deposit limits and other restrictions apply.
5.Terms and conditions apply. See Wells Fargo‚Äôs Online Access Agreement for more information.
6. Mobile numbers may need to be enrolled with Zelle¬Æ before they can be used. Available to U.S.-based bank account holders only. 
7.Sign-up may be required. 
8.Some features not offered on all devices or to all users.

Android, Google Play, Chrome, Pixel and other marks are trademarks of Google LLC.

FICO is a registered trademark of Fair Isaac Corporation in the United States and other countries.

Zelle¬Æ and the Zelle¬Æ related marks are wholly owned by Early Warning Services, LLC and are used herein under license.

Investment and Insurance Products are:
‚Ä¢Not Insured by the FDIC or Any Federal Government Agency
‚Ä¢Not a Deposit or Other Obligation of, or Guaranteed by, the Bank or Any Bank Affiliate
‚Ä¢Subject to Investment Risks, Including Possible Loss of the Principal Amount Invested

DEPOSIT PRODUCTS OFFERED BY WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A. MEMBER FDIC.

Investment products and services are offered through Wells Fargo Advisors. Wells Fargo Advisors is a trade name used by Wells Fargo Clearing Services, LLC (WFCS) and Wells Fargo Advisors Financial Network, LLC, Members SIPC, separate registered broker-dealers and non-bank affiliates of Wells Fargo & Company. WellsTrade(R) and Intuitive Investor(R) accounts are available through WFCS.

Use of stock symbols is for illustrative purposes only and not a recommendation.

9.$0 per trade is applicable to commissions for online and automated telephone trading of stocks and exchange-traded funds (ETFs). For stock and ETF trades placed with an agent over the telephone, a $25 agent-assisted trading fee is charged. Each trade order will be treated as a separate transaction subject to commission. An order that executes over multiple trading days may be subject to additional commission. One commission will be assessed for multiple trades, entered separately, that execute on the same day, on the same side of the market. Other fees and commissions apply to a WellsTrade account. Schedule subject to change at any time.

summary: Wells Fargo Mobile allows you to access your investment and bank accounts.

scraped_reviews.content: Kind of getting tired of how long it takes the App to process payments. It's in the account, money is accounted for, both deposits AND transactions but the App is constantly like "I'll get around to those pendings one of these days." If that could be tightened up a bit, it'd be a 5 star app. Good way to get people to miscalculate how much money they have so you can get them to overdraw.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that and want to look further into this. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Hanj

scraped_reviews.content: I hate it. The app feels designed to make you overspend. Balances jump around with no logic. I make a full payment, spend $100, and suddenly owe $500 five days later. Even after all charges post, you can‚Äôt tell what‚Äôs actually included in your payment, so you think you‚Äôve paid in full and then get hit with another $400 bill. It‚Äôs impossible to budget, like trying to balance a checkbook in the dark.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Irina. Knowing the status of your balance can help to provide peace of mind. So that a banker can review this and assist you, call 1-800-642-4720 (24 hours, 7 days a week). If you'd like us to research this issue email us with the details, phone #, link to this comment, and your reviewer name at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. -Odalys

scraped_reviews.content: The app is really slow to update your info. So while it says certain payments go through on both Paypal AND Wells Fargo, I get charged for those payments two or more days later. After doing the math and being told by the app itself that the charge already went through. Get y'all's act together, I'm kinda tired of losing money from you and preparing to leave as we speak. Update: Did it again. a transaction that withdrew funds didn't count as "approved" until 7 days later. I paid for it outright.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Mary

scraped_reviews.content: Latest updates have made it much harder to deposit checks through the app. I often use echecks to print and deposit my payments but now I always get hit with "we're having trouble processing your photos". This has worked fine for years until about a month ago. Now I have to work trips to physical branches during business hours into my schedule because of these changes on the back end
scraped_reviews.replyContent: It's important that we have better insight on these technical issues regarding mobile check deposits so that we can work hard to improve them and the app all together. If you'd like us to research this issue email us with the details, phone #, link to this comment, and your reviewer name at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. -Odalys

scraped_reviews.content: Just use the website. the only reason I switched to the App was to stop getting the "why not use the App" pop up every time I used the website, but the App has SO MANY MORE POP-UPS. Not ads, just "Tips" and extra pages. It has useless notifications and, of course, an AI that doesn't ever provide actual help or answer questions. It's not a bad App, but you'll at least double the amount of clicking you need to do to get anything done.

This app was perfectly fine up until the last update. I'm not sure what happened, or if it doesn't support Samsung products, but I can no longer sign onto the app. Whenever I log in it shows the error message of "Your sign on cannot be completed at this time", but the website works just fine. If I wasn't on the go nearly all of the time, that might be fine to have to stop and open a browser and then put all my info in. I'm considering switching banks now, this is kind of pathetic.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. You can also reach out to our specialists anytime at 1-800-956-4442. Thanks. -Ludwicke

scraped_reviews.content: The app stopped working a month or two ago. I have the same issues as everyone else. Login rarely works. When it does, the app gets stuck on a white screen, or kicks me out again. I emailed support, they told me to call the 800 number (like all the other reviewers here). I called that but gave up after 2.5 minutes of their automated phone maze. "Press 1 for.... press 2 for.... sorry, I didn't quite catch that..." I'm just going to stick with the website for now. Hopefully they fix the app eventually.

Edit: Newest update makes it worse! I can't get to my bill pay section on my phone. Fix it or loose customers! Every time I log in, I get a message saying the log in failed, then about 1-2 seconds later I am logged in with no further action on my part. There are ads that mask as "offers," it is much harder to search transactions now. The update solved no known problems and feels like an over simplistic version of itself. On the plus side...the details of each transaction are easier to read.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will consider your feedback seriously in planning future improvements and share it with our mobile team. -Richard

scraped_reviews.content: Generally takes 3-4 times to get this app to work. Takes multiple sign-on's. Sometimes it open to blank screen, other times to account summary but when you click on account get an error, other times get an error just signing on. Used to be great. Since the app was updated it has been painful. I neglect my accounts. I have also tried Uninstalling and reinstalling several time over the past few months. This doesn't help.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry for the inconvenience. Please try uninstalling and reinstalling the app. If you need additional help, call us at 1-800-956-4442. Thank you. -Ronnie

scraped_reviews.content: For the size of the corporation it's an ok app. When you log in (at least half the time) it takes you to update our phone numbers instead of straight to accounts. The numbers are correct, nothing to change, have been asked a million times. Now, for at least a couple weeks, not only does it make me take this dumb pointless step, it locks up and I have to force stop, etc. I need my balances quickly. It happens so much I am leaving this review bc there is nowhere for feedback (imagine that).
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the trouble. Please email us the details (with your phone number, link to this public comment, and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share account numbers. -Suzette

scraped_reviews.content: So, yes. The new app is horrifying. I hadn't thought about coming here to add my review and when I did, I see that I'm not alone. All my relevant information is gone (like the checks tab) for example. It appears all transactions are jammed together on an endless list that you can't scroll through since it will glitch up and down on you. Who in their right mind thought, "Hey, this is perfect, let's release it"? I can't even imagine.

I was able to keep myself and account in check more better with the older version. All transactions would appear. I have over drafted my account 3x this week due to this error. Yes, I need to balance better, my fault. However, I haven't overdrafted 3x in a week with the other version. I thought it was my math until I realized it was the update causing me issues. No longer can rely on the app like I had for years.

Not happy with the most recent update! When viewing your accounts and the purchase history you now have to click on each one to see where it is from as it says "purchase".... Also everything is much bigger now. I like the way the old app showed it all. Much more easier to view everything! Fix this immediately. I may just have to switch to my other bank for my main banking needs!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thanks for providing this feedback. We will be sure to share it with the Mobile team as they do appreciate insight on your mobile experience. Thanks again. -Juju

scraped_reviews.content: Dont even attempt to respond to my review telling me to contact you! Your latest update SUCKS so bad, fix it! The whole point of online banking is to be able to see your account. I have to use biometrics twice in a row to log in, and whenever I try to check my account, it says something went wrong on your side. No kidding, something went wrong! I'm already frustrated account changes were made without any notification, and now this. You need to do better, or I'm definitely switching banks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with more details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. You may also call us at 1-800-956-4442. -Hirro

scraped_reviews.content: Compared to other banks, this is one of the easiest apps to deposit checks. The auto focus for taking pics of checks is great. The only improvement that needs to be made is giving us the option to confirm the deposit amount when the hand writing cannot not be read by the app. Rather than not allow the deposit at all, please just add that extra step to the process just as your ATM does. Thanks. Also, would you at least put one ATM back in Colbert County for cash deposits?!? We really need one!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Tori. We're sorry to hear that and would like to try to help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. Thank you. -Ludwicke

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love the app, it was quick and easy to use. Now, I have to enter my password, then enter it again, and then enter some stupid captcha thing, all to get in to see my balance. It's annoying. I have a 16 letter/number password. There is NOTHING quick and easy about entering it multiple times, and then still having to screw around looking at stupid dancing letters. I highly suggest you figure out how to go back to having a quick and easy app, because I know I am not the only one annoyed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there, thanks for providing this feedback. We will be sure to share it with the Mobile team as they do appreciate insight on your mobile experience. Thanks again. -Nicole

scraped_reviews.content: Newest update is awful. Hate it. I need to login 2x before I can even get to the account summary page. If I try to see more details of a specific account, it'll automatically log me out and tell me there was an error. I can't check my accounts or make transfers without this error happening every time or having to login in several times. I also don't feel like you get as much info about your account or its not as easily broken down anymore to know exactly whats going on with your money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: If you're experiencing access issues, please call us at 1-800-956-4442 for technical assistance. Otherwise, please email us with the details of your issue (phone number, link to this public comment, and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. -Serge

scraped_reviews.content: The new app is awful!! I have to set my phone font to the smallest font to see the details. Unless I click in each transaction. I really dislike this new format. It I turn my phone sideways you can scroll down the list of transactions but not up (just brings up the search bar). Super frustrating app!! Bring back the older version. I would like to see the entire transaction name without changing the phone font.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will consider your feedback seriously in planning future improvements and share it with our mobile team. -Richard

scraped_reviews.content: Over the past months I've experienced nothing but trouble with this app! It crashes and I have to login 4 times before it loads. Then of course they have things pop up to where it freezes the app! Why they "updated" it is beyond me. I used to be able to get logged in and do what I needed to in a matter of minutes. Now I'm just constantly fighting with it. Seriously needs to be fixed. It's a banking app that doesn't let you bank.....
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. You can also reach out to our specialists anytime at 1-800-956-4442. -Ludwicke

scraped_reviews.content: Latest update is less user-friendly and has multiple glitches on my android phone. For example, I constantly have to sign in multiple times because I get a message saying, "Error on our side." Also, once I finally found the option to search transactions, the search filter does not work. I would like to search "deposits," but clicking on the choices does nothing. I preferred the previous version and had none of the current problems.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for providing this feedback. We constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. You can take digital tours to learn how to navigate the new app here: https://featuredemos.wf.com/en/home. If you need any further assistance or have additional feedback, please contact us at 1-800-956-4442. -Sofia

scraped_reviews.content: The redesign is terrible in that it takes MORE clicks to access the information you need. For example, account history. In previous version, after logging in and clicking on my account, it shows the history right away. Now, it takes three clicks to get the same information, which is a 300% DECREASE in productivity. Yes, it's just two additional clicks, but, normally, you redesign to be more efficient or effective, not the other way around. Worse part is that there's no options to customize.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Vincent. We constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will consider your feedback seriously in planning future improvements. If you need any further assistance or have additional feedback, please contact us at 1-800-956-4442. -Helen

scraped_reviews.content: Used to function perfectly but for the last couple months the mobile deposit feature very rarely works. It says that the check amount doesn't match the picture and to try taking the picture again but it never resolves the error. Changing the background, light source, angle, distance and uninstall/reinstall doesn't make a difference. I've wasted so much time on this nonsense. 12/24 Update: The app is working better now and I've been able to deposit more reliably.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd like to help. To determine what may be occurring with your account, please contact technical support at 1-800-956-4442, so they can look into this. -Angie

scraped_reviews.content: Newest update crashes constantly. I cross my fingers and hope that it doesn't crash before I even click the box to show the balances of all my accounts separately. I get a message that it was an error "on their part" and have to sign out and in again (fingerprint twice to even login). Forget trying to stay on there long enough to do any research on your account. Search function was hard to find and I don't see where you can change view to just deposits, etc. Nearly unusable!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Angel

scraped_reviews.content: I do not like the new update at all! It's a lot more difficult to navigate. I now have to click on every transaction listed to actually see what it is since it just says "purchase authorized...". Also, it seems to keep scrolling back to the Wells Fargo deals every time the screen changes. There should be an option to close the deals. I do not find it easier or better at all!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, we constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will consider your feedback seriously in planning future improvements. If you need any further assistance or have additional feedback, please contact us at 1-800-956-4442. -Helen

scraped_reviews.content: Since this new update the app is always malfunctioning. Always getting a error message"there was a problem on our end. Please try again a little later". This after having to sign in twice. I had no problems with the previous version. Also once you actually get into your account it doesn't look user friendly. Have to click on each item to see who "purchase authorized " was actually from. Previously in old version it was all there at a glance. Please fix or bring old version back!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. We're sorry this has been your experience. Please email us with more details (phone number, device/operating system, link to this public comment, and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Alex

scraped_reviews.content: New update is miserable. Glitchy when I try to sign in (I usually have to attempt twice before I can actually get signed in). It hiccups when I try to scroll, which drives me nuts! The font size and background make things so much more challenging to read. It's easier to do online banking from a desktop computer now. ...which completely defeats the purpose of having a mobile app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Angie

scraped_reviews.content: Newest update is awful. Have to log in twice to actually gain access to my accounts, then when I finally do, there's always a problem on their end, with a little red exclamation point, which makes me have to close the app and try again. Then I reopen it and start the process all over again. It's like an ouroboros of disappointing failure on their end.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Sofia

scraped_reviews.content: New app is terrible! While I like the colors and font type, I can no longer use it to balance my ledger, because it cuts off the description and payee of the transactions. To expand the entry, then go back, you're taken back to the top of the list, not where you last were! Frustrating to no end! I used this daily - I cannot anymore, and must log in via my computer on a browser. I was so hyped for the rollout, but wish I could now roll back!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We value you feedback, I'll share it with the Mobile team as they do appreciate insight on your mobile experience. Some functions have been moved, while some other functions have been eliminated. Visit the following link to explore the new app to find how to navigate to different functions: https://featuredemos.wf.com/en/home. -Noemie

scraped_reviews.content: Recent update has caused constant glitches. I use fingerprint ID to log in and have for quite a while. The way the app loads, I have to scan my finger twice. It doesn't appear to be due to extra security, it looks like it's because it glitches as it starts to open. Once I'm logged in, it takes several more log in attempts to get anything done because I get an error message that something has gone wrong on their end and I need to log off. This has been happening for 3 days now.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Beth. We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. Thank you. -Ludwicke

scraped_reviews.content: Wasn't broken, why fix it? No message center, to tell you how hard it sucks? What happened to being able to search for a transaction? Was I the only one who used that function. Now the app doesn't display correctly for the size of our devices? Isn't that taught in app developer 101? I haven't had any problem logging on, knock on wood, like many other users. Please put back the previous version and make minor changes from there, this major change all at once, is an epic fail. Fire somebody!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try to help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Loni

scraped_reviews.content: I strongly dislike the new face of the app. No balances available again. Page glitches and jumps when you are scrolling. Things show pending forever. When you click on "view all" you get error messages that is not able to be seen. Can't see the notes you add on transfers between accounts. It's just terrible. I already felt like leaving Wells Fargo because they want to charge monthly account fees. This updated app has gotten me there
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Angel

scraped_reviews.content: I've been with wellsfargo for years right now. I've had the app for over a year, it had been working great and running well, now all of a sudden the app doesnt launch, it keeps crashing, doesnt load and I've updated the app, uninstalled and reinstalled and still doesnt work. I'm very disappointed and not satisfied at all, hopefully you guys fix this issue.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd like to help. To determine what may be occurring with your account, please contact technical support at 1-800-956-4442, so they can look into this. -Jules

scraped_reviews.content: Ok normally this app is great, it is easy to use and easy to understand! However, since the recent update, the blasted thing won't load anymore. It will have me sign in and then enter a white screen of never-ending-ness. I've uninstalled and reinstalled the app, I even tried opening it on WiFi then on mobile. Nothing changed. So I just login on the web browser instead. This is really frustrating. I miss how much faster this was!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Desiree

scraped_reviews.content: Edi: this app just keeps getting even worse after the latest update. If I leave the account summary page, the app freezes and the only option is to log out and back in. Very frustrating. Scrolling is still incredibly difficult, and there is still no option to view your account balance without logging in, which was extremely useful and time saving. 2FA is nice to have when needing to log in, but it's cumbersome when all I need is my account balance. Not surprised they're not going to fix this.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Richard

scraped_reviews.content: Previous update had the app jumping all over the place when trying to scroll through transactions. Very frustrating. Now it was updated again, and I can't even login. Keeps giving me an error message telling me to try again later. Absolutely useless. Why keep updating if you are making the app worse for the customers? Thanks for the reply, but still having the same issue. Still can not login. No access has been restored. Yes, I have Uninstalled and then reinstalled the app. No fix has occurred.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Access has been restored. Please try logging in again. If you're still having issues, please call us at 1-800-956-4442. Our online support team may be able to help. -Ian

scraped_reviews.content: This app freezes all the time!!!! I sign in and get a blank white screen. The only way to fix it is to actually Uninstall it and reinstall it to get it to work properly. It freezes to a white screen when you try choose the transfer menu. And no amount of signing off, if it allows you to sign off, and signing in again fixes the freeze. Please fix this!!!! It is very annoying. You'd think that a greedy bank like Wells Fargo would have enough money to actually make a decent app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rebeca. We're sorry to hear that. Please email us with more relevant details about your concerns, and please include (phone number, device/operating system, link to this public comment, and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Alex

scraped_reviews.content: Gosh what am I missing here? I can't even sign in. I always get an error saying "there was a problem on our end". It's been days now. Reset my PW multiple times and re-downloaded the app just in case. No change. Ideas please? Edit -- I did contact support and they said "try reinstalling the app" and "just wait a couple hours." Neither suggestion worked. I can't logon through a browser nor this app. Same error. "Something went wrong on our end." Incredibly inconvenient.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Are you stating that you're unable to sign on to the Wells Fargo Mobile¬Æ app? If you're having access issues, please call us at 1-800-956-4442 for technical assistance. Otherwise, please email us with the details of your issue (phone number, link to this public comment, and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. -Juju

scraped_reviews.content: Just reduced my review from 3 stars to 2 stars. Can't make a payment to my credit card account. It just sits there and spins and never goes through. I can't understand a company that would treat customers this way. I'm trying to pay, FFS! I can access the app just fine, see my cc account. But making a pmnt, it just goes into endless spin. I can log in the website and get the payment done. Why bother with the app!? I've never had a problem with any other financial institution's mobile app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Not being able to make a payment can be disappointing. Please call us at 1-800-956-4442. Our technical team can look into this for you and provide assistance. Thank you. -Tania

scraped_reviews.content: Every time I think I've figured out the intricacies of navigating the site to find what I want or how to get something to work, you go and CHANGE it in the name of "progress" ! Very disconcerting ! Needs simplification (especially BillPay). Less is more. However, when I can get it to work correctly, it's a wonderful conveniance, especially being able to deposit a check with my smartphone. Kudos!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, Jacqueline. Thanks for reaching out to us. This sounds like something we'd like to research further and ask that you email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. We look forward to hearing from you. -Ludwicke

scraped_reviews.content: Prior to the update, there were literally ZERO issues with the app. This update is TERRIBLE, when it works. Every time I login, the app crashes at some point or another. The ease of access has completely disappeared. This is definitely not an intuitive update. If it didn't crash at every click, I'd give it, at most, 3 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, I saw your review, and I apologize for the experience. I will be sure your feedback if forwarded. In the meantime, if you need online or app assistance, please call 1-800-956-4442. -Aud

scraped_reviews.content: The bill pay , used to be so easy , it used to have a list with the last four of the acc # so you know which bill your trying paying , now for instance if your trying to pay a capital one card , and have several you have to open them up one after the other and then back out to find the right acct# . It has a big square over the information saying to set up e bill , I don't want e bill . I wish they would just put it back the way it was or I will be transferring to a more user friendly bank .
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that and want to look further into this. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Hanj

scraped_reviews.content: Even though I have the 2 factor authentication setting set to "off", the app never actually lets me log in without sending a text message to authenticate me. And to top it off, it doesn't allow me paste the 6-digit code that I had just received, which I am then forced to type in. I've used plenty of other banking apps from competitors and have never had this terrible of an experience. I will literally put off using this app, instead choosing to wait until I can access the website on my laptop.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're sorry to hear that and would like to try and help. Please email us with details (phone number, link to this public comment and your reviewer name) at appstorefeedback@wellsfargo.com. Do not share anything private when emailing us, such as account numbers. -Angie

scraped_reviews.content: I cannot get Bill Pay to open. It goes to a blank screen. It is very frustrating since I use this frequently. This only started happening the past couple days. I do not prefer the new Version. When scrolling transactions it jumps and skips and goes back to the top. It is not as easy to use at all. Plus I NEED BILL PAY TO BE FUNCTIONING AGAIN!!!!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: I apologize for the inconvenience. Our support team is currently working on this issue. Please try an alternative browser, mobile app, or mobile browser, and to clear cache on their device. -Angie

scraped_reviews.content: I absolutely hate the new layout. It takes more time to scan through charges , as a matter of fact you cannot just scan any longer . You actually have to clink on the individual charge to see where it came from . You no long can see at a glance where the charges generated from . Takes so much more time . I AM NOT HAPPY ABOUT THIS AT ALL . This is a good example of someone try to fix something That Was Not Broke In The First Place.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate the feedback. Get a preview here: https://featuredemos.wf.com/en/home of the rebuilt Wells Fargo Mobile¬Æ app and see what easier looks like. -Hanj

scraped_reviews.content: It is difficult to scroll through transactions, pending transactions are no longer clearly separated from cleared transactions, the transfer/pay never works and crashes the system. I tried to give feedback and that crashed the system too. I sent feedback through the online banking and got a standard response telling me to uninstall/re-install. Well, it didn't fix the issues. I hope they listen to all these complaints and fix these issues. They've made banking more difficult.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We constantly strive to provide our customers with a great experience. We will consider your feedback seriously in planning future improvements and share it with our mobile team. -Richard

scraped_reviews.content: The Wells Fargo app has only been intermittently working for a few months now, but with this latest update it's completely broken. I cannot log in at all, that screen just never shows up no matter how many times I open and close the app (which previously sometimes worked to re-set it). So I had to log in using my phone's browser, and it made me type in the "captcha" EIGHT TIMES before I could see my accounts. It shouldn't take this many minutes of frustration just to log in.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd like to help. To determine what may be occurring with your account, please contact technical support at 1-800-956-4442, so they can look into this. -Angie

scraped_reviews.content: I really don't like this updated version. I understand WF is trying to make it pretty and modern. But sometimes, the old way is the way to go. The new app is confusing and hard to read, and follow. I also have issues signing in. I need to sign in twice and it won't save my username after I check the box to do so. I miss the old version, but I know we won't be getting that back. Ruined a good thing.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We value you feedback, I'll share it with the Mobile team as they do appreciate insight on your mobile experience. Some functions have been moved, while some other functions have been eliminated. Visit the following link to explore the new app to find how to navigate to different functions: https://featuredemos.wf.com/en/home. -Noemie

scraped_reviews.content: When Wells Fargo first came out with the App, it was easy to navigate and had ALL PERTINENT information. They should have left it alone. Now the are missing the Dailey ending balances and don't even distinguish the deposits from the debit, other than a tiny green plus sign. The app is no longer concise, and all but impossible to use for weekly balancing. Sadly, even the statements have changed to match this new, unreadable format. PLEASE go back to the checkbook style format.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate you for providing us this feedback. We will be sure to share it with our online team as they do appreciate insight on your experience. Thanks again. -Alex

scraped_reviews.content: Their app is no longer compatible with Note 4. Their response... you just have to get a new phone. Yeah, because everyone has spare money lying around to just buy a new phone... especially after a year of pandemic hardships. What lousy customer service. Disgusting. How about quit updating it so many times and making nothing but problems and not excluding long time customers because they have an older phone.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: The Wells Fargo Mobile app is supported on Android devices running OS 7.0 or greater and Apple devices running iOS 12.0 or greater. This is to ensure we deliver the best experience to our customers with the latest features. Please check with your device manufacturer if you have questions regarding updates to the OS. -Jules

scraped_reviews.content: I do not know what you have done with the new update, but its made the app run horribly. Won't let me save my username anymore, wouldn't recognize my one password ive had for years so I had to change it, and now when I try to transfer money it gives me the loading spinning wheel of death way too often. Before the update, never had an issue with the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We'd like to help. To determine what may be occurring with your account, please contact technical support at 1-800-956-4442, so they can look into this. -Shaun

title: Duolingo: Language Lessons
description:
Learn a new language with the world‚Äôs most-downloaded education app! Duolingo is the fun, free app for learning 40+ languages through quick, bite-sized lessons. Practice speaking, reading, listening, and writing to build your vocabulary and grammar skills.

Designed by learning experts and loved by hundreds of millions of learners worldwide, Duolingo helps you prepare for real conversations in Spanish, French, Chinese, Italian, German, English, and more.

And now, you can learn Math, Music, and Chess the Duolingo way!

‚Ä¢ Build real-world math skills ‚Äì from calculating tips to identifying patterns ‚Äì and sharpen your mental math in our Math course. Learn foundational topics like multiplication, fractions, geometry and more, and keep your brain sharp with more challenging exercises, games, and word problems.

‚Ä¢ Learn how to read music and play popular songs on your device in our Music course ‚Äì no piano or instrument required! Using an on-screen keyboard, you‚Äôll learn bit-by-bit, from finding notes on the keyboard to playing your first song.

‚Ä¢ Master moves, level up your game, and play real matches in our brand new Chess course. Checkmate!

Whether you‚Äôre learning for travel, school, career, family and friends, or your brain health, you‚Äôll love learning with Duolingo.

Why Duolingo?

‚Ä¢ Duolingo is fun and effective. Game-like lessons and fun characters help you build solid speaking, reading, listening, and writing skills.

‚Ä¢ Duolingo works. Designed by learning experts, Duolingo has a science-based teaching methodology proven to foster long-term knowledge retention.

‚Ä¢ Track your progress. Work toward your learning goals with playful rewards and achievements when you make practicing a daily habit!

‚Ä¢ Join millions of learners. Stay motivated with competitive Leaderboards as you learn alongside our global community.

‚Ä¢ Every language course is free. Learn Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Turkish, Dutch, Irish, Danish, Swedish, Ukrainian, Esperanto, Polish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Hebrew, Welsh, Arabic, Latin, Hawaiian, Scottish Gaelic, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, English, and even High Valyrian! And now, learn Math, Music, and Chess with our newest courses!

‚ÄúThis free app and website is among the most effective language-learning methods I‚Äôve tried‚Ä¶ lessons come in the form of brief challenges ‚Äî speaking, translating, answering multiple-choice questions ‚Äî that keep me coming back for more.‚Äù ‚Äî The New York Times
