scraped_reviews.content: EASILY the best GPS navigation app out there. The best part is the performance. Absolutely 0 lag, super easy to run, and visually pleasing. I would also say it has the best map details of any app. The roads and streets are simply mapped out more accurately than any other app. The POI is great too, any place you want, this app will have.
well thank you for adding the option to set the custom speed for the car that I was missing a lot.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Good afternoon, thank you for your kind words! We're delighted that the new feature meets your needs. Wishing you enjoyable and safe travels! üöóüó∫Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: It was a great app, but then they decided to squeeze people and go for the subscription model. I refuse to buy the same app over and over every month. I moved on to something else. I would have purchased it once, but they wanted to be greedy and they lost me. It's about time companies learned that customers don't like to be ripped off.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hello,

This is an annual subscription. Given the continuous development of the application, it‚Äôs not feasible to offer it as a one-time purchase ‚Äî the price would be truly unacceptable.

scraped_reviews.content: From best free app to pay or leave.... what a shame, used to be best mapping app for everything. Before i could download all maps, now a subscription model... a one time pay would be acceptable, but this app became so unusable with lot of freezes, bugs, strange navigation errors, slow or no startup...
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, if you encountered a technical issue while using the app, please report it and describe it in detail directly through the app so we have access to diagnostic data: https://mapy.com/?feedback=menu ‚Äì choose the appropriate option based on the issue. Our team will do their best to help. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Vital, previously free feature, offline maps has been put behind a subscription. It isn't even possible to keep more than one offline map downloaded on-device, so it's necessary to re-download while travelling, making it difficult to plan ahead without mobile data.

My choice for an outdoor map for hiking and biking. Being able to download the map of a whole country is a great plus. Tracking seems accurate too. With a free account one can store trips and more. I recommend this to everybody.

scraped_reviews.content: Used to be fine. Now they're trying to force you into having an account by being unable to update your offline maps. For the years I've had this it's never been a problem. Just another app ruined by progress. Search for replacement started.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for your feedback ‚Äî we understand your frustration. An account is now needed to update offline maps mainly for technical reasons, like linking your maps to your profile. We‚Äôre trying to keep most features free, but we know this change isn‚Äôt for everyone. Thanks for giving us a try all these years.

scraped_reviews.content: 2025 edit from my 2018 review : The app content is still very nice, and improved quite a lot. However the app nowadays keeps lagging, bugging and closing. I am really disappointed. On top, the premium price is very high. I will never pay such money for an app that does not work. With those prices (way higher than alternatives) , it seems the owner wants to make a lot of money. 2018 : Amazing for oreinteering all over the world

Hey. It is a nice app but could you make very small icos like resting places, picnic area camping sites and sinic views show upp not only on max zoom but much earlier so it is much easier to plan routs. Search bar helps but it is very not efficient. Soo many details is hiden that way. Happy member.
Really like the features and look, it's very easy to navigate old school way (like using a map)

scraped_reviews.content: Great mapping option for trekkers and travellers alike. Worldwide coverage is an absolute delight to use.

scraped_reviews.content: I've tried apps that teach programming languages, and Mimo is honestly the leader of the pack. The constant feedback loop, the switching of pre-configured strings to input code vs having you type it in yourself with hints at the top just help hammer in and solidify the concepts of Python. I wish I could type more. 5/5 easy

scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi there. The app is free to download, and as well the first chapter of all our many courses - such as Python, Java, C++, R, Kotlin, Ruby and the list gets longer. Nevertheless, we're working on increasing the number of free lessons, so hang in there!

scraped_reviews.content: going off what I've seen so far, decent app. it's covered stuff I know that should be common knowledge and lets the user know that there's a premium, I'm not going to purchase it, but it's there. Material is quick and the lessons are short, but it's a good refresher if you already know coding. Searched for Lua and got Python instead, though, and thr constant nagging for me to get premium is outrageous.

This thing has been great so far, but there are hiccups. Sometimes it's a little over-simple, asking you to solve something and only giving you one possible solution. other times I found it moving onto the next lessons and describing something like it was previously mentioned, even though it was not. These are the exceptions though and not the norms, so most of the time its very helpful.

title: Banco Ita√∫: Conta, Cart√£o e +
description:
The Ita√∫ Week Warm-up has begun, with exclusive Black Friday offers. Take advantage of Ita√∫ Shop products and benefits with up to 60% off and up to 15% cashback.

Everything you can do through the app:

‚óâ Ita√∫ Shop
With Ita√∫ Shop you can buy products with discounts of up to 60%! Installment payments in up to 12 installments INTEREST-FREE or cash payment with CASHBACK.

‚óâ Insurance
Purchase and customize life insurance, travel insurance, home insurance, car insurance and more.

‚óâ Virtual Card
With a virtual card you are safer to pay for subscriptions or make online purchases.

‚óâ Contactless Payment with digital wallet
Register your card with Google Pay or Samsung Pay and make contactless payments.

‚óâ Ita√∫ Tag
Make your commutes easier with the Ita√∫ Tag, which offers nationwide acceptance at toll booths and parking lots, ensuring convenience and practicality.

‚óâ Credit Card Limit Increase
Increase your credit card limit using your pre-approved limit.

‚óâ Cashback
By shopping at partner stores, you earn cashback to use at Ita√∫ Shop, credit on your bills, and more. To redeem, go to ‚ÄúProducts‚Äù and click on ‚Äúpoints and cashback‚Äù.

‚óâ Debit and Credit Cards
Request and unlock a new credit and debit card, check your card statements, and generate a virtual card for online purchases.

‚óâ Investments
Various investment options to keep your money growing, such as Treasury Direct, Private Pension, Savings, and more!

‚óâ Personal Loan* and Credit Solutions
Apply for a personal loan or mortgage through the app. Choose the loan amount for immediate disbursement into your account.

We also have other types of credit to support you.

‚óâ Bill Payment with Credit Card
Pay bills with your credit card, split the payment into up to 12 installments, and take advantage of the new feature: choose which bill to start paying on ‚Äî current, next, or even two bills ahead.

‚óâ Bank Transfers
Like a digital bank, make transfers to savings or checking accounts at any online bank. Opening an account at Ita√∫ allows you to make your transfers simply and quickly directly through the app.

‚óâ Payments
Pay bills choosing whether the money will come from your checking account, savings account, or, if you prefer, set up automatic debit payments.

‚óâ My Finances and Bank Statement
Check your checking and savings account balances, bank account statements, and credit card bills, as well as manage online payments and bank transfers.

‚óâ Facial Recognition
Install iToken using facial recognition and make transfers, payments, and Pix payments.

‚óâ Protection against phone scams
With your permission, we will identify and block calls from scammers trying to impersonate the bank.

Request credit and debit cards, check your checking and savings account balances, apply for personal loans, invest, renegotiate financing, and more.

If you are not yet a customer, you can open an account directly through the app: fast, practical, and without bureaucracy.

Track your credit card bill, pay by contactless payment with your cell phone, use your virtual card online. And more: shop at Ita√∫ Shop with discounts + cashback or exclusive installment plans!

In addition to opening an account, you can request a credit card with NO ANNUAL FEE, renegotiate debts with exclusive installment plans, earn cashback on purchases at Ita√∫ Shop, and always count on Ita√∫'s SECURITY.

*For personal loans, the money is deposited instantly after contracting the loan in cases where credit has already been pre-approved by Ita√∫ bank.

title: Messenger
description:
Messenger is a free messaging app that helps you connect with anyone, anywhere. Stay in touch with your friends and family, explore your interests with people like you, build your community, and share your vibe beyond words, all in one app.

CHAT AND CALL ANYONE, ANYWHERE‚Ä®
Find and connect with your friends and family on Facebook and Messenger, no phone number needed.

GET INSTANT ANSWERS FROM YOUR AI ASSISTANT*
Meta AI is your assistant that can answer any questions, give you advice, help with homework, and more.

SEND YOUR PHOTOS IN HIGH DEFINITION
Send and receive clearer, crisper picture of your favorite moments with Messenger.

CREATE SHARED ALBUMS
From a recent summer vacation to your grandma‚Äôs 80th birthday, create albums of photos and videos to share, organize and reminisce over important moments in your group chats.

EASILY ADD NEW CONNECTIONS WITH QR CODES
Connect with people you meet in real life by scanning their Messenger QR code or sharing yours via a link.

SHARE LARGE FILES DIRECTLY IN CHAT
Whether it‚Äôs a Word, PDF, or Excel doc, you can send large files up to 100MB right inside of Messenger.

EDIT AND UNSEND MESSAGES 
Hit send too soon? You can edit the message up to 15 minutes after sending

DISAPPEARING MESSAGES
Some things aren‚Äôt meant to last forever. Choose how long your end-to-end encrypted chats stick around after they‚Äôve been read.

COME TOGETHER WITH YOUR COMMUNITIES
Meaningfully connect with people like you from your school, neighborhood, and interest groups.

GET IN YOUR FAVORITE CREATORS‚Äô INNER CIRCLE
Stay in the know with creators by joining their broadcast channels for authentic and casual content.

UNLEASH YOUR IMAGINATION W/ META AI*
Tap into your go-to creative partner to create, edit, animate images and more.

CAPTURE EVERYDAY MOMENTS ON STORIES
Highlight moments of your day using photos and videos that disappear after 24 hours in Stories.

DROP A NOTE WITH YOUR THOUGHTS
Stay connected with your friends by sharing quick updates that disappear after 24 hours.

BRING YOUR VIBE TO YOUR CHATS
Sometimes words just don‚Äôt cut it. Tap into more ways to express yourself with animated stickers, GIFs, reactions and more.

SET THE MOOD OF YOUR CHAT WITH THEMES
Customize your chat with a large and constantly evolving list of themes featuring popular artists, holidays, and more. 

*Meta AI is available in select languages and countries only, with more coming soon.

scraped_reviews.content: I don't like not being able to see my entire message as I'm typing it. üò° Apparently you've changed this app to show only two lines of text at a time. This is stupid and very annoying! Please change it back so I can see my ENTIRE message as I'm writing it! Add more settings so we can adjust things for the way we like it!!!! This review is NOT for an "older version". I have the most up to date version!

It is literally the worst messaging app on the face of the planet. How did Meta create this garbage when Instagram works just fine? I can't even watch videos back to back without closing the app and re-opening it. It's like eating a scoop of ice cream, putting it back in the freezer, taking it back out of the freezer, eating another scoop, and then repeating that for the 75 videos my wife sent me. But surprise! Sometimes the ice cream isn't even ice cream because it links to a different video.

I have been having to force stop and reopen this app dozens of times a day for MONTHS. When I search a chat for something in the past, I can no longer go back to that part of the conversation, it just hangs. When I try to save a photo from a chat, I get a "couldn't save image" error. If I try to share a photo from a chat, I get "Sorry, something went wrong. please try again". The absolute worst, by far.

I have had to force quit this ridiculous app several times a day, EVERY day, for nearly a week just to send messages, let alone send and listen to voice messages. Sending media? Yeah, it won't even pull up the photos and if it does, the media still may not send. I have written paragraphs, only to have them stuck on sending, having to force quit, and LOSING THAT ENTIRE REPLY. Fix. This. NOW.

It works as described. I haven't had a lot of issues with it other than sometimes messages show up as just the chat bubble. it's like it doesn't load properly. If I close the app and reopen it the messages usually show up. Calling works fairly well. As long as you have strong Wi-Fi and/or data it seems to be fairly consistent. Sometimes the call gets choppy but I think that has more to do with the signal than the app itself.

Very good app, does exactly as it's meant to do! I've only noticed one major issue... when your friends share multiple videos with you, it takes you into your FB feed in between each video. This happens even when I'm viewing messages through the Messenger app directly. We should be able to just stay in the messages or even scroll through the video messages all at one time, like TikTok. üòÅ This has become a pretty annoying issue as 'Reels' become more popular. Would be a 5 ‚òÜ if this was fixed!

This app is constantly lagging. Videos and pictures sent over the app degrade in quality or just do not send. I also feel the terms and conditions that "protect" my information are all but useless, and even if the platform improved, I've lost trust in their so called "security" and I do not feel I can trust them with my information. I don't plan on coming back, even if they fixed all the constant bugs and errors!

After the latest update, or somewhere in between, the app has slowed down TREMENDOUSLY, and it is not my internet. i can read, stream, use whatsapp, and everything else on my internet except use this app efficiently. It freezes, becomes blank, does not send my messages, and does not receive messages properly. Sometimes it takes up to 15 minutes for messenger to catch up to what people send me. Also, all the Ai options should be optional since I think that's what slows my app down.

As others have stated. Ongoing issue with messages not appearing, either sent or received. Seems like messenger apps for different contacts are not syncing, so large gaps of missing information and messages. Really irritating, and when you try to restart the app, it makes it worse! Just started using messenger again and can see why I left it.

2/7/25 Since the update, my audio messages that I am sending out are being deleted as if I deleted them and I didn't. Also, for the chat bubbles, the pictures keep changing which isn't cool at all. Seems like the app needs work on it. Anyone else having these issues? 3/21/25: Seems like with every update the app isn't getting better, keeps saying waiting on connection when I'm on WiFi and it's not showing me who is online, please fix this.

A great app for messaging people, I mean that's what the app is for! Pictures, videos, messages send too! My problem is being alerted to when people are trying to message me. It's been happening a lot these last few months, I would have gotten a message 5 hours ago and then get a notification saying I got the message, then there's times where it just doesn't notify me at all.

I have uninstalled and reinstalled installed this app twice already. I have ALL my notifications on- birth on the app and on the phone. I'm not on "Do not disturb," yet I still don't get notifications when someone messages me. I have to open the app to see them, so if someone messages me something important and time-sensitive, I miss it. Fix your app, Meta.

despite being logged in and the green active dot, friends all of a sudden can't send me messages since yesterday (11/12) because it tells them I "cant access the chat, and they can send messages again when I next log into messenger"....nothing fixes this! logged out and back in several times, cleared cache several times, restarted phone many times. forced the app to close. I didnt change any settings!

No longer has the option to open profiles and links in chrome. After opening a link in messenger, you used to be able to click the 3 dots in the upper right corner and "open in Chrome" and you could then continue surfing Facebook or view the link in your browser. Without this feature, i will probably just be uninstalling messenger altogether or finding the apk for an older version. i do like to get notifications for messages and be able to video call. argh! developers please fix.

Messages load extremely slowly. I am left watching a loading screen for 30s, or sometimes they just never load. Also, notifications appear several hours after I've read the message. This has been a problem in some capacity for over a year now. I've tried uninstalling and leaving the beta, but the problem persists. It's almost unusable.

Constantly freezing up, especially in the middle of a group chat. Messages get stuck in sending and sometimes don't go through. Have to clear cache multiple times a day. Notifications are slow. I get alerts for messages already read. It's not the wifi connection, something in the app needs to be fixed. Thank you.

two stars because I can no longer open links to Facebook posts and stories, even though they're public, from a chat. I used to at least be able to hit 3 dots and open in a browser and I can't do that anymore. I just get a message that my account is disabled (which it is) and I have to go to it in a browser, which I can't even copy the link. I submitted feedback via the app also

Any time I try to search for a message further back than a few days, the app crashes. On desktop, it only shows messages from ten weeks ago or THIRTY FIVE. WHY??? I'm trying to access information from a friend and even if I painstakingly scroll back too quickly, the app crashes. It never used to be this bad

What's the point of leaving a review if issues go unresolved? I've "reported a technical issue" many times as well as left several reviews. My voice message feature does not work correctly. I can hear everyone fine. The issue here is. When I use it, it cuts out like crazy. There's no background noise. If im making a noise like a faint whistle or a hum, the audio waves are picking it up, but it cuts it out. The thing that fixes this? Clearing the data SEVERAL times a day on the messenger FIX IT

App has been very glitchy lately. Seems to have an update once a week but it still doesn't fix the issues. I tried to message someone. It took 3 tries typing it because the app kept closing. update as of 09/21/25. still having issues over a year later. now I cant load or send messages if I have more than one message at a time. 2 updates and still not fixed. highly disappointed since I use this a lot for communication.

I don't know what they did in the last few months but whatever their updates have been have rendered the app nearly unusable. I'll get updates only AFTER I've replied to the messages. or I won't get any updates until I open the app. messages will sit in "sending" for minutes, if they ever leave. images and links don't load until they feel like it. I've cleared caches, uninstalled and reinstalled, changed as many settings as I can think of and it's still abysmal. awful changes (also ai sucks)

for the past 30 minutes, I've been trying to open Facebook messenger only to have it claim that it did a forced close due to a bug. I've already cleared the catche and uninstalled and reinstalled the app, and it is still giving me problems. so yeah, Facebook, you can keep your usual frase "troubleshooting will fix the problem". and yes, Facebook, I do have the latest version instead. according to what I've been seeing online,it's been a consistent problem for almost everyone for the past 7 days.

I have had constant issues with getting my notifications and reached out to meta and support already and haven't gotten any responses. I don't get anything until I go and open the app myself and get 30+ coming all at once. I won't get any notifications for days and I've missed calls, messages, voicemails, everything! important calls and all. I don't miss a update either. Makes more problems than anything. I had a family member pass 2 days ago and thanks to messenger I didn't know.

Works pretty well most of the time. Sometimes it won't work on a call but when it doesn't we hang up and try again i. e. like if there is an echo. Sometimes the spell correct is annoying when it puts the wrong word in but it correctly spells the wrong word. Sometimes I have to spell out what I intend to say so the correct word is placed in the text. but over all it seems to work well.

What's the point of the feedback option when a call ends if it disappears after a short sentence mid-typing? Anyways, video quality is god-awful, I can barely see anything the other persons camera shows. Audio quality's also extremely poor. Constant cutting out. Both myself and the person on the other ends audio is constantly cutting out randomly and we have to keep repeating ourselves. Lastly, lots of buffering and disconnecting that other video calling apps don't have. Almost unusable, thanks.

EDIT: it seems that my phone updated this app during the night and that is when the problem began. Beginning today, recipients can no longer view photos that I send. It says I'm sending, but the person can't view it. It's always worked between us before, even yesterday. What's happening? We've both tried to restarting our phones, still won't work.

(1) Notifications never appear, even though I do have messages sent to me. (2) Can't search conversation properly, when I find the message I want to jump to, it leads me to a black screen or doesn't do anything at all. (3) Displays double or empty box of my sent messages. (4) When I click on a person I'd like to message, the chat disappears and it's all black, I try to restart, reinstall, or refresh and it remains that way until randomly coming back.

Developers: messenger is crashing frequently. I've only experienced this a few minutes ago. restarting my phone/ uninstalling and reinstalling doesn't help. cache also cleared. no settings were changed. I'm not sure if this is happening to anyone else, but Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra is my phone. i live in Australia. idk what other details you need. it isn't a 'Lite' version. app was fully updated at the last patch. thanks for your attention.

Good app: Very useful for communicating in real time with family and friends on the other side of the globe (I'm in South East Asia). Recently, though, I've been getting a "Waiting on Network" message, and had to manually clear the app data to get it to work. I think it might be because I switched from my personal profile to the profile of a page I manage, and then back, because it was working until then. But other than that, it has been great, for text, audio, and video chats.

This is almost I think the best app to communicate with your friends and used for business. Well I'm currently experiencing bugs that I think I also experience this for the few years. When I open the app everything is normal not until I click one conversation then it turns white or just no display at all. I click the back button but the whole app just minimize itself instead of going back to the inbox or what. But after that bug I went open it again the same processes but nothing appeared.

while I love this app and use it daily it's getting frustrating when trying to take payments through messenger. my mom will periodically send me cash for my kids and EVERY TIME I have to go add a card like 12 times before it is "accepted" the card hasn't changed. this is frustrating. I also with when looking for shared links and all you can separate reels out of there. if I'm looking for an Amazon link from 3 weeks ago I hate digging through 80 reels to find it.

Okay. It has been quite annoying at some random point while using messenger, my messages would get stuck in 'sending' and would not send at all after a few minutes or hours! My Internet connection is fine, but the app is not. Fix your app with its bugs, because it is inconvenient for what's supposed to be a fast communication app. Another bug. No matter how many times I delete, reinstall, clear the data, the preview for sending photos or even the ability to send photos is gone! Please fix this.

Can't send or receive messages half the time, or don't get notifications of messages. Photo gallery empty when trying to send photos. If you take a photo in the app or manage to get one to come up through Google photos etc, nothing happens when you press send. The send button just turns white and then nothing sends. Notifications and permissions are on. S23.

In the latest update that I recieved on July 28th 2025... I have noticed random kickouts where I can only get back in if I force stop, and notice a lot of times, status updates don't update. I believe I have narrowed down the issue to a network handoff issue somewhere in the app that seems to hang the app up. So far my work around that seems to have helped... but not completely resolved the issue is to set mobile data to always on.

multi billion dollar company whose fortune is made off social media and we can't make a functional app. constant random bugs (today it's just decided that it won't be sending anything, every other app works fine). It's also the only message app that can't handle it's notifications at all, especially with desktop mode added in. Discord and all the rest can do it, why can't you?

Update: Dropping to 1 star now because I can't go 20 minutes without having to clear cache or force stop the app to get anything to work! Suddenly I can't see new messages I'm receiving, I'll get the notification on my phone but once I click it it won't open in the app. If I search someone I don't already have an active chat with it just pulls up a blank screen. Media that's sent to me won't load at all and it never says delivered or read anymore, just that my messages sent

Newest update broke the app. When I open up my pictures it's just completely black, I have to force stop and restart the app several times to be able to send images. When I receive photos and videos from others I can't see them outside of the preview/thumbnail. Outgoing messages won't send and will sometimes disappear when I exit the chat window only to reappear at random. This used to be a reliable messaging app but seems like AI is more important than actual communication

This app is garbage. There have been some bad updates in the past but this one takes the cake. Messages don't load when I open the app. When I try to send a picture I get a black screen. I open a chat and it's completely blank. I have to force close the app multiple times a day just to get it working and that only works for a short time. I'm to the point where I'm going to uninstall this garbage because it never works properly.

Lots of bugs: constantly logging me back out, it keeps making me jump through hoops to get through security, I have to force stop and restart Facebook constantly because of it having login issues where it automatically logs me out saying "session expired" and I have to restart my phone so I can use it since it shows up as a popup window I can't escape that doesn't let me tap my screen, can't send messages guaranteeing they're sent at all being in a never-ending "Sending" cycle Fix this ASAP pls

Massive data hog! Takes up 3GB+ of space on my phone. Moving it to my SD card helps tremendously, but the app has randomly reinstalled itself on my internal storage without warning four times now, crippling my phone's function and rendering it practically inoperable each time. It used to be a good messaging app, but it has been absolutely terrible these past few months. If Facebook didn't basically force you to use it, I would have deleted it already. It takes up way too much space!

Despite all of the correct settings on my s25 ultra, Messenger fails to hang on to the ability to see and share photos and graphics. it will work for a few shares, and then I have to go into App permissions and toggle from don't allow to allow again. I tried to report the problem through messenger, but the report feature crashed my app twice.

Crashing & Reporting Broken ‚Äì Needs Fix Messenger crashes constantly. Messages get stuck on ‚ÄúSending‚Äù and never deliver. Photo attachment just shows a black screen. Permissions are fine, tried restarting, force-stopping, logging out/in ‚Äì nothing helps. Shake-to-report stays stuck on ‚ÄúCreating report.‚Äù Works fine on desktop, but the app is broken on mobile. Please fix this ‚Äì I rely on Messenger daily and currently can‚Äôt use it properly.

Since the last update and the last android update all it does is say it's waiting for the network and I have to keep restarting my phone, or I have to u install and reintall.. and now I can't play videos or voice messages once I switch profiles. I keep reporting the bug but still nothing! This app is ridiculous.. if I jad a choice I'd ditch it!

bro lately with this recent update, I don't know if it's because of the new option to add a gif as the note but if that's so, remove that because it's lagging the app intensely. Plus, even when you put the pin for end to end encrypted messages, the messages don't get delivered (ie. just says sending).

Not functioning correctly anymore - why? I can only see the preview of pictures or links sent to me, I can no longer open them. The "new" status on messages doesn't clear after they are opened and read. I can no longer attach any photos to send. Help!!! Nothing seems to be working.

For some reason my messages just won't send. I have good WiFi, my Messenger is updated, but my messages are constantly stuck at 'sending'. It leads me to believe this is a mistake on your part. edit: This issue is becoming a problem in my daily life. I have to restart my phone 2-5 times in order for my messages on messenger to deliver. Fix this. edit 2: I am unable to communicate with anybody using messenger

the app is pretty slow overall, can't search for messages properly, and it lags a lot scrolling. It's simple and easy to use, but it doesn't really function properly. and consider adding an undo button for the "delete for me" messages. Good app, giving it a 3.

the app is great. I just hate that it won't let me load pictures once the conversation gets too long. There needs to be a way to hit a button to make your conversation scroll to the top of the conversation the same way there's one to scroll to the bottom. and recently, I've been having problems with delays when video calling. please fix this!

It's getting annoying. It takes a lot of time waiting for it to load my inbox. I'm using WiFi but somehow it doesn't load then I switched to my cellular data and it still won't load. I have to reply to my co-workers so I'm forced to send SMS to them. This goes for 3 days now. Inbox won't load, messages stuck on "Sending", Media and Voicemails errors and won't load. Fix this ASAP.

It was doing perfectly fine at first, but now it's not damn normal anymore. its always stuck on loading and sending like i have a problem with my internet connection when i dont. It got slow, and everything is late - the messages, notifications, and how late it sends. And it doesn't even show notificatios anymore. I didn't do anything for this stupid thing to happen, i have no idea whats happening and i cant use the damn app properly anymore.

title: Gym Workout Tracker: Gym Log
description: Gain muscles, endurance, max strength or get toned with Gym Workout Tracker through expertly designed sets, reps and weight! Our routines will adapt to your goal and available gym equipment to maximize your results and help you push your limits. ‚òÖ As a beginner, have no idea about how to get started and lack confidence in gym workout? ‚òÖ As an experienced bodybuilder, want to pursue some advanced challenges? ‚òÖ Look for a comprehensive workout log, planner and tracker? ‚òÖ Hesitate about paying for expensive instructors? Gym Workout Tracker can solve all the problems above! For beginners & gym rats: Gym Workout Tracker will calculate your 1RM to adjust the weight of your routines. We‚Äôll customize expertly designed routines for your different goals. And you can update the 1 RM, sets or reps anytime to keep your own pace. No more pen & paper: Log the weight and reps of each set in succession or log all sets in one click. No number limits: There are no number limits on your edits, including editing existing workout routines, creating your own routines and adding new exercises to our database. Marvelous features: ‚Ä¢ Log workout quickly and simply without pen & paper ‚Ä¢ Challenge yourself with expertly designed routines ‚Ä¢ Edit and regenerate the routines anytime you like ‚Ä¢ Create your own workout routines without number limits ‚Ä¢ 500+ exercises to keep your workout fresh and fun ‚Ä¢ Fix your exercise form with detailed visual & literal instructions ‚Ä¢ Track your progress with clear statistics and charts ‚Ä¢ Flexible overall and specified rest timer ‚Ä¢ Need no network to start your fitness journey ‚Ä¢ Use for no cost - Enjoy our expertly designed routines Waste a lot of time and effort but see little progress? Our classic courses designed by experts can help you hit specific body parts more effectively! You can update your available equipment and 1RM to edit or regenerate them if not satisfied. - Build your custom workout routines Want to form your own workout routines? What‚Äôs more, add any exercise you like if it‚Äôs not included in our database. - Track your progress by records in different forms üìù Note - feelings and tips üìä Bar chart - highest 1 RM, max weight, and max volume üìà Line chart - body weight changes üìÜ Calendar & history - workout frequency, duration and intensity
descriptionHTML:
Gain muscles, endurance, max strength or get toned with Gym Workout Tracker through expertly designed sets, reps and weight! Our routines will adapt to your goal and available gym equipment to maximize your results and help you push your limits.

‚òÖ As a beginner, have no idea about how to get started and lack confidence in gym workout?
‚òÖ As an experienced bodybuilder, want to pursue some advanced challenges?
‚òÖ Look for a comprehensive workout log, planner and tracker?
‚òÖ Hesitate about paying for expensive instructors?

Gym Workout Tracker can solve all the problems above!

For beginners & gym rats: Gym Workout Tracker will calculate your 1RM to adjust the weight of your routines. We‚Äôll customize expertly designed routines for your different goals. And you can update the 1 RM, sets or reps anytime to keep your own pace.

No more pen & paper: Log the weight and reps of each set in succession or log all sets in one click. We'll save and track your data to show you the results of your training with intuitive statistics and charts.

Rich exercise database & instructions: 500+ exercises are categorized by muscle groups, equipment or keywords for you. Our HD photos & videos and detailed instructions can help you fix your exercise form and avoid injuries.

No number limits: There are no number limits on your edits, including editing existing workout routines, creating your own routines and adding new exercises to our database.

Marvelous features:
‚Ä¢ Log workout quickly and simply without pen & paper
‚Ä¢ Challenge yourself with expertly designed routines
‚Ä¢ Edit and regenerate the routines anytime you like
‚Ä¢ Create your own workout routines without number limits
‚Ä¢ 500+ exercises to keep your workout fresh and fun
‚Ä¢ Fix your exercise form with detailed visual & literal instructions
‚Ä¢ Track your progress with clear statistics and charts
‚Ä¢ Flexible overall and specified rest timer
‚Ä¢ Need no network to start your fitness journey
‚Ä¢ Use for no cost

- Enjoy our expertly designed routines
Waste a lot of time and effort but see little progress? Our classic courses designed by experts can help you hit specific body parts more effectively! You can update your available equipment and 1RM to edit or regenerate them if not satisfied.

- Build your custom workout routines
Want to form your own workout routines? You can generate any variation out of our database without number limits and set the rest timer, weight, reps and sets as you like. What‚Äôs more, add any exercise you like if it‚Äôs not included in our database.

- Track your progress by records in different forms
üìù Note - feelings and tips
üìä Bar chart - highest 1 RM, max weight, and max volume
üìà Line chart - body weight changes
üìÜ Calendar & history - workout frequency, duration and intensity
summary: Gym Workout Planner & Tracker: Gym trainer for weightlifting & strength training

scraped_reviews.content: Half the exercises are behind a paywall. Even if im just using the app for tracking. There are random exercises I can't add to my workout. Bench is ok. Smith bench isn't. Low row is ok. Bent over row isn't. It's really stupid, and an attempt to be annoying as possible to try and get me to spend $30 a year to use a fancy spreadsheet isn't worth it. I'd pay a one time download fee, or the fee to remove the ads (there are a LOT of ads), but I'm not subscribing to pay per month. Sorry.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Devin Starr, thanks for contacting us. We take your opinion very seriously and we have passed it on to our developers. You can manually add new exercises by clicking on the "+" in the lower right corner of the "Exercises" page. Hope it helps. Any other questions or suggestions are welcome. Have a nice dayüåπ

scraped_reviews.content: This app is great for anyone wanting to get in shape All you do is add the type of equipment that you can utilize and it tailors workouts to the equipment that you have so there's no guessing. Great app I've been using it for a few months and I'm seeing physical results by staying consistent. I had to update my review, I originally gave 5 stars but I have to take 1 away because the app no longer connects the Google Fit to track workouts. Still an awesome app but I hope they get connectivity back
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Sandro George, sorry for the bad experience. The app has removed the Google Fit sync feature in the latest version, as Google has officially stopped supporting it. If you have any other questions or suggestions, feel free to reach out to us via "Me -> Feedback". We will do our best to assist you. Have a great day! ‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: I used the app, then abandoned it because a bunch of exercises I used were suddenly premium exclusive. I left a low review based on this change. Now all the exercises are back to normal. I intend to use it as long as the exercises I found originally stay free. If the things I liked about the free version stay free, then I rate it 5 stars. Great exercise catalogue and great use interface. If this change was in response to my comment, then thank you very much! Would recommend.

In general I like the App, but there are some things I don't like. such as I can't look ahead to see what exercises are coming up. you can't skip a day and move to the next for instance I had lower body, rest day, shoulders, then lower body again. my legs were still to sore to work out lower body again, but there is no way to get around it. when you need to change an exercise, the app you offer you a replacement exercise that works the same muscle groups.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Christopher Smith, thank you for sharing! We're continuously working on making improvements, and your feedback is valuable to us. If you have any further ideas or questions, feel free to contact us via "Me -> Feedback". We‚Äôre committed to making the app more effective and enjoyable for you!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: Excellent app!! I needed to transfer some of my exercises from my previous app to this one, and had no problem! Just manually put them into the exercises selection page, under their related muscle group. Only thing that I wish was available, is to "Hide" or remove the hundreds of exercises that are of completely no use to me. You still need to scroll through them to find what you are looking for. Also the trainer's suggested workouts, doesn't generate any of my added exercises into routines.

I have used quite a few fitness apps over the years, and this is a step above the most basic. Yes, you can log workouts and track history; however, this app does not support supersets (of any type). Moreover, if you do any band exercises, there is no way to just put "Green Band" or "Blue Band." The app requires a weight/resistance. Additionally, there is not support for logging cardio like treadmill or elliptical (yes, you can add those as custom, but I need custom fields for tracking distance, resistance, etc.). Finally, the app does not keep the screen on (nor does it offer the option to do so). Each time I finish an exercise and go back to my phone to log the set, I need to unlock the phone. That's annoying. Otherwise, it works as well as a spreadsheet with sound.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Roy, thank you for your support and feedback. We love to hear suggestions on how to improve the app. We‚Äôve added your wish to our list of suggested features in the future version. We will continue doing our best, and it will be great for us if you could rate again with more than 3 stars, you are the best üòç

scraped_reviews.content: Awesome app. It has tons of exercises that you can search by equipment type and muscle group, and you can also add your own. This is so helpful when you're working out with limited equipment vs. at a gym. The auto generated workouts are nice too since they suggest exercises you might not think of. The app also integrates easily with Google fit which is nice. I've gotten back into the habit of working out since using this - the added structure makes it so much easier to stick to it.

I'm going to keep if short and brief. the app is great itself, I've tried all sort of different workout apps but this one really made me do progress. I've seen changes to body, mood, etc. Problem is, you have to sync in every day so when you log back in, you don't have to repeat the same things and your calendar doesn't seem messed up.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for sharing! We're continuously working on making improvements, and your feedback is valuable to us. If you have any further ideas or questions, feel free to contact us via "Me -> Feedback". We‚Äôre committed to making the app more effective and enjoyable for you!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using this application for well over a year, and it enjoy most of it's functions. The only issue at the moment is how there are a lack of landmine, smash ball, and other various exercises. I can add them as custom exercises, but the target muscle groups are too generic and not specific enough.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Darrell Naulls, thanks so much for sharing your experience with us. We value your opinion and will consider adding new exercises to cover comprehensive body parts to meet your needs. Hope you enjoy using our app!üòÅ

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using this app for the past year and really like it I was able to select from the large number of exercises to customize upper and lower body workouts to match equipment in my gym. One month ago I had to upgrade my phone and after installing the app on the new phone tried to put in my customized programs. Unfortunately. the app will not let me add many of my exercises unless I now pay. So now I will have to look for a different app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi john, we provide various classic workouts and they are 100% free! You can also create your own custom workouts and use most of our features without paying. We will continue doing our best, and it will be great for us if you could rate again with more than 3 stars, you are the best üòç

scraped_reviews.content: Wanted to be able to track and plan my workouts. Gave up after about 10 minutes. They have leg press machines listed under arms as well as many other machines that are not correctly listed. So just finding and selecting the correct workout is incredibly time consuming and frustrating. Never even got through the bicep workout. They also have arms listed as a work out, but everyone knows you don't work your biceps and triceps at the same time.. And don't ask for 5 stars, or I'll make it a 1 star.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Nick, thank you for your support and feedback. We love hearing suggestions about how to make our app better. We will consider adjusting these features to meet your needs. Best regards. üåπ Leap Fitness Group

scraped_reviews.content: I've been using this app at the gym for a little over 2 years now and I absolutely love it! After using it for a few months I paid the one time fee to remove adds. I've created and tweaked every workout I do at the gym multiple times throughout the year to fit the season with lifting that I'm currently in. I also loved doing the plans that were put in the app back in the day, this app is great and I feel like it carries from beginner to advanced lifters very well!

This app sucks! It only lets you log certain exercises. If the exercise isn't in their list you have to pay for it! And I'm talking basis exercises like an ab machine! Don't waste your time with this app! To the developer of this app. Your response is of no help to me at all. The custom feature does not allow me to add some basic exercises like the crunch machine to my workout as I have said initially. There is a padlock next to it indicating that I would have to pay to add it. This is ludacris!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Mike Bosco, sorry for the inconvenience. Please kindly note that currently, free users can create 4 workout templates. If you want to create more, you can enjoy more premium features with a paid subscription via "Me-> Go Premium". We still offer a lot of classic workouts, which are 100% free to use. Hope you enjoy using our app.

scraped_reviews.content: Can't do much with the free version. I understand developers deserve to make money on their products and stuff, but when you can barely do anything at all without paying for a subscription to the app it becomes quite annoying. I get there is a 7 day free trial, but not everyone can afford 30 dollars a year for an app that basically just shows you different workouts you can do.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Sarai, we are always striving to meet our customers‚Äô expectations. In the Premium, you can find more workouts to meet your special needs or train your targeted parts. You're welcome to take a free-trial first, 7-day with NO charge. We'll provide new workouts and functions constantly. üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: I used to love this app. I downloaded it almost four years ago and haven't had a complaint until now. The excessive amounts of ads were something I could tolerate since it was free. If I wanted to get rid of the ads, I could pay for a premium membership. However, you now have to pay a subscription fee if you want to log certain exercises- I'm a woman, so I have to pay to log glute bridges and pistol squats. I used to recommend this app to everyone. I will never do that again. Deleting it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Miller, thanks for your feedback. As we improve and expand the app, the new subscription features help support the development of additional content and updates. We‚Äôre still committed to offering valuable free features and hope you continue to enjoy the app. Any concerns or suggestions, please reach out via "Me -> Feedback." Best wishes.‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: I have an odd set of equipment so I paid for it and it leaves a lot to be desired. I really only find it useful for tracking my own custom workouts. The "Training"and "Plan" sections will give generated workouts based on your equipment but they're wonky, where sometimes there isn't a leg day for a while, and then the workouts are locked so you can't look ahead to see it their plans will be sufficient. I'm on the lookout for something else.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Patrick Foley, thanks for your feedback. We take your opinion very seriously and we have passed it on to our developers. If you have any other questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us. We will continue to optimize our app and give you a better experience. Best wishes.üòä

scraped_reviews.content: This is my new favorite app. This app has useful functionality on its free version and the subscription for the extra premium features is affordable. It even generates new work out routines for you or you can assemble your own using the pretty comprehensive exercise library. You can narrow the library by what equipment you have available to you. It's easy to use and has a nice interface that is easy to read and isn't busy or cluttered looking.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Big thanks for your 5-star review! Your satisfaction is our top priority. We'll continue providing excellent service and making further improvements to meet your expectations.‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: I just have a couple of suggestions, firstly I would like an option where you can move the muscle groups, sometimes you have to scroll down to find a workout, it'd be better to have your own order, also it'd be cool if you could kind of "block" certain exercises that you don't like, it's kind of annoying that you have to replace/remove workouts every day, a dark mode would be cool too and an option to download all the content when you don't have data at the gym even if it's a paid feature.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thank you for your support and feedback. We love hearing suggestions about how to make our app better. We will consider adding these features to meet your needs. We'd be grateful if you could give us 5 stars, it'll inspire us to get better. Best regards. üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: Great variety of workouts available, great way to keep track of your personal bests and previous sets, etc. Edit: I've noticed a lot of common workouts are missing, like XYTs and Skierg. Also, it would be awesome if they could add warm-up exercises like Froggies, chest stretches, cobras, etc. Even if there's just a description in the custom workouts where you can fill in notes and warm-ups.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Ruben Strooh, thanks so much for sharing your experience with us. We value your opinion and will consider adding new exercises and available equipment to meet your needs. Hope you enjoy using our app!üòÅ

scraped_reviews.content: Hi team, I really enjoy your app! I wanted to share two things that I feel would make it even better: 1. It would be very helpful to have the option to enter seconds instead of reps. For example, for exercises like planks I measure by time, not reps. Having a built-in timer for these would be amazing. 2. It would be great to have a way to split an exercise into left and right, now I just manually enter the exercise twice for it
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Shargiya, thank you for sharing! We're continuously working on making improvements, and your feedback is valuable to us. If you have any further ideas or questions, feel free to contact us via "Me -> Feedback". We‚Äôre committed to making the app more effective and enjoyable for you!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: Easy and Quick. It may take a little bit to set up a custom workout, but I don't know how to make it any easier. Maybe a better search engine used to find the workout you want. But once you get to working out, it's very easy to used and make adjustments as you're working out.

I'm evaluating the app and it doesn't look bad, however, I miss a couple of features: 1. The ability to add comments on the exercises when adding them to a workout. I think you can do it during the workout, but it'd be useful to add comments when you create the workout. 2. The ability to export and download workout logs on PDF to keep them on my records, in case I stop using the app or lose the phone. I would happily pay the annual subscription if I had those features, but without them....
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Javier Almansa, thanks for reaching out! We truly appreciate your feedback and are always working to improve the app. Your ideas will definitely be considered in future optimizations. Any other feedback or help needed, feel free to contact us via "Me -> Feedback". Best wishes! üíó

scraped_reviews.content: I've been looking for a nice free app that actually helps with you workout. I can gladly say I found it! You get a small ad that you can almost immediately skip when opening the app to keep it free, and the app itself gives you accurate advice and support when doing your exercises. You can tell the app what body parts you want to train, and it makes a programme thats suited for you and you alone. Thank you to whoever made this app, you made getting into fitness so much easier for me!!!!

Serves its purpose. What I've been looking for was a simple app that already had built in workouts which I can track weekly. This workout app does it perfectly. I've been using it a couple days now, and it's great for tracking progress and really keeping up with your sets and reps and weight lifted.

I've been using this app for few days now and I must say that this app has helped me a lot. I see different people using different techniques for the same exercise, and mixing up random exercises which made me uncomfortable to ask them for help as a beginner. This app made it very simple and clear. And not just that, I am seeing positive results each day. ‚ù§Ô∏è

It shows good demonstrations on how to do the workouts you want to do, and it has many exercises you can do with or without equipment. Overall, a fantastic workout app, and I would recommend it to people who are new in the muscle industry.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Freya, thank you for your kind feedback and 5-star rating! We're thrilled to hear that our app has been helpful. It means a lot to us, and we‚Äôll keep striving to improve. If you have any more suggestions or questions, don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out via "Me -> Feedback". Best wishes! ‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: I truly love this app and how I can customize my numerous workouts with ease. I recommend this app to anyone who wants to track their own workouts or build one. My only complaint is I cannot add any form of Cardio or Sports-related activities to the workouts. It'd be nice if I could simply add Jogging or Basketball.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Thomas, thank you for sharing! We're continuously working on making improvements, and your feedback is valuable to us. If you have any further ideas or questions, feel free to contact us via "Me -> Feedback". We‚Äôre committed to making the app more effective and enjoyable for you!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: Update: Still really liking this app months later! I decided to go with the yearly pay membership and it is worth every cent. I do have one request. A share button to share the day's workout summary with my fitness group would be great. Screenshots can't get it in well. Original: So far this app is excellent. Easily customized workouts intuitive quick start design.
very easy to follow and practical for me. I'm intermediat level but use the app to make sure I cover all muscles each exercise
I've been using this app since 2023 till now and the journey is insane, best app tracker ever, this app save your logs, volume , and your time spent in the gym, ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê

So far so good! Straightforward, easy to understand, easy instructions and the animations make it easy to follow what movements you have to do per workout. It just makes things easy, as you can tell from my review. Ads are small with the occasional timed ads that are quick enough to go unnoticed. I recommend this to anyone starting
love it, wish there would be a reminder of inactivity if app kot used for a while and there is a training in progress. forgot many times to finish the workout
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Cristi Gheorghiu, thank you for sharing! We're continuously working on making improvements, and your feedback is valuable to us. If you have any further ideas or questions, feel free to contact us via "Me -> Feedback". We‚Äôre committed to making the app more effective and enjoyable for you!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: I used this app for a while and eventually paid to remove ads. I took a few weeks off and installed it on my new phone, and now there's a subscription model and half the exercises I used are behind a new paywall. I'm pretty disappointed and feel like I wasted my money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Amber, sorry for the trouble. You can still enjoy the ad-free service. The new subscription helps support our team so we can keep providing top-class services. Since our app is kept updated on your old phone, all premium features are granted by default. But if you re-download our app on a new device, the advanced functions won't work. Regards.üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: I currently have the free version but so far this app is pretty decent for setting up a plan and tracking your results. Each exercise that your suggested has an explanation of how to perform them, as well as tips to help you engage the correct muscle group. The replacement exercise option could suggest ones in similar muscle groups rather than most recent. But for what this app is even with the ads it's good to get you started on your health journey.

Wonderful app for logging workouts! Really loved how detailed it is when showing the exercises and the way it allows to log each set in a workout routine. Absolutely amazing user experience, especially with the image showing which muscle group is trained (and how much). Would love to see it showing a graph to clearly show progressive overload over time and also an ongoing notification that would show that there is a workout in progress (cause it's easy to forget to finish the ongoing workout)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Shrayan Bajracharya, thanks for your 5-star rating! ‚ú® Your support is a great encouragement for us. We‚Äôll continue working on optimizing the app to enhance your experience. Wishing you a fantastic day! ‚òÄÔ∏è

scraped_reviews.content: I love the app and use it every day, though it looks like nobody is improving it anymore. It lacks simple features, like "copy" a custom workout so you can create a new one with some changes. Also statistics on your workout could give much more.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Igor Davydkin, thanks for your feedback. We take your opinion very seriously and have passed it on to our developers. If you have any other questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us via "Me -> Feedback". We will continue to optimize our app and give you a better experience. Best wishes.üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: Being a beginner and starting older, it's great that the app you the proper way to do the exercise in an animated version. It allows you to change exercises in the event you don't have that equipment. Y are also able to regenerate an entirely new exercise working the same body part.

I previously only used this app to track weights with the exercises. ads were already obnoxious but bearable. but now they changed this app so that you need a subscription if you get above a number of different exercises, so now I can't use this for half my exercises. uninstalled, bye! I'd rather just use an excel sheet.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Wim Hak, thanks for your feedback! The new subscription features help support app improvements and updates, but we remain committed to offering many valuable free features. Feel free to let us know with any other issues. Best wishes! ‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: This app is a game changer. The training plans are effective and fully customizable to your needs. It prioritizes recovery time for optimal growth and makes tracking progress effortless with no more notebooks, and it is easy on your wallet, too.

Lifters who want a modern, intuitive log with community features. ‚ÄãHevy manages to solve the biggest problem with gym logging apps: making it fast and easy to track your lifts without sacrificing deep, meaningful data. It's quickly become a favorite for both beginners and veteran lifters who appreciate its clean interface and social element. ‚ÄãPros: ‚ÄãLightning-Fast Logging: The process of logging sets, reps, and weight is incredibly smooth. Starting a routine, supersetting exercises, and logging

This is the best gym workout app when you have a few equipment and need a clear guide on the exercises to do. Gave it four stars because it needs more automation so that the user focuses more on the workout.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Mark Xarks, thank you for sharing! We're continuously working on making improvements, and your feedback is valuable to us. If you have any further ideas or questions, feel free to contact us via "Me -> Feedback". We‚Äôre committed to making the app more effective and enjoyable for you!üåπ

scraped_reviews.content: Thus far it's been awesome. Still learning some of the functionally but then again I'm not a young man either. Pretty nice that you can include the equipment you have available and the app can generate workouts to suit. Really dig it this far.

By far the best gym tracker app and I'm very surprised it's free. The ads aren't long and you can even purchase to remove them for pretty cheap. Once you get used to the app you can easily customise workouts to suit you and keep track of kgs for every exercise.

Easy to use, friendly app, it has a cool visual. Follow your workout routine and you gonna see the result you're looking for. I've have gym experience of at least 8 years and using this app after 5 months religiously following my training schedule I'm having amazing results.

Ads do not close! App shows adds that cannot be closed. It doesn't matter how many times you hit the X symbol, the ad will not close and when I try tapping on the tiny angle to report the ad, the icon doesn't respond so the window to report the ad never opens either.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello Javier Alvarez, sorry for the inconvenience! Could you please send us a link to the specific ad you encountered? That would really help us investigate the issue more effectively. Please feel free to contact us via ‚ÄúMe -> Feedback‚Äù in the app. Best wishes.üíó

scraped_reviews.content: Update: I once paid to remove apps, but the app is suddenly asking for a subscription, and I'm locked out of random exercises. There was no notification to a change in pricing model, which is a bad practice. I'm not willing to pay for a subscription just to track exercises. It makes 0 sense when you are not actively adding content. ---- Simple, easy to use and most importantly, an honest premium model. Custom or auto generated fitness plan, keeps track of everything I need, highly recommend!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Joice, sorry for the inconvenience. As we continue to improve and expand the app, the new subscription model helps support the development of additional content and updates. We genuinely appreciate your input and will work hard to ensure that all users feel valued and supported. All the best!‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: Great app, simple but with everything you needüëç There are suggestions for improvement: 1. When there are exercises in which a stopwatch can be useful (for example, such as a plank), it would be cool if you could set the time you need to stand, and not just 1 approach. 2. It would also be useful to set the rest time between approaches and between exercises separately, so that you can make it different.

I never give 1-star ratings, but this app is scummy. They hide the fact that you need to pay for most of the features for the first 24-48 hours, providing them for free. I created my exercise routine and tracked my progress, when suddenly it mostly got locked behind a paywall. I don't mind paying for in-app purchases, but tricking me into using the app and then locking my progress until I pay is terrible!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Benjamin Lieder, thanks for your feedback. The new subscription helps support our team, allowing us to continue offering high-quality services and a wide range of exercises and features, many of which are still free. title: Bluesky
description:
Bluesky is THE NEW SOCIAL NETWORK for people who stay online and up-to-date. News, jokes, gaming, art, hobbies, and whatever you're into is happening here. Short text posts make for a quick read during coffee, an easy way to wind down the day, or a great way to get connected to your community. Follow your favorite posters or pick from one of the 25,000 feeds to find your people. Join millions of users to be part of the moment and have some fun again.

YOUR TIMELINE, YOUR CHOICE
Stay in touch with your friends, stay up-to-date on the latest news, or explore with an algorithm that learns what you like. On Bluesky, you choose your own feed.

CONTROL YOUR SCROLL
Stack powerful blocks, mutes, moderation lists, and content filters. You‚Äôre in control.

SOME OF THE OLD, ALL OF THE NEW
Let‚Äôs have fun online again. Be yourself and riff with your friends, all while having the option to keep tabs on what‚Äôs happening at a global scale. It all happens on Bluesky.

title: Disney+
description:
Disney+ is the streaming home of your favorite stories. With beloved movies and series from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, National Geographic, there's always something to explore. Stream the latest movie releases, exclusive Original series, and highly anticipated matchups all in Disney+.


Stream Originals like Marvel Studios‚Äô Loki and fan favorites like Encanto and The Simpsons.

With a Disney+ subscription plan you will get to experience:
‚Ä¢ Exclusive new Originals from Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars, and National Geographic.
‚Ä¢ Access to new releases, timeless classics, and past seasons of your favorite TV shows.
‚Ä¢A live feed of ABC News and Streams that offer carefully curated, continuous programming based on seasonality or interest, from across the Disney+ library*
‚Ä¢ Over 100 titles in 4K UHD and HDR.
‚Ä¢ The ability to watch on multiple screens at once at no extra cost.
‚Ä¢ Multiple parental control features including Profile PIN and Kid-Proof Exit. Easily adjust a profile‚Äôs Content Rating settings for a viewing experience that suits everyone
‚Ä¢ IMAX Enhanced, see the full scale and scope with IMAX's expanded aspect ratio. Available with certain Marvel and Pixar titles and accessible on all devices where Disney+ is supported.
‚Ä¢ A curated selection of unlocked Hulu content in the Hulu hub within the Disney+ app.**
‚Ä¢ A curated selection of highly anticipated live sports events, ESPN Originals, and studio programming in the ESPN hub within the Disney+ app**

For help with Disney+, please visit: http://help.disneyplus.com
For our Subscriber Agreement and other policies please visit: https://disneyplus.com/legal/subscriber-agreement
Your California Privacy Rights: https://www.disneyplus.com/legal/your-california-privacy-rights
Do Not Sell My Information: https://www.disneyplus.com/legal/privacy-policy

The content available on Disney+ may vary by region. Some titles shown above may not be available in your country.

*Select Streams are currently available only with the Disney+ Premium plan. ABC News is not rated and will require a profile's Content Rating settings to be set to TV-MA. All other Streams are rated on a program-by-program basis.

**Content subject to change. U.S. residents, 18+ only. A limited selection of content from Hulu and ESPN are now available to all Disney+ subscribers. To access the full ESPN on Disney+ and Hulu on Disney+ experiences, you must bundle those services with your Disney+ subscription.
