scraped_reviews.content: Disney + is the glitchiest streaming service ever. I've had so many days unable to do anything because I've spent the entire day, sometimes multiple days, trying to fix Disney +. even customer service is useless because they don't know anything and can't access anything. If their shows and movies were available elsewhere, I would get rid of Disney + in a heartbeat. Even paying for commercial free, still has commercials occasionally. Extremely disappointed.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! Sorry for the trouble. To resolve the issue, please test your Wi-Fi connection by referring to the article titled (Internet connection tests) on the Disney+ help site. If needed, reset your router. After that, relaunch the app and ensure its updated. If the issue continues, feel free to contact us via chat or call 1-888-905-7888.

scraped_reviews.content: When using Chromecast, rewinding either goes back 1 to 2 seconds or it decides to fast forward to near the end of what you're watching. If you want to resume watching something, it doesn't pick up where you left off.nit starts right back at the beginning again and you have to guess where you left off. It's worrying that this is the app they plan on going with for all their platformsn (Disney, Hulu and ESPN). It sucks.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Bev! We appreciate your feedback. Please clear the app cache, reinstall the app, and restart your Chromecast by unplugging it for 30 seconds before plugging it back in. Ensure both the Disney+ app and Google Home app are updated. If issues continue, contact us at 1-888-905-7888 for personalized assistance.

scraped_reviews.content: Reconnecting to the casting device is a problem every single time with your app. additionally, the fact that I have to enable subtitles every single time I want to cast means that I have to go through extra steps every time. If not for the content in the App, I would uninstall and unsubscribe. UPDATE: Since my 5 other streaming apps have no issues with my network, these steps are not helpful at all. The issue is with your app, not my home network.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please test your Wi-Fi connection following our "Internet connection tests" article on the help site. If necessary, reset your router, update the app and device, clear the device cache, and relaunch the app as described on our help site. If still unresolved, please reach out directly at 1-888-905-7888.

scraped_reviews.content: This app is trash. I travel for work, and I find myself in areas/situations where I won't have internet for prolonged periods of time. So, I rely on downloaded-offline content quite a bit. I set my app to download a five season series. I also tried it on many different internet connections with the same result. The app simply refuses to download in a reasonable manner. I shouldn't set it to download and come back hours later only to find out that 1.2GB of data was actually downloaded.

Doesn't seem to matter what device you're using it on, phone, native television app, streaming device, it's complete garbage. Constant "unable to connect" or "Internet not available" messages when every other app works perfectly fine. Video will pause for at least 30 seconds and then fast-forward that entire time in 3 or 4 seconds without audio so you can't actually watch anything.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! It sounds incredibly frustrating to deal with those connectivity issues and playback problems, especially when everything else is working fine. We want to ensure a smoother experience for you. If you could provide more details through the support options in the app, it would greatly help us improve. Your feedback is truly valuable!

scraped_reviews.content: This app works like garbage, honestly. The content is only worth the nostalgic classics. I will play a movie, pause it and come back later, and it never resumes from where it was paused. Every single time it starts over from the the beginning and I have to sit through an insane amount of ads to fast forward to my guesstimated spot. If it's past a built in ad break, I'm watching way way more ads than I should have to in order to RESUME a movie. How is it THIS garbage?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Cyn! Sorry for the trouble. If you experience issues again, please start with basic troubleshooting by reinstalling the app and restarting your device. If on a TV or smart device, unplug the power cable for 30 seconds before turning back on. If the issue continues, contact us via chat or call 1-888-905-7888. We're here to help!

scraped_reviews.content: the app is constantly messing up, whether it be when a payment is made for it or leading up to a payment being taken out. it gives the message of Sorry, something went wrong. Please update your software. The software is updated. for the amount I pay every month it better be working, because otherwise what's the point of you charging a high amount of the product is gonna continue having issues that haven't been fixed..... please fix this or the rating stays!.......
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the trouble. Please Confirm the number of devices affected and try reinstalling the app and restarting your device. Make sure the app is updated as well. Test your Wi-Fi connection on our help site under "internet connection tests." Reset your router if necessary. If problems persist, reach out to us via chat or call 1-888-905-7888.

scraped_reviews.content: The app constantly freezes while watching movies on Google TV. It's not my internet connection because I have a lot of the other major streaming services and they don't have the same issue. The Disney perks pop-up every time a screen changes is extra lame, and it happens at least twice just to put on Bluey. Disney wasn't always this bad, so hopefully it gets better soon before I replace it with a different streaming service. Update to dev: I have uninstalled and reset multiple times, no help.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Chris! Sorry for the trouble. If you experience issues again, please try basic troubleshooting by reinstalling the app and restarting your device. If on a TV or smart device, unplug the power cable for 30 seconds before turning back on. If the issue continues, contact us via chat or call 1-888-905-7888. We're here to help!

scraped_reviews.content: There are constantly problems with each device we're logged into as a family of 7. Shows/Movies freeze, they will lose sound, and then the movie plays extremely fast, sometimes its the right frame and wrong words. Now it's saying there's too many households and will not allow for me to update it. I now can not access it from my living room. I have logged out of all devices to try and start again but then didn't log anyone out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rachel! We're sorry for the inconvenience! We definitely want to look into this with you. When you have a chance, please reach out via phone by calling +1-888-905-7888. Talk to you soon!

scraped_reviews.content: The app has constant and consistent issues during normal playback, like becoming unresponsive or timing out while casting video. Disney is also pretty terrible as a company, especially when it comes to how they handle ABC and ESPN. The only reason I haven't uninstalled is because I got it as part of a package deal that basically made it free. I wouldn't pay for it.

So many issues. The layout is horrible. The app gives random error messages while browsing, streaming, and watching. Sometimes it continues with what you are doing, sometimes it goes back to the homescreen when an error message pops up. It now refuses to fully connect to Chromecast (I've tried multiple gens and devices). The Disney logo, and the annoying chime, will cast for a minute, then it disconnects with error message. Not calling tech support again; I haven't got 2 hours to waste.

App is horrible! I have the plan with ads. It never remembers where I left off anytime I go to resume watching something. I have to write down where I left off so I don't forget. If u try to resume watching something, it just plays ads and starts over from the beginning. The 10 second skip options hardly ever work. U can't skip ahead back to where you left off half the time as it plays ads and starts over again. What a joke!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the trouble, Ryan. How many devices are being affected the same way? If you haven't already, try reinstalling the app and restarting the device. If on a TV or smart device, unplug the power cable for 30 seconds before turning back on. If still unresolved, please contact us via chat or phone at 1-888-905-7888. We'd love to help!

scraped_reviews.content: App works great! I cannot only afford the ad supported payment plan. I understand that ads will be subsiding my monthly fee. However, is it really necessary to have up to 4 or 5 1:30 to 3:00 mins advertisements during a show that lasts about 24 mins? I know movies and shows are expensive. But Disney is richer than many countries out there, surely there is a better balance to be found. One that doesn't break the bank or ones peace of mind watching the same 2 ads again & again-ad infinitum.

Ads expected, but need improvement. If you miss the first few seconds after an ad and back up, you have to watch ALL the ads again, you can't skip repeating ad blocks like you can with other apps. Also, the ads are louder than the show, like 3-5 clicks louder, just like broadcast TV. There ought to be a law against this, it hurts my ears, and family members with sensitive either ears can hear the show or must cover their ears during ads. I will be first in line for an ad-mute for my device.

Ever since the MyDisney account rollout, there has been NOTHING but problems with Disney+ and Hulu when logging into our account. It's unusable on mobile and randomly logs out on our Roku device. I haven't been able to use the app for over a month on my phone since login just throws a "Something went wrong. Try again?" error. EDIT: I have tried troubleshooting this problem. It isn't a playback issue, I literally can not log in on mobile at all.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello! We‚Äôre sorry for the trouble you're experiencing. Please check your internet connection and restart your device, then relaunch the app and try playing the video again in a few minutes. We encourage you to contact us directly at +1-888-905-7888 for further assistance so we can help resolve this for you. Thank you for your patience!

scraped_reviews.content: if you are trying to stream to your TV via chromecast it is sub par. always popping up with a "an error has occurred" but it still streams. if you're watching a show and you aren't in the app and want to "skip the intro" - you have to open the app and start all over..while it's still streaming. when you select the episode to skip intro it just starts over. it's annoying to say the least.

Disney plus advertisers ESPN content but you can't access it without paying $30 extra a month. It is complete b******* and money gouging. Don't advertise content that isn't available. Support isn't particularly helpful for streaming problems they tell you to do what you've already done, like restarting a device or reinstalling the app. The problem really is that Disney plus forces you to use the maximum amount of streaming data. There is no option to lower the resolution to help with streaming

Absolutely useless app. 5 bars of 5G and it's unable to play a movie for more than a minute without buffering until closing. But the ads run great if I get there. No buffering on those. My kid wanted to watch a movie on Disney, but now I know why I was smart to not pay for it originally I'm not sure what they're trying to pull, but there's no way that a single movie is pulling 1G of data to play intermittently. Here's to hoping they have to sell off to another company that isn't trash.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Sorry for the trouble, Joe. Please check if other apps/devices are experiencing similar issues. Try clearing the app cache, reinstalling the app, and restarting your device. Ensure both the app and device are updated. Test your Wi-Fi connection on our help site and reset your router if needed. For further assistance, call us at 1-888-905-7888.

scraped_reviews.content: At first, the apped work fine. It worked like every streaming app. Then, one day, it would give me an error code and blame the wi-fi. Although my wi-fi may not be the best its over all good. I tried restarting, deleting, and reinstalling the app. I tried everything, and nothing seemed to be working. I know its not my wi-fi because every other streaming app works just fine. Its only this single app that I have a problem with.

scraped_reviews.content: (phone) WORST streaming experience out of all platforms I'm on. I buffers every 2 minutes but then races ahead like it's been playing the whole time; mutes randomly as well. scraped_reviews.content: I don't have issues with ADs. I get it in Hulu, Netflix and other streaming services. they have fixed Ads and the interface works fine. But here, the interface is bad, half watched videos always starts from first, so it starts with an Ad. Then I am forced to fast-forward and I get 1-2 ads for that. Then I get ads between videos which is expected. Then in-between the video the TV casting issues shows up, so I have to disconnect and start all over again. I got 15-20 Ads for watching 2 episodes.

Thank you for your support!

scraped_reviews.content: works great in a perfect ideal situation. try to travel? problems downloading. driving down I5 for a road trip? moving won't work. can't connect. traveling to Mexico or Canada? sorry can't download or play movies even with full service. home connected to wifi, sure works great. anywhere else you can't access, play, or download anything. horrible app. troubleshoot, reset, close, open, reinstall all you want and nothing.

I'm about to be done with it and go back to netflix and least with them I know the app works.

scraped_reviews.content: I thought Hidive was the worst streaming app, but this app just won. I have the best connection money can buy yet the app still runs like it's on McDonald's wifi. I've not had connection problems like this with my other streaming apps. I can't believe Disney prides itself on being "the best streaming app" yet puts out mediocre garbage. I can't even see my entire watchlist. I've NEVER seen a streaming service have that problem. EVER. This is just upsetting. Also downloaded content rarely works.

scraped_reviews.content: Ads freeze and make you exit the playback and restart the ad cycle. Happens multiple times in an episode and you end up watching 15-20 minutes of ads for a 40 minute episode. scraped_reviews.content: You can't go to the shows' details. You can only hit play on whatever episode is on the menu screens. You can scroll to the credits of that episode, which then cues the next episode. Only then will the "see all episodes" option appear (maybe), and if you're quick enough, you can go to the episodes menu. scraped_reviews.content: I have uninstalled and re-installed 3 times, tried 2 TVs, 2 tablets, my cellphone and a desktop and have yet to be able to watch an entire movie or show without 75% of it glitching. I have 1TB internet and it still doesn't work, after reading all the other reviews, I don't feel so bad since it doesn't seem to work for anyone. Disappointed to the fullest. Waste of money.

scraped_reviews.content: Why do we have an option to cast, but the app is always unable to do so no matter how many times I reset both devices, check for updates, and ensure a strong Wi-Fi signal, which both devices are connected to? I'm never able to cast. When I go to YouTube, it casts without issues, but when I switch to Disney, it says to make sure my device is connected to the same Wi-Fi with a strong signal, which it already is?

scraped_reviews.content: I have been a subscriber since day one of Disney+. This is not review about the app but the service itself. Every year when it's time to renew my subscription the price goes up. I pay for a year of ad free service. But ad free is NOT actually ad free! I'm getting ads telling me that there are new episodes of a Disney show before the show I selected plays. I don't care if they are just Disney promos they are still ads when I pay nearly $200 a year for no ads. I will be canceling my subscription.

Worst of all the streaming apps by far. great content but lots of freezing, streaming errors, and buffering. I have to reinstall the phone and TV apps at least every other week to deal with errors (worse on TV but still bad on my phone). If Disney/Hulu didn‚Äôt have some great shows I'm still watching I'd cancel my membership in a heartbeat. HBO, Netflix, and Prime do not have any of the same issues!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Benjamin! Sorry for the trouble. To resolve any app issues or playback trouble, please visit this article on the Disney+ help site titled (How to fix streaming issues). If still unresolved, contact us via chat or phone at 1-888-905-7888. We'd love to help!

scraped_reviews.content: While I appreciate watching the shows and movies on this platform, I do NOT appreciate the fact that I have more time viewing commercials than the actual program I want to watch. I watched a 22 minute show which took an hour because before, during and after we're commercials. about 38 minutes of commercials (I did the math) for my 22 minute show.... RIDICULOUS!!! I am paying to watch shows, NOT MORE COMMERCIALS THAN SHOWTIME!!!

I've never had a problem with any other streaming service,except for this one. I have to restart the app MULTIPLE TIMES just to be able to get through one episode of the series I'm watching. My internet connection is fine, Ive cleared the cache, I've uninstalled it and reinstalled it, I've done everything. I've been dealing with this since I got the app in 2021 and I am so done.

scraped_reviews.content: The app used to work great, but in the last 3 weeks, it doesn't matter where I am, whether I'm on wifi or not, whatever I'm watching will freeze for several seconds, & when it resumes there won't be any audio, & sometimes the video is sped up. I've closed the app out & reopened it, uninstalled & reinstalled it, & turned my phone off & back on- nothing helps. Just this morning, trying to get through one episode was ridiculous- I've had to restart it 6 times, & I'm only halfway through. FIX THIS!!

scraped_reviews.content: Update 10/2025 This app has gotten worse, and they raise their prices, really! Fix the Details option that doesn't work to show episodes in the continue watching section. Old: App doesn't work. It buffers and buffers and says content loading error all the time. I've tried uninstalling but that didn't work. title: Daylio Journal - Mood Tracker
description: Daylio Diary enables you to keep a private journal without having to type a single line. Try this beautifully designed, easy-to-use diary, journal & mood tracker app for FREE! üòÅ WHAT IS DAYLIO Daylio is a powerful, all-in-one journal, diary, and mood tracker that helps you understand yourself better. Use it as a private diary, gratitude journal, or mental health tool to support your emotional well-being. Whether you're tracking mood swings, forming new habits, setting goals, or managing anxiety, Daylio adapts to your needs. It's perfect for: - Mental health support - Tracking depression, anxiety, or bipolar disorder - Practicing self-care and emotional awareness - Supporting therapy or CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy) - Staying organized with goals and routines - Building habits and boosting wellness Exercise, reflect, journal, and care for your mental and emotional health. With just a few taps, you‚Äôll create a meaningful record of your day and boost your clarity, motivation, and emotional relief. We built Daylio on three key principles: ‚úÖ Improve your mental health by reflecting on your mood and activities ‚úÖ Understand emotional patterns, behaviors, and triggers ‚úÖ Build new habits in a distraction-free, low-effort environment ü§î HOW IT WORKS Select your mood (or emotion) and activities. Add notes, photos, or even audio recordings to create a rich, personal journal. Daylio then visualizes your emotional patterns in charts and statistics, so you can learn what impacts your mood and discover what makes you feel your best. Track your mental health, emotions, habits, and goals ‚Äî all in one app. üåü FEATURES YOU'LL LOVE ‚≠ê One-tap mood tracking ‚≠ê Daily journal entries with text, photos, and audio notes ‚≠ê Beautiful icons to personalize your activity tracking ‚≠ê Insightful charts for mood, habits, goals, and routines ‚≠ê Weekly, monthly, and yearly mood stats ‚≠ê 'Year in Pixels' mood map ‚≠ê Daily reminders to keep journaling consistent ‚≠ê Lock your diary with a PIN or fingerprint ‚≠ê Customize themes and moods with fun emojis ‚≠ê Create, track, and achieve personal goals ‚≠ê Form and maintain positive habits ‚≠ê Back up your private journal to Google Drive ‚≠ê Export your entries to PDF or CSV format ‚≠ê Discover emotional patterns and boost productivity ‚≠ê Perfect for ADHD, anxiety, or depression support ‚≠ê Designed to complement therapy, mindfulness, or CBT Daylio is a safe space for your feelings, thoughts, and growth. It's your personal companion for better self-care, improved mental health, and increased wellbeing. üîí PRIVACY AND SECURITY Daylio is a 100% private journal app. Your data is stored locally on your device ‚Äî we never collect or store your entries. Backups are optional and encrypted via your private Google Drive. - No data is sent to our servers - No one can access your private diary, not even us - No ads, no tracking, no third-party interference Daylio gives you full control over your journal and mental health data, offering peace of mind alongside emotional insight. üìù START YOUR JOURNALING JOURNEY Start tracking your mood and building positive habits today with Daylio ‚Äî the free mood tracker, diary, and journal app that helps you live with more intention, awareness, and clarity. Download now to take the first step toward better mental health and a happier you!
descriptionHTML:
Daylio Diary enables you to keep a private journal without having to type a single line.

Try this beautifully designed, easy-to-use diary, journal & mood tracker app for FREE!

üòÅ WHAT IS DAYLIO

Daylio is a powerful, all-in-one journal, diary, and mood tracker that helps you understand yourself better. Use it as a private diary, gratitude journal, or mental health tool to support your emotional well-being. Whether you're tracking mood swings, forming new habits, setting goals, or managing anxiety, Daylio adapts to your needs.

It's perfect for:

- Mental health support
- Tracking depression, anxiety, or bipolar disorder
- Practicing self-care and emotional awareness
- Supporting therapy or CBT (Cognitive Behavioral Therapy)
- Staying organized with goals and routines
- Building habits and boosting wellness

Exercise, reflect, journal, and care for your mental and emotional health. With just a few taps, you‚Äôll create a meaningful record of your day and boost your clarity, motivation, and emotional relief.

We built Daylio on three key principles:
‚úÖ Improve your mental health by reflecting on your mood and activities
‚úÖ Understand emotional patterns, behaviors, and triggers
‚úÖ Build new habits in a distraction-free, low-effort environment

ü§î HOW IT WORKS

Select your mood (or emotion) and activities. Add notes, photos, or even audio recordings to create a rich, personal journal. Daylio then visualizes your emotional patterns in charts and statistics, so you can learn what impacts your mood and discover what makes you feel your best.

Track your mental health, emotions, habits, and goals ‚Äî all in one app.

üåü FEATURES YOU'LL LOVE

‚≠ê One-tap mood tracking
‚≠ê Daily journal entries with text, photos, and audio notes
‚≠ê Beautiful icons to personalize your activity tracking
‚≠ê Insightful charts for mood, habits, goals, and routines
‚≠ê Weekly, monthly, and yearly mood stats
‚≠ê 'Year in Pixels' mood map
‚≠ê Daily reminders to keep journaling consistent
‚≠ê Lock your diary with a PIN or fingerprint
‚≠ê Customize themes and moods with fun emojis
‚≠ê Create, track, and achieve personal goals
‚≠ê Form and maintain positive habits
‚≠ê Back up your private journal to Google Drive
‚≠ê Export your entries to PDF or CSV format
‚≠ê Discover emotional patterns and boost productivity
‚≠ê Perfect for ADHD, anxiety, or depression support
‚≠ê Designed to complement therapy, mindfulness, or CBT

Daylio is a safe space for your feelings, thoughts, and growth. It's your personal companion for better self-care, improved mental health, and increased wellbeing.

üîí PRIVACY AND SECURITY

Daylio is a 100% private journal app. Your data is stored locally on your device ‚Äî we never collect or store your entries. Backups are optional and encrypted via your private Google Drive.

- No data is sent to our servers
- No one can access your private diary, not even us
- No ads, no tracking, no third-party interference
Daylio gives you full control over your journal and mental health data, offering peace of mind alongside emotional insight.

üìù START YOUR JOURNALING JOURNEY

Start tracking your mood and building positive habits today with Daylio ‚Äî the free mood tracker, diary, and journal app that helps you live with more intention, awareness, and clarity.

Download now to take the first step toward better mental health and a happier you!
summary: Daily Journal, Private Diary, Journal with Lock, Habits & Goals, Mental Health

scraped_reviews.content: 5 Stars. It's a great journal app, and I love the personalization that premium offers. The one and only thing that keeps me from fully committing is the lack of an hourly view. I would *love* to be able to see the mood by hour throughout the day for daily energy tracking and such. I think it would fit in beautifully with the stated goals and purposes of the app. Other than that, it's very nice, and I would definitely recommend it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks a lot for the awesome review and thoughtful feedback üåü We love your idea about an hourly view ‚Äî it fits perfectly with Daylio‚Äôs vibe! We‚Äôll share it with our team for future updates üôå

scraped_reviews.content: Great! I've used it for a while and probably one of the longest been on a dairy app. wish it had a website version and transcription, but super incredible service. Easy to see snap shots of my mood and feelings and see what affects me. (4/8/23) Update: adding that I've stuck with this and it's made Journaling so easy. Best app and so simple for my needs. Just wish had PC compatibility, but I do know some work around.

Daylios has been an incredible app! I've used it since 2018. However, today I encountered an error where it will not let me add any more entries, and since this morning it has become worse - now the app crashes upon opening. I have restarted the app, cleared my cache, cleared all app data, reinstalled, everything. Nothing works. Edit: my bad. I was using the "greater than" and "less than" symbols in an attempted entry, causing the app to read parts of my written entry as data.

I love it. I've been keeping track of everything in here on a spreadsheet for the past 5 years, and no idea about this app until a month ago and it's great. Though one big thing I would like to see changed is to have the ability to change when your day starts. For instance, if I log an entry at 2am, I want it to still count towards the previous day. I think for most people anything before 4 am is like the previous day. I would just like the option, but otherwise, this app is awesome!

I started using Daylio eight years ago or so, kept up with it for a few years and then lost track. I recently picked it back up and the newer interface feels easier to work with and manage more complexity in my day and tracking. I appreciate the thoughtfulness in this app to tracking as well as the way the moods can be interconnected and grouped to facilitate better analysis. It feels accessible and non intrusive so I can still log while I'm feeling low energy.

I am simply addicted to this app in the best way possible. It allows you to track exactly what you want and how you want. It was always a pain trying to remember to do something or go back to a Database to track what caused what. There are many separate apps to track specific things but none like Daylio that allows you to customize everything. Thanks guys!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: That‚Äôs awesome to hear! üòç We love that Daylio‚Äôs flexibility works so well for you. Sounds like you‚Äôve really made it your own ‚Äî exactly how it‚Äôs meant to be! Thanks a bunch for the kind words üíõ

scraped_reviews.content: I've never been good at keeping a journal, but with the daily reminders on my phone from Daylio, I'm over 100 days of logging! The format is customizable and simple to complete each day. I haven't done much looking back at the entries, but I expect those times will come to either jog my memory or provide timing of historical events. We'll see where it goes!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: That‚Äôs amazing ‚Äî over 100 days is such an awesome streak! üéâüíú So glad the reminders and simple format are working for you. Even if you‚Äôre not looking back much now, you‚Äôre building a really valuable record that‚Äôll be there whenever you want to reflect or remember. Keep it up!

scraped_reviews.content: I enjoy and love having this app on my phone. It's very convenient on the go when you want to record what activities you've done, thoughts you had, things you're going to do, etc. I also like being able to customize lists or categories. I've used this app mostly to record my life journey and you can go back and download/print/ share. Thanks a bunch!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: That‚Äôs so wonderful to hear üíõ We love that you‚Äôre using Daylio to capture your life journey and make it truly your own with custom lists and categories. Thanks a bunch for sharing your kind words ‚Äî it really means a lot to us! üôå

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using the paid version of this app for over 2 years. I used the free for about a year before that. I love how you can add custom categories and activities. I also love the memories that pop up and show you what you were doing years ago and what has changed. Adding my daylio journal with my pictures every night is part of my evening routine and brings me a lot of peace. There are also reports it runs for you and allows you to see correlations between your activities! Love Love!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you, Rebecca‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: This is an amazing app! I love that you can document your day from the past as well. I think an awesome thing would be like a custom color thing so you can choose the colors and a random color thing so every day it's a new color scheme! That would be awesome. Edit: back to using this app after some time and they introduced the option to change colors!! I think it is so cool :D of course, still 5 stars from me üíï
scraped_reviews.replyContent: ‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: Love this app. I have an idea that could make it even better. This feature exists on other apps like Signal Messenger and most web browsers (done automatically in the browser's incognito mode). It's to have the option to request an incognito or private mode on the keyboard. It would be good to have as little unwanted data collection as possible on our most sensitive thoughts.

I‚Äôve been using Daylio since February this year, and it‚Äôs honestly one of the best habit and mood tracking apps out there! üí´ It takes hardly 2 minutes to log my daily activities, and I love how simple and intuitive it feels. üïí You can set personal goals, track your daily mood, and the monthly reports are super insightful ‚Äî I actually look forward to checking them! üìäüòä Perfect for anyone who wants to build habits, reflect on their days, and stay mindful ‚Äî all without spending too much time.

Great App! I'm just starting but I have a feeling I will be doing it a lot more often. It would be great if they had a journal journey that came with something to ponder deeply about and then speak from the heart. Capturing soul moments like this used to be my favorite daily task. With Daylio It will be again. Give it a try, the free version will blow your journal taking socks off.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you, Zoe. We appreciate your feedback and kind words! Stay tuned!‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: This app is amazing! whomever thought of it & designed it was brilliant. helps me keep track of my mood. The things I do on the daily. reminds me to keep up with daily activities and chores. I love taking photos of nature, family, etc so I post my top three to five favorite photos of the day or affirmations. I will even post a picture of my sleep pattern from my watches app. it helps me to see my sleep pattern. I can't say enough about this app. I absolutely love it!! highly recommend!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Wow, thank you so much! üíõ It‚Äôs amazing to hear how Daylio fits so perfectly into your routine ‚Äî from tracking moods and habits to saving your favorite photos and even sleep patterns! We‚Äôre so glad it‚Äôs helping you stay mindful and organized.

scraped_reviews.content: the lifetime unlock never has a sale. the app functions well and has some neat features but I found myself not using the app as much over time due to being locked out of certain functions. I don't want to pay a subscription so it is what it is. if you want a very simple daily journal experience this app works well on that front. if you want anything more you'll have to consider the paid options. I opted to uninstall.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Rachelle, thanks for your valuable feedback. We know that not everybody wants to pay for the premium, we get it. For now, we are putting only the subscriptions on sale, but we have noted your suggestion about lifetime sale. If there is anything else we can do better, just let us know at hello@daylio.net. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: I absolutely love this app. There are ads or limited use I think, and its $18 monthly, but its the best I've found and love how customizable it is so I'm ok with paying for it. I also love the multiple quotes throughout the day. One thing I'd like to see added is monthly prompts instead of only daily and weekly prompts which available at the moment. You can add pictures to your daily moods and have a variety of widgets to add to home screen too. has weekly tables of what you did as well.

This app has been very helpful in tracking my mood and the various factors that affect my mood, and finding patterns and triggers. I like that I can add as many things to track as I want and there are lots of emojis to choose from. Having this data helps me more with my psychiatrist appointments. I wish there was something similar I could use to track chronic pain with a pain scale. I use another app but it doesn't give weekly or monthly reports and I find those in daylio helpful.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: ‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: The best journaling and mood tracking app there is! I've been using it every single day since 2017. It can be as simple as choosing your mood and that's it, or as detailed as adding activities, photos, and a journal entry. It's very helpful for looking at patterns in mood changes and logging experiences.

so far this app is pretty impressive. I just love the user interface. it's so unique and beautiful. It motivates me to track myself in an area that I lack in, emotional awareness. I'm grateful I found this app! although I will say I'm tired of all the apps having you subscribe! granted this one isn't too expensive. I think they're giving me a deal which is why it's like $11.88 a year but still there should be a one and done payment for these kind of apps!

I love this app so much, no other tracking app is anywhere near as good as this one. One thing I would love is for pop-ups of more categories to pop up only if you click a certain thing. (Example make an "ate breakfast" activity and be able to have it then pop up a new category to specify what food for something)

Wonderful app! The ability to add your own tracking variables, e.g. menstruation, additional moods, productivity variables, health goals etc makes it so much more useful than other apps. The paid version can show you associations between your mood and these variables, and 3 month graphs etc. Unfortunately it's unclear where euthymic mood is and where is it above or below the normal variation, which limits professional interpretation when tracking mood disorders.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you, Justine. We appreciate it!‚ù§Ô∏è

scraped_reviews.content: I love this app! I have Bipolar 2 & it really helps me track my moods & triggers. Ive been using it since 2022. Mostly everything is free, which is a BIG factor for me. There's small things to purchase but doesnt limit you in any way. The stats are amazing and so so helpful. You can customize everything so it is all tailored to you. You can back up your info and search old entries really easily. They have yearly reports and the visual stats are so helpful.

The most life-changing and reliable app I've ever used. It's been 4+ years, a few device changes, and many ups and downs, but I've never lost a single entry and the app has never strayed from its original concept, only improved and improved on what they do so well. The paid version is also absolutely worth its money and transfers devices well too, which is a rare find in other apps I've seen. Endlessly versatile, incredibly motivating, and all-around completely awesome!!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your review. It really means a lot to us üòä.

scraped_reviews.content: Quick easy way to track your moods! I've always hated keeping a diary, or anything that took too long... but when I started new routines, medications, or seeing new people, I was able to see how my mood was affected in graphs charts... and even correlations with activities! All I do, is take 2 minutes to answer a pop up that I scheduled every day at 9p. Super easy and helpful!!

Pros: This app is great for keeping track of your moods over the days, and since I have depression/anxiety/etc, being able to see the fluctuation of my moods is really helpful. It's easy and quick to make an entry and if you miss a day you can go back and fill it in. Cons: There's some adds that get in the way a tiny bit, and even though it's not a big issue they're still annoying. Also, it doesn't have a specific graph that shows what your moods are around different activities, which'd be great.

Overall, a useful app for keeping track of daily ups and downs (multiple times a day, if you like). I like being able to define my own tasks and moods. Slightly annoyed that basic color changes (themes) are behind the paywall, but that's not a huge deal. However, sometimes a full-screen ad pops up when I start the program, and I can't figure out how to close the ad and get to the program except to close the program and reopen it; design fail! Otherwise, definitely give this a shot.

Listen, I hate that tracking multiple goals is locked behind a subscription. But focusing just on what the free version does, it does it very well. The daily mood tracking is a valuable tool with great customization, even for free users. If there was an option for a lifetime license in app for $20-70, I'd pay it in an instant. I just don't do subscriptions.

Convenient simple journal I think having to pay a monthly premium for certain icons is silly, a monthly price is crazy when there's so many free journals available. I would pay a 1 time fee If reasonable though. What drew me to this app was the simplicity of choosing pre-made icons for daily activities & moods. I was looking for my son, not myself, he's not much of a writer, so I think this'll be good for him. Theoretically, If used, it's a nice & simple way to track your daily activities.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Daniele, is there something we can do to get 5 stars? Please let us know at hello@daylio.net.

scraped_reviews.content: I have been using this app since 2019, after I'd climbed myself out of a severe depressive episode. I had participated in a program that would check in with the people every hour, as moods can change. I thought that was very helpful, and while I may not check in with myself as often as back then, I do it routinely before I go to bed. it gives me the opportunity to reflect over what I've done, good and bad. Sometimes I expand in the notes section, sometimes it's just a mood. i love it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you so much for your review! üòé

scraped_reviews.content: titled "Journal - Mood Tracker" but it's pretty much only a mood tracker. You set your goals in the form of icons under categories, and each day you can basically mark it done. Your mood is also an icon. Adding text is convoluted and i wouldn't consider it a journal at all. So if you are looking for just a daily habit checklist, then this is great. But if you wanted more than just a simple checklist, then it's not for you
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi Jon, thanks for your honest and valuable feedback. If you have any ideas on how we can improve Daylio based on your preferences, please share them with us at hello@daylio.net. We appreciate your time and efforts.

scraped_reviews.content: It's a great app. For some reason though, they took away indents for a paragraph? Like when I write it that way, and then press save, it doesn't show, and it makes it look really messy. I write a lot so that's a little frustrating. -EDIT- I've been using this app for about 7 years. I still like it, but every time it has updates, it sucks more and more. Please stop adding unnecessary features. If it weren't getting so messed up, I'd definitely give 5 stars.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, thanks for staying such a long time with Daylio. We really do appreciate it and thanks for sharing your feedback with us. You can also contact us at hello@daylio.net with any further comments. But I have noted yours about keeping Daylio as simple as possible. Thank you once again.

scraped_reviews.content: love this app. can set reninders, goals, countdowns to days you're looking forward to etc. it's nice to be able to look back on the week, month, year, and see how accurate your perception or memory is. sometimes I think it was a rough week but it was really just one bad day, or a bad morning. really allows you to reflect. the goals portion is great too. you can set reminders or just see how much progress you're making towards something.

Been using this app for years now, off and on. Premium is worth it if you want more specific tracking and I love that it's a 1 time charge instead of another subscription. I use it to track side effects of medication and things like meals, drinks, and exercise. Saves me a lot of time in my bujo from having to manually draw each tracker for each thing.

Daylio is an excellent journaling app. i love the mood tracker and the "at-a-glance" reports. I also like that you can add moods and activities, and grouping of activities makes things a lot easier if you're like me and have fifty or more. This is a very flexible app that allows multiple entries per day. I do NOT care for the pop-ups telling me that I reached a goal and then asking if I want to share it... ummm... this is my personal diary; why would i want to share an "achievement" with anyone?

I have been using Dailyo for over three years now and I love it. It's not just a mood tracker, it's also a time capsule with the ability to save pictures, notes, and sound bites. The free version is entirely useable, and the paid verison is super cheap. While I personally think the paid verison is totally worth it, you don't need it to get use out of the app.

I have used this app for years, and it keeps getting better. It makes tracking your mental health quick. It's easily customizable to exactly what you want to track, and you can add goals for any topic. The sharable statistics make it perfect for working with your mental health team on the effects of medication changes and coping tools with measurable data. Highly recommend!

Great for tracking mood, events, chores, and any number of events that you can create and adjust to your lifestyle. If you aren't feeling in the mood to "journal", press a few buttons to record how you felt, the important things to do and you're done. If you want to write a note on particularly eventful days, you can do that. Attach a pic for each entry. A lot of things happened? Create more than one entry for the day. And yes, all of these things on the free version!!

I love this app. I've used it for over 2 years and journal at the end of every day. I have the free version and can still do enough to journal whilst adding photos, notes, and voice memos. Can set goals in the app as well. The monthly/yearly reports are nice. The only thing that I wish could be added is the ability to scroll through past entries more easily. I like to go back and read old entries, and it would be less tedious if we could swipe left/right to go through the days one day at a time.

This app is amazing. I love that you're able to write additional notes and that you're able to track your mood and other activities if you want to. The one thing I wished this app had was being able to mark / draw in the notes section while still being able to type in it. I just think it'd be handy for people like me who use a tablet and don't want to type all the time. Otherwise, I quite enjoy using this app. It has a very clean interface, and I haven't bumped into any issues while using it.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hey, we really appreciate your suggestion. We will consider it and discuss this improvement in the notes section during our team meetings. If you have more questions or suggestions please contact us at hello@daylio.net. Thanks for your time and efforts.

scraped_reviews.content: The app is very good at what it sets out to do. I like how deeply customizable it is (especially if you're not paying for it, you can still do a lot with it), and I find it very satisfying to summarize my day with the brain dump before bed However, it's really frustrating when I do a log of yesterday and then, tomorrow, get told I lost my streak because the app didn't save my log of yesterday. That is happening so frequently recently, and I hate it. I know I logged it, why's it not being saved?
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your response. We appreciate it. Can you tell us the device you are using at hello@daylio.net? We will try to evaluate the issue and get back to you.

scraped_reviews.content: i love this app so much! i'm a daily user (1835 days in a row as of today), and its the best way i've found to keep a consistent journal. there's tons of ways to log your daily habits and keep track of things you might wanna improve. there's a feature to add voice notes, pictures, text, and so many statistics that they give you even without having to pay. its by far the most intuitive journal app i've ever tried. also plenty of ways to customize the look and feel of the app. 10/10 i recommend!!!

One of the few apps I have ever upgraded to premium. I've used this literally every day since I downloaded it and it has been SO important for tracking my activities and moods. It started as proof to myself that even on my most depressed days, I was still doing SOMETHING. Now I use it to track moon cycles, the weather, and lots of other things to see how activities correlate with my moods. I love looking over old stats and seeing how things have changed. 11/10 app.

Easy to engage with. Wish added activities could be sorted into proper subjects for easier use of finding them. Also think it would be cool if you could attach a picture to journal entries. Only been using it a month and the reminders are helpful so I don't miss days. May update this later from a 4* to a 5* once I've worked with it more and tested out how useful it could be in the long term.

Great app with a lot of customization capabilities. I like how I can add photos and edit fonts to my entries. The ability to search and filter entries by activities is especially useful. I liked pulling up my monthly overview chart and having it highlight days where I jogged just to see if it really improved my mood. I just wish that my monthly overview would display the weighted average score of my day or export data to Excel or CSV.

This has been very helpful to track patterns. I write a small note each day so I know the things that happened that day that may or may not have affected my mood. I've only been using for 1.5 weeks, so there's definitely more to learn and explore. But I have identified a couple things I would change: -it would be nice to be able to delete or change the default emotions/moods that come with the app. "Rad" is not a word I would use to describe myself. -it would be great if you could add more than 9 emotions/moods with the free version, especially since 5 of the 9 you cannot delete or change. Overall, it's a pretty great tool!

Love this app with all my heart. I still wish there was a dark mode available, because for me, I usually write out my entry at night time and the white background can be kind of blinding in a dark room. Also, it would be nice if there was an easier way to navigate to older entries. Instead, I have to go back 11 months on the calendar menu and then press the arrow button to go through each month until I get where I need to be.
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Olivia, we really appreciate your suggestion. We will consider it and improve our app in the upcoming versions.  For now, please have a look and try the following: https://faq.daylio.net/article/39-enable-night-mode
Stay tuned!

scraped_reviews.content: I have tried a lot of lists apps...this is by far the best! Easy to use, can edit from the widget screen, add sub categories and reminders. it's the list that works on the run and anywhere. it can sync across all my devices, and I can use it without having to pause and input a lot of annoying fields or details. LOVE IT!

Good Little Life Tracker Easy to use and has a number of helpful features. I'm not sure I can justify paying for premium for basic things such as access to all emojis, unlimited reminders and goals, etc. when those options seem like they should be basic. I get it, they have to make money somehow. I might come back to it but I doubt I'll ever re-subscribe to premium. The basic version is fine for my needs/frequency using the app.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for reviewing us. Of course, you can keep using the free version. It is limited but if it meets your needs, it is fine. Regarding the premium, we are working full time on developing the app, bringing more and more features, getting inspired by our users' ideas. So to be able to keep it this way, we need funds. Thanks for understanding.

scraped_reviews.content: Original post 2017: It's really easy to navigate, very user friendly and easy to customize. I set the reminder to ask me twice a day how I am doing. It congratulates me when I make an entry which makes me smile and motivates me. Edit Oct 3 2024: I still use this app every day. It's been instrumental in tracking my mental health and I also use it as a diary with photos and notes. I will always make sure I have this app linked to my device. Got a streak of 2563 days and counting! 1000/10 recommend

When I initially started using this app, I was just clicking a few of the buttons and making very brief journal entries every day. Since then, I have started using it more and am now back into composing journal entries. It has really helped return me to journal writing as well as improve the content of my journals. There's a lot of great functionality to the app, and you can learn a lot about yourself. My only concern is data privacy.

title: Bubble Pop Origin! Puzzle Game
description:
üéØ Bubble Pop Origin ‚Äì Your Next Addictive Bubble Adventure! üéØ

Looking for a bubble shooter that‚Äôs fun, fast, and full of surprises? Bubble Pop Origin brings you endless hours of bubble-popping action, with unique levels, powerful boosters, and new challenges to conquer every day!

üéÆ How to Play
‚Ä¢ Simply aim and match 3+ bubbles to make them burst!
‚Ä¢ Clear the screen, earn 3 stars, and progress through challenging levels.
‚Ä¢ Use incredible boosters like bombs and rockets to power through tough puzzles and reach your goals faster!

üåü Game Features
‚Ä¢ Epic Levels: Over 2000 exciting levels ‚Äî and more added weekly!
‚Ä¢ Special Boosters: Use unique power-ups like fireballs, bombs, and rockets to take down obstacles and finish levels quicker.
‚Ä¢ Offline Play: No Wi-Fi? No problem! Enjoy Bubble Pop Origin anytime, anywhere.
‚Ä¢ Daily Challenges: Compete in fun, daily tasks for extra rewards and coins.
‚Ä¢ Leaderboard Races: Compete with players around the world in the Explorer Race and climb the leaderboards!

üî• Why Bubble Pop Origin is Unstoppable
‚Ä¢ Addictive & Fun: Simple to learn, but impossible to put down.
‚Ä¢ Stunning Visuals: Pop bubbles in a world filled with vibrant colors, smooth animations, and amazing effects.
‚Ä¢ Strategic Gameplay: Challenge your skills with increasingly difficult levels and complex puzzles.
‚Ä¢ Endless Rewards: Unlock boosters, win daily rewards, and earn amazing prizes with every level you conquer!

üöÄ Ready to Pop?
Download Bubble Pop Origin today and dive into the most exciting bubble shooter ever made. Challenge your friends, claim your rewards, and become a bubble-popping champion!

summary: Get ready for an exciting adventure with the ultimate bubble shooter game!

scraped_reviews.content: A mental challenge and a great time passer/waster. I would have rated at 5, but cannot find a list of the "rules", scoring, meaning of the various special bubbles, etc. On the plus side, no ads, no attempts to sell anything (unless I agree to watch an ad). Updating my review... As the levels progress, it becomes more and more difficult to clear all the bubbles with the given 'ammunition'. Additional 'ammo' is available if I consent to watch one or more ads. I'll probably uninstall. Level 200+
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Thank you for enjoying our game! Your detailed feedback would greatly help us improve and develop the game further. If possible, please contact us through the in-game support feature or other available channels. We truly appreciate your support and interest!

scraped_reviews.content: Played this game for years, always with commercials and that was okay, but for a while now it has been locking up during commercials. Sometimes at the beginning and others after the entire commercial has played. It's annoying when you can't finish a game and have to force the app to shut down. I have tried all the "fixes" a couple of times and they never work. Sorry to leave this game behind, but when it is annoying rather than fun, it's time to go.

Enjoyable! I love a game that lets you advance while providing challenging game play and, at the same time, allows you to bank rewards and powerups. Adds are super easy to circumvent by simply waiting a very short time for the "x" to appear in the corner. Or if you are impatient, simply set your phone to "airplane" mode and play add-free!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we're very glad to hear you are enjoying our game.üíö We have much more coming up, so please stay tuned! Have fun with BitMango games!

scraped_reviews.content: Way too many ads.. playing this game has become VERY disturbing with the long ads. And as of late, the game started cheating me out of points so i cannot obtain weapons after you pass a level.. it has become very clear that this game has become ad oriented, in that they have now made it nearly impossible to pass a level without having to play 3 different 30 second ads. And, should you pass a level without the need for extra bubbles, it will not let you go to the next level without an ad..
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Dear user, thank you for sharing your inconvenience with us. üòÄ We‚Äôre sorry that your experience didn‚Äôt match your expectations. We will try our best to adjust the frequency of advertisement. Thank you.

scraped_reviews.content: It takes 10 minutes after beating a level to start the next. First you have to wait for the fireworks. Then there's an ad. Then there's a pop up for the daily event, then a pop up for unlocks, then a pop up for the monthly event, then a pop up for treasure, plus 2 or 3 others. All with animations that take forever. The game play is great, if you can ever actually play the game. Altogether, the developer is trash for bloating their game to the point that you can't actually play it
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for sharing your feedback! We understand that your game experience may not have met your expectations. We are committed to improving the game and hope to see you back playing soon!

scraped_reviews.content: I love this game, and the fact that the lives are literally unlimited. All. The. Time. But it's glitchy, and right now there's an event where I am progressing through the ranks, but I can't claim ANY of the rewards I'm earning. It's been this way since I went from bronze level rewards to silver. Maybe a bit before that. But I'll change my review to 5 stars if that gets fixed. ;)
scraped_reviews.replyContent: So sorry for the issue. Developers are currently doing their best to rectify the issue. We will do our best to resolve it as soon as possible. Thank you for your report.

scraped_reviews.content: Starts off fine as a Bust a Move knockoff. Then it falls into the typical trap of this puzzle type where the game simply will not give you the bubble you need as you run out of turns. Of course, the game is all too willing to let you pay for 5 more turns with the scarce in-game currency or real cash. Since that elusive color you need is ALWAYS the next bubble up (coincidence???) you know you want to pay them... It could have been better.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for leaving a review. We would be grateful if you could share your thoughts and suggestions with us because we would like to improve our games based on your feedback. We will wait for your reply.ü§ó

scraped_reviews.content: I like the unlimited play. But it seems every time there's an update it works more poorly. Currently, I can't play the weekend hidden chamber-- freezes, and I need to close and restart. Freezes during regular game play also, usually when replaying a level. As another person said, takes forever to exit an ad, or again freezes. Sensing a theme here???
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We apologize for the freezing issue you encountered after the update. Also, we are sorry to hear that you were unsatisfied with the ads in our game. Are you still experiencing the same issue with the hidden chamber? If so, please contact us through the in-game chat and provide screenshots so that we can further investigate the issue. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: The game itself is fine - each level is passable, but some do present an intriguing challenge. However, even without ever choosing to watch ads to get extras, the amount of obligatory ad time between levels (or between next attempts at levels not yet passed) became egregious. It seemed like the game ultimately was an attempt to keep me watching ads, rather than actually playing. I appreciate that free games need to find other ways to pay, but this seemed excessive. Ultimately uninstalled.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, We are sincerely sorry for the freezing problem. We would love to help you out, so could you please contact us through our in-game contact with a screenshot provided? We will wait for your reply. Have a great day!

scraped_reviews.content: Update: I upgraded my phone. Got a fresh start. I truly enjoy this game. Not ad heavy. My favorite game. GIVE IT A TRY!!!! I would love to give this game 5 stars. I enjoy playing it, maybe too much, I've cleared all the levels. It shows more coming soon.. three weeks have passed and still nothing. Now I have to play one of the competitors version. What upsets me most is They still sell booster packages, which have no use when you cleared all levels.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we are sincerely sorry for keeping you waiting.üòû We are doing our best sorting out various ideas on the latest updates, and it might take some time. We are sorry about that. We will make sure it updates soon. Thank you for your understanding.

scraped_reviews.content: Did I download a game which displays ads occasionally, or an ad generator which lets me play a game occasionally? Extremely excessive with the ads. Uninstalling after just a few minutes. I wouldn't mind having an ad shoved down my throat every other round if it was one I could close after a couple seconds or so. Being forced to sit through an ad THAT long merits some sort of in-game bonus, making the player feel ripped off and making the game not remotely worth the time.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for providing your feedback. We sincerely apologize that our game did not meet your expectations. Rest assured, we are fully committed to enhancing your gaming experience and making the necessary improvements. We look forward to welcoming you back to our games in the future!

scraped_reviews.content: 1) There need to be options in addition to Facebook to save progress for use across multiple devices. 2) I feel that $5.00 for a Premium Pass is a bit much to pay for something that is only good for a limited time and needs to be purchased repeatedly. 3) Paying 100 or 200 coins to "Play On" is a bit steep in my opinion. I find that I'd rather start over, and usually do. These three things are why I gave 4 stars rather than 5. Otherwise, I enjoy the game and find it addicting.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We are very happy to hear that you are satisfied with our app! Hope you continually enjoy our game.üíõ Have a happy day.

scraped_reviews.content: I downloaded the game for something to do without thinking when I can't sleep. It serves that purpose. There are about six things that I would do to improve the game. But it is free. I am not happy about the daily bonus going from 125 coins to 75 coins. The bonus coins didn't cost the designer(s) anything. It would be nice to carry over any unused bombs or bubbles.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We're grateful for your feedback and are committed to enhancing the game's enjoyment. We will share your opinion to the development team so it can be consider upon when making improvements. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Don't waste your time or money!! Yes, the game is a lot of fun but very frustrating because the game keeps shutting down, multiple times, while you're playing and haven't been able to play for days!!! I can't even get to the game because it shuts down before I get to it!! I've sent many "reports" to no avail!! So frustrating!! I'm deleting this game!!
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback and apologize for any disappointment caused. Our team is dedicated to improving your gaming experience and will take your suggestions into consideration. We hope to have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience in the future.

scraped_reviews.content: I've reached out for help, several times. To no avail... Great game. So many times, you miss out on the daily free coins because the video is unavailable/you're unable to play the video. That alone has dropped my 5 stars down to 2 stars.  Getting any help from the developer(s) or anyone else is out of the question. That makes it worse. Having excellent customer service is a must. Which they're lacking here.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your review and sorry for what you experienced. I will make sure to deliver your feedack to developers and check on the issue. If the problem continues repeatedly, please let me know through in-game chat. My name is Justin. Thank you. Have a great day :)

scraped_reviews.content: It is fun, challenging yet chill, the further you get, the harder it is. However there are a LOT of problems. I have to shut my phone off and then back on EVERY morning so I can watch the 5 adds to get my coins,no biggie. In between levels and during the level I am playing it will glitch and ask me if I want to quit or resume. While playing it also freeze's and don't want to shoot the ball causing you to have to tap on the screen a few times to shoot. And the ball changes color is mid shot.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for leaving a review. We hope you keep enjoying our games. We will always try our best to improve. See you in the game! üòâ

scraped_reviews.content: I love this game! I've been playing it for several years. If you can save up the boosters you earn in the beginning levels, it makes playing the harder levels much easier! Also, don't be afraid to not be able to beat a level. If you just watch an ad (or do something else while the ad is playing), they will give you a free random booster to use to replay the level! Each time you replay that level, you might get a different booster. Eventually, you will win that level!! Good luck, and have fun!ü•∞
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, it must have been quite disturbing to enjoy the game. We will share your feedback with the developers and find a way to deal with it. Thank you for your understanding and patience.üòä

scraped_reviews.content: It's really fun with ads that are not that intrusive. The problem is that once you hit level 186, it repeatedly gives you colors you can't use 5 or 6 in a row forcing you to burn though your power-ups. It would be better if it were possible to not have to use any power-ups if you're good enough. Still though, have to give it 3 stars because it's a very fun game up to that point.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: We appreciate your feedback and are dedicated to elevating your gaming experience. Your opinion will be shared with the development team for their consideration as we work towards making improvements. Thank you!

scraped_reviews.content: Update: 6/27/24 The game is highly addictive, so far the ads are much better. I like the cancel feature in case I don't want to use a rocket or a bum or any of the other special bubbles. Most times this cancel feature shows up but sometimes it doesn't and it's still forces you to use it. I Don like being forced to use rockets bombs üí£ at the beginning when I don't need to. Also would like an ad free version. I like this game. Would be willing to purchase within reason.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for reaching us.ü§ó You can buy the Ad-Free version by clicking '+' icon next to the coins. If you can't find it, please let us know. We will always be here to help you.

scraped_reviews.content: Don't get me wrong, this is a fun game... Until it locks up and freezes, especially when I have one move left to make three stars. The only way to unfreeze the game is to stop it and kill the app, lose my progress, and lo se all of my saved power-ups. There's got to be another game like this one that doesn't freeze up. I would pay to remove ads, but why do that if the game is unplayable.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi, It must have been frustrating while playing the game. we're so sorry .. And I will also make sure to deliver your message to developers so they can check what causes the problem. Thank you for your report.

scraped_reviews.content: I think they forgot a word in the title--it should be Bubble Pop Up. Between all the ads, animations, and other extra fluff, this game is practically unplayable. When you finally do get to play, gameplay is not bad, but it's not worth wasting more than half your time sitting through ads, popups, and the like.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for sharing your inconvenience with us. We will deliver your inquiry to our developers that the advertisement disrupting the gaming experience. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience.üò•

scraped_reviews.content: It was fun as I worked my way up the levels. But, now at level 163, the game is so difficult with the bubbles surrounded by barriers, you are FORCED to buy BOMBS and ROCKETS to blast your way through the barriers to achieve levels. And those specialized "Blast Tools" require REAL MONEY. When I can EARN those with game skill, I'll consider playing again when that UPDATE comes out.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback. We're really sorry for any inconvenience you've had. üòî We appreciate your input and will pass it along to our development team for consideration. Thank you for your review, we hope you continue to enjoy the game!

scraped_reviews.content: It's fun to a point. But you win very little coins. 10 coins is NOT generous. Since it will cost you 300+ just for 3 boosts. The jackpot on the spin is a joke. Some of the boards are so incredibly hard that they are impossible to beat without using bombs or rockets. Ads are annoying to buy this, buy that. I've bought a few things, but will not continue until developers make this more balanced. Which it is not. Could have more potential if games were not always about money.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, we apologize for the inconvenience you've faced. üòî It seems that your game experience may not have been entirely satisfying. We will share your opinion to the development team so it can be considered upon when making improvements.

scraped_reviews.content: It displays all the time to purchase more coins or more Bomb things, once you've made a purchase it changes the game. Playing for many months, I reached level 3347, just made a purchase and it changed the game to where I can't beat the level and now the game is frustrating to where I need to uninstall. Worthless after purchasing. Great game, never purchase anything, not as exciting to play. It won't allow you to win the next level. REPETITIVE ADDS!Uninstalling it.

I really enjoy this game, BUT, it continually freezes up! I play on my PC and two times have gotten to a 400 level, then it quits. I will uninstall and forget about it. 11/13/2021 I re-installed and was able to reach level 722. It appears since the update the game won't even work. Have sent 2 emails, but to no avail. wish you could get this operating like it should.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, thank you for leaving a comment. We would like to inform you that the problem has been resolved. New version is out now! Please update your app. If the problem still exists afterwards, please feel free to contact us again. ü§ó

scraped_reviews.content: It's a fun game but if you start to win too much it just starts to cheat. Sometimes the bubble doesn't go where the game said it was going to go. Sometimes it will go 5 or more turns without giving you a color you can use. Sometimes the game just hangs when you're getting close to winning. Update: This game gets worse with each release. It's now crashing every time I go to watch an ad in order get a reward. The app crashes and so I don't get the reward I've earned.

scraped_reviews.content: I've been play this game for awhile and I love it. However, I recently noticed the option to watch a video for 3 extra balls is no longer available...or at least not for me. Also, the booster are far and few between, the coins have dropped to 10, so, if I want to finish a level I have to buy coins and boosters. I enjoy the game so I've made several purchases. I'm on level 1740 something. I don't mind buying once in awhile but I won't keep doing it. I still give 5 stars.

I've had this app for years & I used to give it between 4 -5, but I have to drop it down now. There is now no longer a way to earn points by watching ads. This has been done in order to force you to purchase more bubbles. I WILL NOT be forced to purchase anything. I was able to build up 20, 000 points, but I am now down to 1300. As soon as I no longer have any points left, I will be uninstalling.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello. So sad to hear you couldn‚Äôt enjoy the game due to ads. I‚Äôll share your feedback with the developers so they can consider adjustments. If you have more details, please let us know through the in-game contact feature.

scraped_reviews.content: I am over 2100 levels and I need to say that either this game is getting rigged or there are a few hacker. I have noticed recently that players in the weekly challenge, in a few hours, jump a lot of levels. Today, one player in two or three hours jumps from 62 games to 193 won games. Maybe, I am wrong, but it is happening often now and was not like that before. what do you all think?

I play as fast as I possibly can, and I stop ONLY to get more great stuff for FREE!!! I LOVE THIS GAME!! My cat hates it because I do a lot of yelling, and bouncing when I am on the couch or bed. Even my wife tells me to stop yelling and bouncing. That's all folks (for now)! If you like aim and shoot, GET THIS BEAST!!! JimmyT

I would rate this game more but your ads are very very annoying. An add is used for more balls but most of the time it takes you out of the game making you lose your consecutive wins. scraped_reviews.content: Hey, I'm having fun. Not the most challenging game, but fun to relax to after a hard day. I have a few "no brainer" games. This one is a bit more than no Brainer... I give it a 6 on the intelligence scale.. hee hee. But I'm a coder and I am so biased, it should rank an 8 or 9.5. Most "normal" people will love this! *** Three stars.
