title: Weather - Meteored Pro News
description: Meteored - Pro Version You get everything available in the free version plus: ‚úÖ No more ads. ‚úÖ Standalone App. Pay only once and keep it forever. ‚úÖ Choose which information you want to see on your main screen. ‚úÖ Unlocked Color Themes. ‚úÖ Save up to triple as many locations. ‚òÖ ‚ö†Ô∏è ALERTS AND NOTIFICATIONS ‚òÖ With our weather app you receive official weather alerts and live radar alerts for your area from the National Weather Service, including warnings about storms, strong winds,hurricanes, tropical storms and other adverse weather events forecast for the next few hours. In addition, our optimal app Assistant can notify you about important weather changes in the coming days. ‚òÖ üåÄ REALTIME RADAR, FORECAST MAPS AND SATELLITES üì° ‚òÖ Now available! A new animated world weather map based on the ECMWF showing the weather forecast for the coming days. Enjoy our live radar service and also our hurricane tracker and storm, access animated weather radar of the last few hours provided by the NWS along with visible and infrared satellite images provided by NOAA. ‚òÖ WEATHER NEWS ‚òÖ Check the new section of our news to be up to date of the latest weather events. Be informed about trending topics and the most recent forecast. Furthermore, you can watch impactating videos about severe weather in some places of the world and, last but no least, you will learn about the weather phenomena thanks to our science articles, made by our experts in meteorology. ‚òÖ CUSTOMIZATION ‚òÖ Unlock new Color Themes by completing our in app Achievements designed to help you make the most of the app by discovering all the available features. Remember, the application automatically changes color when the temperature changes! ‚òÖ WEATHER FORECAST ‚òÖ Check the current conditions along with the weather forecast for the next 14 days with a simple slide of your finger. Select a day to view detailed hourly information including heat index or temperature, precipitation, wind speed and direction, wind chill, pressure, cloudiness, humidity, UV index, sunset and sunrise times and even the phase of the moon. Turn your device sideways to see how the weather local will evolve throughout the day with our amazing graphics. ‚òÖ WIDGETS ‚òÖ You can customize your desktop with the most modern widgets currently available. You will have access to up to 8 widgets with different sizes and weather data, where you can check your local weather forecast. ‚òÖ SHARE ‚òÖ Share weather forecasts with your friends and family anytime you want with whatever device or social network you like to use such as: WhatsApp, Twitter or Facebook. ‚òÖ AVAILABILITY ‚òÖ Find the forecast most relevant to your exact current location or search for your favorite locations from over 6,000,000 all around the world. Available in over 50 countries and 20 languages. This app collects location data to enable weather forecasts, weather alerts, temperature in the notification bar, widgets and notifications about important events, for the location where currently you are. ‚òÖ Meteored - Passion for the weather, enjoy it with us ‚òÖ Like most important projects, Meteored is made possible by the amazing human team behind it. About US https://www.theweather.com/about-us To use this app you must agree to the privacy policy, as well as the terms and conditions of Meteored. Privacy Policy https://www.theweather.com/privacy.html Legal notice https://www.theweather.com/legal_notice.html
descriptionHTML:
Meteored - Pro Version

You get everything available in the free version plus:
‚úÖ No more ads.
‚úÖ Standalone App. Pay only once and keep it forever.
‚úÖ Choose which information you want to see on your main screen.
‚úÖ Unlocked Color Themes.
‚úÖ Save up to triple as many locations.


‚òÖ ‚ö†Ô∏è ALERTS AND NOTIFICATIONS ‚òÖ
With our weather app you receive official weather alerts and live radar alerts for your area from the National Weather Service, including warnings about storms, strong winds,hurricanes, tropical storms and other adverse weather events forecast for the next few hours. In addition, our optimal app Assistant can notify you about important weather changes in the coming days.

‚òÖ üåÄ REALTIME RADAR, FORECAST MAPS AND SATELLITES üì° ‚òÖ
Now available! A new animated world weather map based on the ECMWF showing the weather forecast for the coming days. Enjoy our live radar service and also our hurricane tracker and storm, access animated weather radar of the last few hours provided by the NWS along with visible and infrared satellite images provided by NOAA.

‚òÖ WEATHER NEWS ‚òÖ
Check the new section of our news to be up to date of the latest weather events. Be informed about trending topics and the most recent forecast. Furthermore, you can watch impactating videos about severe weather in some places of the world and, last but no least, you will learn about the weather phenomena thanks to our science articles, made by our experts in meteorology.

‚òÖ CUSTOMIZATION ‚òÖ
Unlock new Color Themes by completing our in app Achievements designed to help you make the most of the app by discovering all the available features. Remember, the application automatically changes color when the temperature changes!

‚òÖ WEATHER FORECAST ‚òÖ
Check the current conditions along with the weather forecast for the next 14 days with a simple slide of your finger. Select a day to view detailed hourly information including heat index or temperature, precipitation, wind speed and direction, wind chill, pressure, cloudiness, humidity, UV index, sunset and sunrise times and even the phase of the moon. Turn your device sideways to see how the weather local will evolve throughout the day with our amazing graphics.

‚òÖ WIDGETS ‚òÖ
You can customize your desktop with the most modern widgets currently available. You will have access to up to 8 widgets with different sizes and weather data, where you can check your local weather forecast.

‚òÖ SHARE ‚òÖ
Share weather forecasts with your friends and family anytime you want with whatever device or social network you like to use such as: WhatsApp, Twitter or Facebook.

‚òÖ AVAILABILITY ‚òÖ
Find the forecast most relevant to your exact current location or search for your favorite locations from over 6,000,000 all around the world. Available in over 50 countries and 20 languages.

This app collects location data to enable weather forecasts, weather alerts, temperature in the notification bar, widgets and notifications about important events, for the location where currently you are.

‚òÖ Meteored - Passion for the weather, enjoy it with us ‚òÖ
Like most important projects, Meteored is made possible by the amazing human team behind it.

About US
https://www.theweather.com/about-us


To use this app you must agree to the privacy policy, as well as the terms and conditions of Meteored.

Privacy Policy

https://www.theweather.com/privacy.html

Legal notice

https://www.theweather.com/legal_notice.html
summary: Weather News & Live Radar,  Hurricane tracker,  Hourly Forecast ,  Alerts.

scraped_reviews.content: I just started, in late Sept, getting a 'Don't Allow' box that says to contact the developer if this message is in error. It would at least open before but then I uninstalled & reinstalled it to see if that fixed it, & now it won't even open, just hangs saying the title. I've owned the app for over 2 years. App updated in late July. I've emailed support but no response yet & no update fix. be warned if you buy the Pro version.

I wanted so badly to like this app. I have tried several since weather underground changed, but I have been let down and wasted my money yet again. The descriptions are always missing info. I mean like words, some are just missing. And it has vague statements like "some snow expected" we are supposed to get 6 inches. We have been under a weather alert for hours, wasn't notified, even when I open the app, nothing comes up. I really just wish I could get my money back. Plan to uninstall asap.

The app is great, tracks your location perfectly, has 2 week detailed forecast, great maps and radar, and also latest weather and metrology news. However it's not so accurate and it's always showing around 3-5 degrees cooler than the actual weather forecast, (I can't speak for all places but that's what I have experienced here in New York City).

I like how the app looks but the data source is just awful. I've been places where it said it wasn't raining and showed no clouds yet it was pouring down. It was part of Play Pass so it didn't cost anything I would be upset if I paid the ridiculous price, list is $19.99. Two stars only because it looks nice but it's mostly useless, there are much better apps out there.

The app is great Almost spot on with temperature. just a few degrees different, usually a few degees warmer, but that is it. Accurate weekly weather too. weather alerts are usually the first to come in before my other apps. Shows information exactly what I want to see. more than 10 days ahead and accurate. Worth checking out for sure.

One of the best weather apps out there, I've learned to choose carefully on these types of apps the hard way. Because not all weather apps are equally the same information on the data reported, from nearby airports. As well the quality of weather reports available locally! I went out of my way to buy this app, for good reasons because of its accuracy on reading the resorts.

one of the best I have tried over the years. Simple UI that isn't cluttered. relatively reliable. two issues with it. 1. widgets not the best, considering users will have widgets displayed on front screen and lack of choices. the widgets will not recognise your clock app when you click on time. this means you still need your clock widget displayed rendering 3/4 of this apps widgets useless. 2. could use with a little more custom options.

I bought Pro a few years ago & been struggling to make it update and customize anything & now it wants to charge me $30 to move it on my new phone. Uninstalled. I'm just using WeaWow now since it lets me customize more and no advertising getting in the way.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Daniel. We are sorry this happened. If you already bought the Pro version, you can restore your purchase within the app, under Settings > Restore purchases. If it still asks you to pay again, please write to us at support@meteored.com with the details so we can assist you.

scraped_reviews.content: I got this app free through play pass, but I'm basing my 1-star rating on the $20 price tag so that paying customers know to avoid this. The app looks great and I like all the info provided through the widget. However, this is a weather app and the one thing it gets consistently wrong is the weather! Very unreliable and untrustworthy.

I've only been using this a short time to replace another app, and so far there is nothing I don't like about it. I hate having too many notifications buzzing my watch, but the update frequency of temp/conditions is perfect and just enough info. Great app!

Is there a way to change the weather station or source? Wildly inaccurate lately with a 10‚Å∞-15‚Å∞ difference in highs in lows compared to other apps. Will probably stop using. Edit: 2 months later I'm downgrading from 3 stars to 1 and deleting. It is 91‚Å∞ outside currently and the widget is reporting 74‚Å∞ and the app says it's a high of 82‚Å∞.
It's weather without all the cruff of the modern internet. Recommend when you just want the data.

It is disappointing, We are not getting alerts (warnings) in Canada! But they get warnings in the US and other places in the world. We have to get the warnings from Environment Canada otherwise the app is useless. Also having air quality and allergies would help too! Another thing that someone mentioned in the reviews, is the colored precipitation, their reversed, rain should be green and blue for snow. Also, the radar takes a long time to load. Please update because otherwise it's a great app.

So after years of using this App, I had to adjust the rating... Went from 5 down to 4 stars. My issue is the "news" ; the articles written by the so called "Weather Experts". Garbage Click-bait. I have nothing against a bit of Artistic freedom when writing, or using a few colorful adjectives to color up an often dry subject, but it is carried too far with every article. On a positive note, the features of the actual reported weather are great. Well thought out, easy to find and understand info.
This app seriously needs an update maps not refreshing and not updated showing wrong hurricane category its not a reliable app at the moment hope i didn't waste my money üò©

The added news section at the position where usually we have the automatic location is a BAD IDEA. At least make it optional. I want to know the weather not accidentally bump into some news. I have a web browser for news. If you want to make news visible make it optional and don't mix it in with the weather forecast tabs for my different locations!!! Make it a separate button or whatever but make it possible to disable it. This makes the app experience WORSE!

It's a great looking app with loads of features but sadly it fails in it's main function of giving an accurate weather forecast. It always seems to give a forecast that's much better than reality, saying it's going to be sunny and dry when actually it's grey or raining. This isn't for days ahead, it's not even right for the next few hours or at the current time. It gets my location exactly right so that's not the problem and other apps get the forecast correct. I've given up with it!

A rare app with fairly consistent UK forecasting (BBC Weather I'm looking at you), and the radar is really very good! Dinged a star because the most recent update removed the option for icon styles. I appreciate the broad range that the new-style icons provide, but I miss the "flat colour" versions and would love to be able to use those still, even if they are less "accurate" (I tend to look at the data anyway so the icons are mostly aesthetic for me)
I like the layout and all the lunar information in notifications
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Gina. Thank you very much for your feedback/comment, we are glad you are enjoying Meteored and its features!

scraped_reviews.content: The longer term forecasts and temperatures are way out and seem to change regularly. The current weather and short term forecast are also way out for lots of areas. A waste of money and time!

this weather app is bad a$$! I don't need another weather app this one is it. the best. it tells u more than just the weather!!! download download and u will see this is the only app u need!!! ü§óü§ó finally an app that has no problems or pop ups.

Was hopelessly inaccurate, and very unreliable! However, latest version has seemingly restored accuracy. Visually impressive, with a wide range of visual styles, many of which need to be 'earned' (for free) by familiarising yourself with many of the apps, functions and features. As for accuracy, used to be impressive, but has dramatically lost its accuracy!

Really like the app & detail & most of the layout but can't figure out where you're sourcing the temps (several degrees off) For example, even the airport, which is higher elevation, which many apps source is still 4/5 degrees higher than what you report. But the city, which is in the valley & even warmer is now 8/9 degrees off. Perplexing.

The app itself is functionally okay, and I like the widgets, but the forecast for my city (Asheville, NC) is wildly inaccurate. It shows clear weather when it's raining and rain when it's clear - and yes, I enabled every location access permission I was asked for. The radar is better, but I need to be able to check things quickly. In the 7 days I've had this app, it's shown a 0% chance of rain, but when I've walked outside, it's raining. Not super helpful, but the app is pretty, lol!

They want 20 bucks for this app. I have play pass so I got it for free and it's horrible. They'll say it's storming in my area when the sky is as blue as can be. They change the forecasted temps 10 to 20 degrees either way almost hourly. Can't depend on the app and they have to know it's not good or useful for anything but still want $20 for it. several months later and they havent been right yet. says its storming where i am when the sun is shining not a cloud one

This used to be a good weather App, however, it only displays in landscape, not portrait on my tablet, since the latest update. Please deal with this issue so that I can give a 5 stars rating again. Also now, the app continues to crash when launching, so obviously an update is necessary. Back to 5 stars, as rotation to Portrait has been restored! Thanks for listening.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello, Bob. Thank you for your feedback. We will try to fix it as soon as possible.

scraped_reviews.content: Very pleased with the UI, both the presentation and available data. I especially am thankful for the 14-day forecast plus moon cycles. Everything is very easy to read and fathom at a glance. Weather data is reliable. In my small community there are three elevations/districts where readings are taken. We live between two and three and find that #2 fits our temperatures perfectly. So try different options near you to see what works.

I don't agree with all your info gathering on my expense, you want to many permissions so you can give them to all your partners and harass me with ads, and who knows what else, I deleted the app as soon as I found out you can't change or opt out of anything, so I'm glad others find the app great, but for me it's an intrusion of my privacy, way to many permissions needed.
Solid Weather App. The widget is a little ugly, but the app is good and info dense. worth the money (play pass)
Good amount of information but the current temp shown is 2-4 degrees higher than every other weather source.
Terrible weather app, all this thing does is give false information and farm your data in return

The current conditions report is consistently inaccurate regarding temperatures. Today for example, I have local readings of 37F - the app shows 47F. Typically, it is off only 3-5F degrees but today really isn't acceptable. This also can cause it to show rain when it actually is snowing. I purchased the app for it's future radar and I will keep it for that purpose alone. I will have to use something else for the current conditions. I will gladly update my review if/when things are corrected.

Don't usually give reviews, but out of 4 weather apps I was using to get the weather forecast accurately, this is by far and above the most accurate with the most information that I like to look at. I have since deleted the others, even though they were supposed to be the most accurate. Cheers and kudos to the creator üëè

This is the one and only accurate weather app for the UK. I have tried many, free and paid and this one is the best. I paid for no ads after the free one tested for a while and wasn't wrong. Amazing. Even times for rain and wind are bang on the money, 24 hours warnings even accurate to the hour. Buy this if you live in UK, you won't be sorry.

I have enjoyed this app for some time. I like the alerts and variety of information shared. However recently; the radar, rain forecast, and, temperature have been wrong. It will be raining and it isn't even noted on the app. Makes it very challenging during the springtime as a serious gardener planning out vegetable and flower crops for the year.

for me this app isn't worth being a free app. RE: The marker on map doesn't show my location accurately. It has never shown my location closer than 20 miles from my home. One time the marker had me in the neighboring state. One thing more, when I look at the radar and visually spot my home and radar shows rain, I look outside and no rain, not even wet. I am glad some of you like this app. I wish I could get a refund

Pretty much the most beautiful design of all weather apps that I know, but sadly not showing accurate forecasts. I used and compared various weather apps while in Germany, Tenerife and Mallorca and in all locations WeatherPro and Meteogram Pro (with dwd.de weather provider) were both considerably more correct with regards to temperature and precipitation - which is a shame, especially for locations in Spain, the developer's home country. Hoping they'll work on improving their forecast models so that the data is more on point in the future.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hi. We continue working to improve. We just made an update with many new features and improvements. We greatly appreciate your comments. Thank you for using our app. Greetings.

scraped_reviews.content: I got this app since I thought it would be nice to have a fully powered weather app but it's no better than what the pixel 6 phones native weather app provides. Honestly it was often worse in terms of temperatures not being as accurate and rain and snow forecasts being undercounted. I kept it for half a year but it never improved so I deleted it. I enjoyed having the radar coverage but it wasn't worth it

Updated: I went down stars because the air quality wasn't correct. We had smoke from numerous wildfires in OR and it kept saying good when in fact we got to unhealthy. Everything else seems pretty much on point. It can be hard to predict the weather in the PNW but AQ is not! Great so far. Live in the PNW and lots of the weather apps are not right. Have had this app for a few days and so far spot on! Love all the extra stuff for when a storm coming in and seeing all the maps and radar.

Opens quickly and all information is available at a glance. Great dark mode on Android 10. It's biggest widget is jam-packed with important stuff. Other widgets are dissapoiting,needs better hourly widget.Sent feedback often and never heard back. It's got a major flaw with snow accumulation, it can't do snow amounts.No weather notifications in Canada.Radar can be slow and the colors are odd, blue is usually snow but here it means light rain. Please add snow precipitation amounts!

I discovered that the forecast(s) for my location are off considerably. For 2 days, this app forecasted clear skies at night, and it was actually overcast for one night and most of the second night. And the temperature at night was off by over 15¬∞f. It forecasted the nighttime Temps to be 16¬∞f & 11¬∞f and the nighttime Temps have actually been 37¬∞f & 39¬∞f (respectively). This much disparity between what the app reports and what the weather was in reality renders the app basically useless.

Widgets are terrible. Can not be resized. If you try to make them smaller it just cuts off the characters. If you try to make them bigger the characters do not grow. The clock widget is not customizable at all other than dark blue background or white background. App is otherwise ok but at this price needs way better widget support.
scraped_reviews.replyContent: Hello VTRex, Could you send a screenshot or video to support@meteored.com so that we can see what you are saying?

scraped_reviews.content: In the UK, what counts is predicting rain later in the day. Meteored is completely unable to do that, whereas the Met Office app can. So I've switched to that instead. Pity. This is a well-thought out & nicely designed app with great features... sadly presenting unreliable information with false precision! The ECMWF model is optimised for broad brush, what's it going to be like later in the week forecasting. It can't accurately tell you whether you'll need an umbrella in Dibley at 3:30pm today.

The app is very good. I mistakenly ran it without first deleting the free version. I contacted their support..who were brilliant. Responded so quickly, and told me where I was going wrong. By that point I`d already left first feedback...which I am now correcting. I highly recommend this App. With the Pro version installed there are no Ads!

Very clean and lots of info, but very little customisation. The clock widget especially could be better as the "clock strikes 13" approach spoils it for me. Displaying sun up/down in the day header would be nice. A more compact list option would be good. Also the landscape mode display requires screen rotation to be on whereas other apps (YouTube for example) have in-app screen rotation regardless of the phone setting.

It looks nice and has great info, given it is accurate. 1 star because it is never accurate. I don't know where it gets the data. Temperature is always wrong, so is the radar. Says 72 with rain. Where I am it is 82, partly cloudy. Many times radar will say no rain at my location, but it is pouring out. Can't trust this thing at all. It is a shame, because the app would be fantastic if it were even a little bit accurate for current conditions/radar.

Perfect in every way. Bravo !! However, I discovered the location, while very accurate, seems to wander. When I first download, the app finds my location precisely. After a few days, the location drifts to another address. Still on my street, but blocks away. Why doesn't the app lock onto my location, and prevent drifting. I have not relocated my phone either.

Update: Sept 2022: Airport codes still can't be searched when adding locations and some major airports can't be searched then added even by full exact name! Forecast videos wouldn't play for the first day or so, with a revolving circle leading to an error message, while the Trending videos played fine. But as I continued to try intermittently, I found these working finally, though the Trending videos still load and play faster, almost immediately. Everything else works fine - great weather app!
scraped_reviews.replyContent:
Hi.
Could you try again? Maybe was a temporary incidence.
Thank you

scraped_reviews.content: My only complaint with this otherwise excellent app is that for the pro version we should have the option to turn off the news/video feed - it's bloat. Also, if we could set a period of time for the forecast layers that would be great so that it doesn't keep on going indefinitely or stop really short. Giving control of the speed of the forecast can also help make it smoother and not so jerky + time label at top through the progression so we can easily see time:forecast position.

Nice tools and displays, but not very accurate. Will show as 0% chance of rain even though it has been raining for hours and radar clearly shows it raining for several more. Temps can be wildly off. Ads are not intrusive. Real showcase is the variety of radar options with a large time window of vieweing.
